32 
49 QCPPainter::QCPPainter() :
50  QPainter(),
51  mModes(pmDefault),
52  mIsAntialiasing(false)
53 {
54  // don't setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefautPen) here, because painter isn't active yet and
55  // a call to begin() will follow
56 }
57 
64 QCPPainter::QCPPainter(QPaintDevice *device) :
65  QPainter(device),
66  mModes(pmDefault),
67  mIsAntialiasing(false)
68 {
69 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0) // before Qt5, default pens used to be cosmetic if NonCosmeticDefaultPen flag isn't set. So we set it to get consistency across Qt versions.
70  if (isActive())
71  setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefaultPen);
72 #endif
73 }
74 
75 QCPPainter::~QCPPainter()
76 {
77 }
78 
85 void QCPPainter::setPen(const QPen &pen)
86 {
87  QPainter::setPen(pen);
88  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
89  makeNonCosmetic();
90 }
91 
99 void QCPPainter::setPen(const QColor &color)
100 {
101  QPainter::setPen(color);
102  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
103  makeNonCosmetic();
104 }
105 
113 void QCPPainter::setPen(Qt::PenStyle penStyle)
114 {
115  QPainter::setPen(penStyle);
116  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
117  makeNonCosmetic();
118 }
119 
128 void QCPPainter::drawLine(const QLineF &line)
129 {
130  if (mIsAntialiasing || mModes.testFlag(pmVectorized))
131  QPainter::drawLine(line);
132  else
133  QPainter::drawLine(line.toLine());
134 }
135 
142 void QCPPainter::setAntialiasing(bool enabled)
143 {
144  setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing, enabled);
145  if (mIsAntialiasing != enabled)
146  {
147  mIsAntialiasing = enabled;
148  if (!mModes.testFlag(pmVectorized)) // antialiasing half-pixel shift only needed for rasterized outputs
149  {
150  if (mIsAntialiasing)
151  translate(0.5, 0.5);
152  else
153  translate(-0.5, -0.5);
154  }
155  }
156 }
157 
162 void QCPPainter::setModes(QCPPainter::PainterModes modes)
163 {
164  mModes = modes;
165 }
166 
178 bool QCPPainter::begin(QPaintDevice *device)
179 {
180  bool result = QPainter::begin(device);
181 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0) // before Qt5, default pens used to be cosmetic if NonCosmeticDefaultPen flag isn't set. So we set it to get consistency across Qt versions.
182  if (result)
183  setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefaultPen);
184 #endif
185  return result;
186 }
187 
193 void QCPPainter::setMode(QCPPainter::PainterMode mode, bool enabled)
194 {
195  if (!enabled && mModes.testFlag(mode))
196  mModes &= ~mode;
197  else if (enabled && !mModes.testFlag(mode))
198  mModes |= mode;
199 }
200 
209 void QCPPainter::save()
210 {
211  mAntialiasingStack.push(mIsAntialiasing);
212  QPainter::save();
213 }
214 
223 void QCPPainter::restore()
224 {
225  if (!mAntialiasingStack.isEmpty())
226  mIsAntialiasing = mAntialiasingStack.pop();
227  else
228  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Unbalanced save/restore";
229  QPainter::restore();
230 }
231 
236 void QCPPainter::makeNonCosmetic()
237 {
238  if (qFuzzyIsNull(pen().widthF()))
239  {
240  QPen p = pen();
241  p.setWidth(1);
242  QPainter::setPen(p);
243  }
244 }

341 QCPScatterStyle::QCPScatterStyle() :
342  mSize(6),
343  mShape(ssNone),
344  mPen(Qt::NoPen),
345  mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
346  mPenDefined(false)
347 {
348 }

407 QCPScatterStyle::QCPScatterStyle(ScatterShape shape, const QPen &pen, const QBrush &brush, double size) :
408  mSize(size),

410  mPen(pen),
411  mBrush(brush),
412  mPenDefined(pen.style() != Qt::NoPen)
413 {

440  mSize(size),

442  mPen(pen),
443  mBrush(brush),

507  mPixmap = pixmap;

515 void QCPScatterStyle::setCustomPath(const QPainterPath &customPath)
516 {
517  setShape(ssCustom);
518  mCustomPath = customPath;
519 }
520 
530 void QCPScatterStyle::applyTo(QCPPainter *painter, const QPen &defaultPen) const
531 {
532  painter->setPen(mPenDefined ? mPen : defaultPen);
533  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
534 }
535 
544 void QCPScatterStyle::drawShape(QCPPainter *painter, QPointF pos) const
545 {
546  drawShape(painter, pos.x(), pos.y());
547 }
548 
552 void QCPScatterStyle::drawShape(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y) const
553 {
554  double w = mSize/2.0;
555  switch (mShape)
556  {
557  case ssNone: break;
558  case ssDot:
559  {
560  painter->drawLine(QPointF(x, y), QPointF(x+0.0001, y));
561  break;
562  }
563  case ssCross:
564  {
565  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-w, x+w, y+w));
566  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+w, x+w, y-w));
567  break;
568  }
569  case ssPlus:
570  {
571  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
572  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
573  break;
574  }
575  case ssCircle:
576  {
577  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x , y), w, w);
578  break;
579  }
580  case ssDisc:
581  {
582  QBrush b = painter->brush();
583  painter->setBrush(painter->pen().color());
584  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x , y), w, w);
585  painter->setBrush(b);
586  break;
587  }
588  case ssSquare:
589  {
590  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
591  break;
592  }
593  case ssDiamond:
594  {
595  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x, y-w));
596  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y-w, x+w, y));
597  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+w, y, x, y+w));
598  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x-w, y));
599  break;
600  }
601  case ssStar:
602  {
603  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
604  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
605  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y-w*0.707, x+w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
606  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y+w*0.707, x+w*0.707, y-w*0.707));
607  break;
608  }
609  case ssTriangle:
610  {
611  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+0.755*w, x+w, y+0.755*w));
612  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+w, y+0.755*w, x, y-0.977*w));
613  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y-0.977*w, x-w, y+0.755*w));
614  break;
615  }
616  case ssTriangleInverted:
617  {
618  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-0.755*w, x+w, y-0.755*w));
619  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+w, y-0.755*w, x, y+0.977*w));
620  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+0.977*w, x-w, y-0.755*w));
621  break;
622  }
623  case ssCrossSquare:
624  {
625  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-w, x+w*0.95, y+w*0.95));
626  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+w*0.95, x+w*0.95, y-w));
627  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
628  break;
629  }
630  case ssPlusSquare:
631  {
632  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w*0.95, y));
633  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
634  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
635  break;
636  }
637  case ssCrossCircle:
638  {
639  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y-w*0.707, x+w*0.670, y+w*0.670));
640  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y+w*0.670, x+w*0.670, y-w*0.707));
641  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
642  break;
643  }
644  case ssPlusCircle:
645  {
646  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
647  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
648  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
649  break;
650  }
651  case ssPeace:
652  {
653  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y-w, x, y+w));
654  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y, x-w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
655  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y, x+w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
656  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
657  break;
658  }
659  case ssPixmap:
660  {
661  painter->drawPixmap(x-mPixmap.width()*0.5, y-mPixmap.height()*0.5, mPixmap);
662  break;
663  }
664  case ssCustom:
665  {
666  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
667  painter->translate(x, y);
668  painter->scale(mSize/6.0, mSize/6.0);
669  painter->drawPath(mCustomPath);
670  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
671  break;
672  }
673  }
674 }

739 /* end documentation of inline functions */
740 
749 QCPLayer::QCPLayer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &layerName) :
750  QObject(parentPlot),
751  mParentPlot(parentPlot),
752  mName(layerName),
753  mIndex(-1), // will be set to a proper value by the QCustomPlot layer creation function
754  mVisible(true)
755 {
756  // Note: no need to make sure layerName is unique, because layer
757  // management is done with QCustomPlot functions.
758 }
759 
760 QCPLayer::~QCPLayer()
761 {
762  // If child layerables are still on this layer, detach them, so they don't try to reach back to this
763  // then invalid layer once they get deleted/moved themselves. This only happens when layers are deleted
764  // directly, like in the QCustomPlot destructor. (The regular layer removal procedure for the user is to
765  // call QCustomPlot::removeLayer, which moves all layerables off this layer before deleting it.)
766 
767  while (!mChildren.isEmpty())
768  mChildren.last()->setLayer(0); // removes itself from mChildren via removeChild()
769 
770  if (mParentPlot->currentLayer() == this)
771  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "The parent plot's mCurrentLayer will be a dangling pointer. Should have been set to a valid layer or 0 beforehand.";
772 }
773 
782 void QCPLayer::setVisible(bool visible)
783 {
784  mVisible = visible;
785 }
786 
797 void QCPLayer::addChild(QCPLayerable *layerable, bool prepend)
798 {
799  if (!mChildren.contains(layerable))
800  {
801  if (prepend)
802  mChildren.prepend(layerable);
803  else
804  mChildren.append(layerable);
805  } else
806  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layerable is already child of this layer" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layerable);
807 }
808 
818 void QCPLayer::removeChild(QCPLayerable *layerable)
819 {
820  if (!mChildren.removeOne(layerable))
821  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layerable is not child of this layer" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layerable);
822 }
823

901 
910 /* end documentation of signals */
911 
930 QCPLayerable::QCPLayerable(QCustomPlot *plot, QString targetLayer, QCPLayerable *parentLayerable) :
931  QObject(plot),
932  mVisible(true),
933  mParentPlot(plot),
934  mParentLayerable(parentLayerable),
935  mLayer(0),
936  mAntialiased(true)
937 {
938  if (mParentPlot)
939  {
940  if (targetLayer.isEmpty())
941  setLayer(mParentPlot->currentLayer());
942  else if (!setLayer(targetLayer))
943  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "setting QCPlayerable initial layer to" << targetLayer << "failed.";
944  }
945 }
946 
947 QCPLayerable::~QCPLayerable()
948 {
949  if (mLayer)
950  {
951  mLayer->removeChild(this);
952  mLayer = 0;
953  }
954 }
955 
961 void QCPLayerable::setVisible(bool on)
962 {
963  mVisible = on;
964 }
965 
972 bool QCPLayerable::setLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
973 {
974  return moveToLayer(layer, false);
975 }
976 
982 bool QCPLayerable::setLayer(const QString &layerName)
983 {
984  if (!mParentPlot)
985  {
986  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent QCustomPlot set";
987  return false;
988  }
989  if (QCPLayer *layer = mParentPlot->layer(layerName))
990  {
991  return setLayer(layer);
992  } else
993  {
994  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "there is no layer with name" << layerName;
995  return false;
996  }
997 }
998 
1005 void QCPLayerable::setAntialiased(bool enabled)
1006 {
1007  mAntialiased = enabled;
1008 }
1009 
1023 bool QCPLayerable::realVisibility() const
1024 {
1025  return mVisible && (!mLayer || mLayer->visible()) && (!mParentLayerable || mParentLayerable.data()->realVisibility());
1026 }
1027 
1062 double QCPLayerable::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
1063 {
1064  Q_UNUSED(pos)
1065  Q_UNUSED(onlySelectable)
1066  Q_UNUSED(details)
1067  return -1.0;
1068 }
1069 
1087 void QCPLayerable::initializeParentPlot(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
1088 {
1089  if (mParentPlot)
1090  {
1091  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called with mParentPlot already initialized";
1092  return;
1093  }
1094 
1095  if (!parentPlot)
1096  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called with parentPlot zero";
1097 
1098  mParentPlot = parentPlot;
1099  parentPlotInitialized(mParentPlot);
1100 }
1101 
1113 void QCPLayerable::setParentLayerable(QCPLayerable *parentLayerable)
1114 {
1115  mParentLayerable = parentLayerable;
1116 }
1117 
1126 bool QCPLayerable::moveToLayer(QCPLayer *layer, bool prepend)
1127 {
1128  if (layer && !mParentPlot)
1129  {
1130  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent QCustomPlot set";
1131  return false;
1132  }
1133  if (layer && layer->parentPlot() != mParentPlot)
1134  {
1135  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer" << layer->name() << "is not in same QCustomPlot as this layerable";
1136  return false;
1137  }
1138 
1139  QCPLayer *oldLayer = mLayer;
1140  if (mLayer)
1141  mLayer->removeChild(this);
1142  mLayer = layer;
1143  if (mLayer)
1144  mLayer->addChild(this, prepend);
1145  if (mLayer != oldLayer)
1146  emit layerChanged(mLayer);
1147  return true;
1148 }
1149 
1157 void QCPLayerable::applyAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter, bool localAntialiased, QCP::AntialiasedElement overrideElement) const
1158 {
1159  if (mParentPlot && mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements().testFlag(overrideElement))
1160  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
1161  else if (mParentPlot && mParentPlot->antialiasedElements().testFlag(overrideElement))
1162  painter->setAntialiasing(true);
1163  else
1164  painter->setAntialiasing(localAntialiased);
1165 }
1166 
1183 void QCPLayerable::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
1184 {
1185  Q_UNUSED(parentPlot)
1186 }
1187 
1199 QCP::Interaction QCPLayerable::selectionCategory() const
1200 {
1201  return QCP::iSelectOther;
1202 }
1203 
1213 QRect QCPLayerable::clipRect() const
1214 {
1215  if (mParentPlot)
1216  return mParentPlot->viewport();
1217  else
1218  return QRect();
1219 }

1250 {
1251  Q_UNUSED(event)
1252  Q_UNUSED(additive)
1253  Q_UNUSED(details)
1254  Q_UNUSED(selectionStateChanged)
1255 }

1269 void QCPLayerable::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
1270 {
1271  Q_UNUSED(selectionStateChanged)
1272 }

1278 
1293 const double QCPRange::minRange = 1e-280;
1294 
1303 const double QCPRange::maxRange = 1e250;
1304 
1308 QCPRange::QCPRange() :
1309  lower(0),
1310  upper(0)
1311 {
1312 }
1313 
1317 QCPRange::QCPRange(double lower, double upper) :
1318  lower(lower),
1319  upper(upper)
1320 {
1321  normalize();
1322 }
1323 
1327 double QCPRange::size() const
1328 {
1329  return upper-lower;
1330 }
1331 
1335 double QCPRange::center() const
1336 {
1337  return (upper+lower)*0.5;
1338 }
1339 
1344 void QCPRange::normalize()
1345 {
1346  if (lower > upper)
1347  qSwap(lower, upper);
1348 }
1349 
1358 void QCPRange::expand(const QCPRange &otherRange)
1359 {
1360  if (lower > otherRange.lower)
1361  lower = otherRange.lower;
1362  if (upper < otherRange.upper)
1363  upper = otherRange.upper;
1364 }
1365 
1366 
1373 QCPRange QCPRange::expanded(const QCPRange &otherRange) const
1374 {
1375  QCPRange result = *this;
1376  result.expand(otherRange);
1377  return result;
1378 }
1379 
1392 QCPRange QCPRange::sanitizedForLogScale() const
1393 {
1394  double rangeFac = 1e-3;
1395  QCPRange sanitizedRange(lower, upper);
1396  sanitizedRange.normalize();
1397  // can't have range spanning negative and positive values in log plot, so change range to fix it
1398  //if (qFuzzyCompare(sanitizedRange.lower+1, 1) && !qFuzzyCompare(sanitizedRange.upper+1, 1))
1399  if (sanitizedRange.lower == 0.0 && sanitizedRange.upper != 0.0)
1400  {
1401  // case lower is 0
1402  if (rangeFac < sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac)
1403  sanitizedRange.lower = rangeFac;
1404  else
1405  sanitizedRange.lower = sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac;
1406  } //else if (!qFuzzyCompare(lower+1, 1) && qFuzzyCompare(upper+1, 1))
1407  else if (sanitizedRange.lower != 0.0 && sanitizedRange.upper == 0.0)
1408  {
1409  // case upper is 0
1410  if (-rangeFac > sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac)
1411  sanitizedRange.upper = -rangeFac;
1412  else
1413  sanitizedRange.upper = sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac;
1414  } else if (sanitizedRange.lower < 0 && sanitizedRange.upper > 0)
1415  {
1416  // find out whether negative or positive interval is wider to decide which sign domain will be chosen
1417  if (-sanitizedRange.lower > sanitizedRange.upper)
1418  {
1419  // negative is wider, do same as in case upper is 0
1420  if (-rangeFac > sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac)
1421  sanitizedRange.upper = -rangeFac;
1422  else
1423  sanitizedRange.upper = sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac;
1424  } else
1425  {
1426  // positive is wider, do same as in case lower is 0
1427  if (rangeFac < sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac)
1428  sanitizedRange.lower = rangeFac;
1429  else
1430  sanitizedRange.lower = sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac;
1431  }
1432  }
1433  // due to normalization, case lower>0 && upper<0 should never occur, because that implies upper<lower
1434  return sanitizedRange;
1435 }
1436 
1441 QCPRange QCPRange::sanitizedForLinScale() const
1442 {
1443  QCPRange sanitizedRange(lower, upper);
1444  sanitizedRange.normalize();
1445  return sanitizedRange;
1446 }
1447 
1451 bool QCPRange::contains(double value) const
1452 {
1453  return value >= lower && value <= upper;
1454 }
1455 
1464 bool QCPRange::validRange(double lower, double upper)
1465 {
1466  /*
1467  return (lower > -maxRange &&
1468  upper < maxRange &&
1469  qAbs(lower-upper) > minRange &&
1470  (lower < -minRange || lower > minRange) &&
1471  (upper < -minRange || upper > minRange));
1472  */
1473  return (lower > -maxRange &&
1474  upper < maxRange &&
1475  qAbs(lower-upper) > minRange &&
1476  qAbs(lower-upper) < maxRange);
1477 }
1478 
1488 bool QCPRange::validRange(const QCPRange &range)
1489 {
1490  /*
1491  return (range.lower > -maxRange &&
1492  range.upper < maxRange &&
1493  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) > minRange &&
1494  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) < maxRange &&
1495  (range.lower < -minRange || range.lower > minRange) &&
1496  (range.upper < -minRange || range.upper > minRange));
1497  */
1498  return (range.lower > -maxRange &&
1499  range.upper < maxRange &&
1500  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) > minRange &&
1501  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) < maxRange);
1502 }
1503 
1504 
1620 
1660 /* start documentation of inline functions */
1661 
1668 /* end documentation of inline functions */
1669 
1673 QCPMarginGroup::QCPMarginGroup(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
1674  QObject(parentPlot),
1675  mParentPlot(parentPlot)
1676 {
1677  mChildren.insert(QCP::msLeft, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1678  mChildren.insert(QCP::msRight, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1679  mChildren.insert(QCP::msTop, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1680  mChildren.insert(QCP::msBottom, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1681 }
1682 
1683 QCPMarginGroup::~QCPMarginGroup()
1684 {
1685  clear();
1686 }
1687 
1692 bool QCPMarginGroup::isEmpty() const
1693 {
1694  QHashIterator<QCP::MarginSide, QList<QCPLayoutElement*> > it(mChildren);
1695  while (it.hasNext())
1696  {
1697  it.next();
1698  if (!it.value().isEmpty())
1699  return false;
1700  }
1701  return true;
1702 }
1703 
1708 void QCPMarginGroup::clear()
1709 {
1710  // make all children remove themselves from this margin group:
1711  QHashIterator<QCP::MarginSide, QList<QCPLayoutElement*> > it(mChildren);
1712  while (it.hasNext())
1713  {
1714  it.next();
1715  const QList<QCPLayoutElement*> elements = it.value();
1716  for (int i=elements.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
1717  elements.at(i)->setMarginGroup(it.key(), 0); // removes itself from mChildren via removeChild
1718  }
1719 }
1720 
1731 int QCPMarginGroup::commonMargin(QCP::MarginSide side) const
1732 {
1733  // query all automatic margins of the layout elements in this margin group side and find maximum:
1734  int result = 0;
1735  const QList<QCPLayoutElement*> elements = mChildren.value(side);
1736  for (int i=0; i<elements.size(); ++i)
1737  {
1738  if (!elements.at(i)->autoMargins().testFlag(side))
1739  continue;
1740  int m = qMax(elements.at(i)->calculateAutoMargin(side), QCP::getMarginValue(elements.at(i)->minimumMargins(), side));
1741  if (m > result)
1742  result = m;
1743  }
1744  return result;
1745 }
1746 
1753 void QCPMarginGroup::addChild(QCP::MarginSide side, QCPLayoutElement *element)
1754 {
1755  if (!mChildren[side].contains(element))
1756  mChildren[side].append(element);
1757  else
1758  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "element is already child of this margin group side" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(element);
1759 }
1760 
1767 void QCPMarginGroup::removeChild(QCP::MarginSide side, QCPLayoutElement *element)
1768 {
1769  if (!mChildren[side].removeOne(element))
1770  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "element is not child of this margin group side" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(element);
1771 }
1772 
1773 
1777 
1804 /* start documentation of inline functions */
1805 
1853 /* end documentation of inline functions */
1854 
1858 QCPLayoutElement::QCPLayoutElement(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
1859  QCPLayerable(parentPlot), // parenthood is changed as soon as layout element gets inserted into a layout (except for top level layout)
1860  mParentLayout(0),
1861  mMinimumSize(),
1862  mMaximumSize(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX, QWIDGETSIZE_MAX),
1863  mRect(0, 0, 0, 0),
1864  mOuterRect(0, 0, 0, 0),
1865  mMargins(0, 0, 0, 0),
1866  mMinimumMargins(0, 0, 0, 0),
1867  mAutoMargins(QCP::msAll)
1868 {
1869 }
1870 
1871 QCPLayoutElement::~QCPLayoutElement()
1872 {
1873  setMarginGroup(QCP::msAll, 0); // unregister at margin groups, if there are any
1874  // unregister at layout:
1875  if (qobject_cast<QCPLayout*>(mParentLayout)) // the qobject_cast is just a safeguard in case the layout forgets to call clear() in its dtor and this dtor is called by QObject dtor
1876  mParentLayout->take(this);
1877 }
1878 
1890 void QCPLayoutElement::setOuterRect(const QRect &rect)
1891 {
1892  if (mOuterRect != rect)
1893  {
1894  mOuterRect = rect;
1895  mRect = mOuterRect.adjusted(mMargins.left(), mMargins.top(), -mMargins.right(), -mMargins.bottom());
1896  }
1897 }
1898 
1910 void QCPLayoutElement::setMargins(const QMargins &margins)
1911 {
1912  if (mMargins != margins)
1913  {
1914  mMargins = margins;
1915  mRect = mOuterRect.adjusted(mMargins.left(), mMargins.top(), -mMargins.right(), -mMargins.bottom());
1916  }
1917 }
1918 
1928 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumMargins(const QMargins &margins)
1929 {
1930  if (mMinimumMargins != margins)
1931  {
1932  mMinimumMargins = margins;
1933  }
1934 }
1935 
1946 void QCPLayoutElement::setAutoMargins(QCP::MarginSides sides)
1947 {
1948  mAutoMargins = sides;
1949 }
1950 
1960 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumSize(const QSize &size)
1961 {
1962  if (mMinimumSize != size)
1963  {
1964  mMinimumSize = size;
1965  if (mParentLayout)
1966  mParentLayout->sizeConstraintsChanged();
1967  }
1968 }
1969 
1974 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumSize(int width, int height)
1975 {
1976  setMinimumSize(QSize(width, height));
1977 }
1978 
1983 void QCPLayoutElement::setMaximumSize(const QSize &size)
1984 {
1985  if (mMaximumSize != size)
1986  {
1987  mMaximumSize = size;
1988  if (mParentLayout)
1989  mParentLayout->sizeConstraintsChanged();
1990  }
1991 }
1992 
1997 void QCPLayoutElement::setMaximumSize(int width, int height)
1998 {
1999  setMaximumSize(QSize(width, height));
2000 }
2001 
2013 void QCPLayoutElement::setMarginGroup(QCP::MarginSides sides, QCPMarginGroup *group)
2014 {
2015  QVector<QCP::MarginSide> sideVector;
2016  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msLeft)) sideVector.append(QCP::msLeft);
2017  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msRight)) sideVector.append(QCP::msRight);
2018  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msTop)) sideVector.append(QCP::msTop);
2019  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msBottom)) sideVector.append(QCP::msBottom);
2020 
2021  for (int i=0; i<sideVector.size(); ++i)
2022  {
2023  QCP::MarginSide side = sideVector.at(i);
2024  if (marginGroup(side) != group)
2025  {
2026  QCPMarginGroup *oldGroup = marginGroup(side);
2027  if (oldGroup) // unregister at old group
2028  oldGroup->removeChild(side, this);
2029 
2030  if (!group) // if setting to 0, remove hash entry. Else set hash entry to new group and register there
2031  {
2032  mMarginGroups.remove(side);
2033  } else // setting to a new group
2034  {
2035  mMarginGroups[side] = group;
2036  group->addChild(side, this);
2037  }
2038  }
2039  }
2040 }
2041 
2054 void QCPLayoutElement::update(UpdatePhase phase)
2055 {
2056  if (phase == upMargins)
2057  {
2058  if (mAutoMargins != QCP::msNone)
2059  {
2060  // set the margins of this layout element according to automatic margin calculation, either directly or via a margin group:
2061  QMargins newMargins = mMargins;
2062  foreach (QCP::MarginSide side, QList<QCP::MarginSide>() << QCP::msLeft << QCP::msRight << QCP::msTop << QCP::msBottom)
2063  {
2064  if (mAutoMargins.testFlag(side)) // this side's margin shall be calculated automatically
2065  {
2066  if (mMarginGroups.contains(side))
2067  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side, mMarginGroups[side]->commonMargin(side)); // this side is part of a margin group, so get the margin value from that group
2068  else
2069  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side, calculateAutoMargin(side)); // this side is not part of a group, so calculate the value directly
2070  // apply minimum margin restrictions:
2071  if (QCP::getMarginValue(newMargins, side) < QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side))
2072  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side, QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side));
2073  }
2074  }
2075  setMargins(newMargins);
2076  }
2077  }
2078 }
2079 
2087 QSize QCPLayoutElement::minimumSizeHint() const
2088 {
2089  return mMinimumSize;
2090 }
2091 
2099 QSize QCPLayoutElement::maximumSizeHint() const
2100 {
2101  return mMaximumSize;
2102 }
2103 
2111 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPLayoutElement::elements(bool recursive) const
2112 {
2113  Q_UNUSED(recursive)
2114  return QList<QCPLayoutElement*>();
2115 }
2116 
2128 double QCPLayoutElement::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
2129 {
2130  Q_UNUSED(details)
2131 
2132  if (onlySelectable)
2133  return -1;
2134 
2135  if (QRectF(mOuterRect).contains(pos))
2136  {
2137  if (mParentPlot)
2138  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
2139  else
2140  {
2141  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "parent plot not defined";
2142  return -1;
2143  }
2144  } else
2145  return -1;
2146 }
2147 
2153 void QCPLayoutElement::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
2154 {
2155  foreach (QCPLayoutElement* el, elements(false))
2156  {
2157  if (!el->parentPlot())
2158  el->initializeParentPlot(parentPlot);
2159  }
2160 }
2161 
2171 int QCPLayoutElement::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side)
2172 {
2173  return qMax(QCP::getMarginValue(mMargins, side), QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side));
2174 }
2175 
2179 
2203 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
2204 
2247 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
2248 
2253 QCPLayout::QCPLayout()
2254 {
2255 }
2256 
2265 void QCPLayout::update(UpdatePhase phase)
2266 {
2267  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
2268 
2269  // set child element rects according to layout:
2270  if (phase == upLayout)
2271  updateLayout();
2272 
2273  // propagate update call to child elements:
2274  const int elCount = elementCount();
2275  for (int i=0; i<elCount; ++i)
2276  {
2277  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(i))
2278  el->update(phase);
2279  }
2280 }
2281 
2282 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2283 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPLayout::elements(bool recursive) const
2284 {
2285  const int c = elementCount();
2286  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
2287 #if QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0)
2288  result.reserve(c);
2289 #endif
2290  for (int i=0; i<c; ++i)
2291  result.append(elementAt(i));
2292  if (recursive)
2293  {
2294  for (int i=0; i<c; ++i)
2295  {
2296  if (result.at(i))
2297  result << result.at(i)->elements(recursive);
2298  }
2299  }
2300  return result;
2301 }
2302 
2310 void QCPLayout::simplify()
2311 {
2312 }
2313 
2323 bool QCPLayout::removeAt(int index)
2324 {
2325  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = takeAt(index))
2326  {
2327  delete el;
2328  return true;
2329  } else
2330  return false;
2331 }
2332 
2342 bool QCPLayout::remove(QCPLayoutElement *element)
2343 {
2344  if (take(element))
2345  {
2346  delete element;
2347  return true;
2348  } else
2349  return false;
2350 }
2351 
2357 void QCPLayout::clear()
2358 {
2359  for (int i=elementCount()-1; i>=0; --i)
2360  {
2361  if (elementAt(i))
2362  removeAt(i);
2363  }
2364  simplify();
2365 }
2366 
2375 void QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged() const
2376 {
2377  if (QWidget *w = qobject_cast<QWidget*>(parent()))
2378  w->updateGeometry();
2379  else if (QCPLayout *l = qobject_cast<QCPLayout*>(parent()))
2380  l->sizeConstraintsChanged();
2381 }
2382 
2395 void QCPLayout::updateLayout()
2396 {
2397 }
2398 
2399 
2412 void QCPLayout::adoptElement(QCPLayoutElement *el)
2413 {
2414  if (el)
2415  {
2416  el->mParentLayout = this;
2417  el->setParentLayerable(this);
2418  el->setParent(this);
2419  if (!el->parentPlot())
2420  el->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
2421  } else
2422  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Null element passed";
2423 }
2424 
2435 void QCPLayout::releaseElement(QCPLayoutElement *el)
2436 {
2437  if (el)
2438  {
2439  el->mParentLayout = 0;
2440  el->setParentLayerable(0);
2441  el->setParent(mParentPlot);
2442  // Note: Don't initializeParentPlot(0) here, because layout element will stay in same parent plot
2443  } else
2444  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Null element passed";
2445 }
2446 
2476 QVector<int> QCPLayout::getSectionSizes(QVector<int> maxSizes, QVector<int> minSizes, QVector<double> stretchFactors, int totalSize) const
2477 {
2478  if (maxSizes.size() != minSizes.size() || minSizes.size() != stretchFactors.size())
2479  {
2480  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed vector sizes aren't equal:" << maxSizes << minSizes << stretchFactors;
2481  return QVector<int>();
2482  }
2483  if (stretchFactors.isEmpty())
2484  return QVector<int>();
2485  int sectionCount = stretchFactors.size();
2486  QVector<double> sectionSizes(sectionCount);
2487  // if provided total size is forced smaller than total minimum size, ignore minimum sizes (squeeze sections):
2488  int minSizeSum = 0;
2489  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2490  minSizeSum += minSizes.at(i);
2491  if (totalSize < minSizeSum)
2492  {
2493  // new stretch factors are minimum sizes and minimum sizes are set to zero:
2494  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2495  {
2496  stretchFactors[i] = minSizes.at(i);
2497  minSizes[i] = 0;
2498  }
2499  }
2500 
2501  QList<int> minimumLockedSections;
2502  QList<int> unfinishedSections;
2503  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2504  unfinishedSections.append(i);
2505  double freeSize = totalSize;
2506 
2507  int outerIterations = 0;
2508  while (!unfinishedSections.isEmpty() && outerIterations < sectionCount*2) // the iteration check ist just a failsafe in case something really strange happens
2509  {
2510  ++outerIterations;
2511  int innerIterations = 0;
2512  while (!unfinishedSections.isEmpty() && innerIterations < sectionCount*2) // the iteration check ist just a failsafe in case something really strange happens
2513  {
2514  ++innerIterations;
2515  // find section that hits its maximum next:
2516  int nextId = -1;
2517  double nextMax = 1e12;
2518  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2519  {
2520  int secId = unfinishedSections.at(i);
2521  double hitsMaxAt = (maxSizes.at(secId)-sectionSizes.at(secId))/stretchFactors.at(secId);
2522  if (hitsMaxAt < nextMax)
2523  {
2524  nextMax = hitsMaxAt;
2525  nextId = secId;
2526  }
2527  }
2528  // check if that maximum is actually within the bounds of the total size (i.e. can we stretch all remaining sections so far that the found section
2529  // actually hits its maximum, without exceeding the total size when we add up all sections)
2530  double stretchFactorSum = 0;
2531  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2532  stretchFactorSum += stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i));
2533  double nextMaxLimit = freeSize/stretchFactorSum;
2534  if (nextMax < nextMaxLimit) // next maximum is actually hit, move forward to that point and fix the size of that section
2535  {
2536  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2537  {
2538  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] += nextMax*stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i)); // increment all sections
2539  freeSize -= nextMax*stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i));
2540  }
2541  unfinishedSections.removeOne(nextId); // exclude the section that is now at maximum from further changes
2542  } else // next maximum isn't hit, just distribute rest of free space on remaining sections
2543  {
2544  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2545  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] += nextMaxLimit*stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i)); // increment all sections
2546  unfinishedSections.clear();
2547  }
2548  }
2549  if (innerIterations == sectionCount*2)
2550  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Exceeded maximum expected inner iteration count, layouting aborted. Input was:" << maxSizes << minSizes << stretchFactors << totalSize;
2551 
2552  // now check whether the resulting section sizes violate minimum restrictions:
2553  bool foundMinimumViolation = false;
2554  for (int i=0; i<sectionSizes.size(); ++i)
2555  {
2556  if (minimumLockedSections.contains(i))
2557  continue;
2558  if (sectionSizes.at(i) < minSizes.at(i)) // section violates minimum
2559  {
2560  sectionSizes[i] = minSizes.at(i); // set it to minimum
2561  foundMinimumViolation = true; // make sure we repeat the whole optimization process
2562  minimumLockedSections.append(i);
2563  }
2564  }
2565  if (foundMinimumViolation)
2566  {
2567  freeSize = totalSize;
2568  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2569  {
2570  if (!minimumLockedSections.contains(i)) // only put sections that haven't hit their minimum back into the pool
2571  unfinishedSections.append(i);
2572  else
2573  freeSize -= sectionSizes.at(i); // remove size of minimum locked sections from available space in next round
2574  }
2575  // reset all section sizes to zero that are in unfinished sections (all others have been set to their minimum):
2576  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2577  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] = 0;
2578  }
2579  }
2580  if (outerIterations == sectionCount*2)
2581  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Exceeded maximum expected outer iteration count, layouting aborted. Input was:" << maxSizes << minSizes << stretchFactors << totalSize;
2582 
2583  QVector<int> result(sectionCount);
2584  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2585  result[i] = qRound(sectionSizes.at(i));
2586  return result;
2587 }
2588 
2589 
2593 
2613 QCPLayoutGrid::QCPLayoutGrid() :
2614  mColumnSpacing(5),
2615  mRowSpacing(5)
2616 {
2617 }
2618 
2619 QCPLayoutGrid::~QCPLayoutGrid()
2620 {
2621  // clear all child layout elements. This is important because only the specific layouts know how
2622  // to handle removing elements (clear calls virtual removeAt method to do that).
2623  clear();
2624 }
2625 
2634 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::element(int row, int column) const
2635 {
2636  if (row >= 0 && row < mElements.size())
2637  {
2638  if (column >= 0 && column < mElements.first().size())
2639  {
2640  if (QCPLayoutElement *result = mElements.at(row).at(column))
2641  return result;
2642  else
2643  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Requested cell is empty. Row:" << row << "Column:" << column;
2644  } else
2645  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid column. Row:" << row << "Column:" << column;
2646  } else
2647  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid row. Row:" << row << "Column:" << column;
2648  return 0;
2649 }
2650 
2656 int QCPLayoutGrid::rowCount() const
2657 {
2658  return mElements.size();
2659 }
2660 
2666 int QCPLayoutGrid::columnCount() const
2667 {
2668  if (mElements.size() > 0)
2669  return mElements.first().size();
2670  else
2671  return 0;
2672 }
2673 
2684 bool QCPLayoutGrid::addElement(int row, int column, QCPLayoutElement *element)
2685 {
2686  if (element)
2687  {
2688  if (!hasElement(row, column))
2689  {
2690  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
2691  element->layout()->take(element);
2692  expandTo(row+1, column+1);
2693  mElements[row][column] = element;
2694  adoptElement(element);
2695  return true;
2696  } else
2697  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "There is already an element in the specified row/column:" << row << column;
2698  } else
2699  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element to row/column:" << row << column;
2700  return false;
2701 }
2702 
2709 bool QCPLayoutGrid::hasElement(int row, int column)
2710 {
2711  if (row >= 0 && row < rowCount() && column >= 0 && column < columnCount())
2712  return mElements.at(row).at(column);
2713  else
2714  return false;
2715 }
2716 
2728 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnStretchFactor(int column, double factor)
2729 {
2730  if (column >= 0 && column < columnCount())
2731  {
2732  if (factor > 0)
2733  mColumnStretchFactors[column] = factor;
2734  else
2735  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << factor;
2736  } else
2737  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid column:" << column;
2738 }
2739 
2751 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnStretchFactors(const QList<double> &factors)
2752 {
2753  if (factors.size() == mColumnStretchFactors.size())
2754  {
2755  mColumnStretchFactors = factors;
2756  for (int i=0; i<mColumnStretchFactors.size(); ++i)
2757  {
2758  if (mColumnStretchFactors.at(i) <= 0)
2759  {
2760  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << mColumnStretchFactors.at(i);
2761  mColumnStretchFactors[i] = 1;
2762  }
2763  }
2764  } else
2765  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Column count not equal to passed stretch factor count:" << factors;
2766 }
2767 
2779 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowStretchFactor(int row, double factor)
2780 {
2781  if (row >= 0 && row < rowCount())
2782  {
2783  if (factor > 0)
2784  mRowStretchFactors[row] = factor;
2785  else
2786  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << factor;
2787  } else
2788  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid row:" << row;
2789 }
2790 
2802 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowStretchFactors(const QList<double> &factors)
2803 {
2804  if (factors.size() == mRowStretchFactors.size())
2805  {
2806  mRowStretchFactors = factors;
2807  for (int i=0; i<mRowStretchFactors.size(); ++i)
2808  {
2809  if (mRowStretchFactors.at(i) <= 0)
2810  {
2811  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << mRowStretchFactors.at(i);
2812  mRowStretchFactors[i] = 1;
2813  }
2814  }
2815  } else
2816  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Row count not equal to passed stretch factor count:" << factors;
2817 }
2818 
2824 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnSpacing(int pixels)
2825 {
2826  mColumnSpacing = pixels;
2827 }
2828 
2834 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowSpacing(int pixels)
2835 {
2836  mRowSpacing = pixels;
2837 }
2838 
2853 void QCPLayoutGrid::expandTo(int newRowCount, int newColumnCount)
2854 {
2855  // add rows as necessary:
2856  while (rowCount() < newRowCount)
2857  {
2858  mElements.append(QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
2859  mRowStretchFactors.append(1);
2860  }
2861  // go through rows and expand columns as necessary:
2862  int newColCount = qMax(columnCount(), newColumnCount);
2863  for (int i=0; i<rowCount(); ++i)
2864  {
2865  while (mElements.at(i).size() < newColCount)
2866  mElements[i].append(0);
2867  }
2868  while (mColumnStretchFactors.size() < newColCount)
2869  mColumnStretchFactors.append(1);
2870 }
2871 
2878 void QCPLayoutGrid::insertRow(int newIndex)
2879 {
2880  if (mElements.isEmpty() || mElements.first().isEmpty()) // if grid is completely empty, add first cell
2881  {
2882  expandTo(1, 1);
2883  return;
2884  }
2885 
2886  if (newIndex < 0)
2887  newIndex = 0;
2888  if (newIndex > rowCount())
2889  newIndex = rowCount();
2890 
2891  mRowStretchFactors.insert(newIndex, 1);
2892  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> newRow;
2893  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
2894  newRow.append((QCPLayoutElement*)0);
2895  mElements.insert(newIndex, newRow);
2896 }
2897 
2904 void QCPLayoutGrid::insertColumn(int newIndex)
2905 {
2906  if (mElements.isEmpty() || mElements.first().isEmpty()) // if grid is completely empty, add first cell
2907  {
2908  expandTo(1, 1);
2909  return;
2910  }
2911 
2912  if (newIndex < 0)
2913  newIndex = 0;
2914  if (newIndex > columnCount())
2915  newIndex = columnCount();
2916 
2917  mColumnStretchFactors.insert(newIndex, 1);
2918  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
2919  mElements[row].insert(newIndex, (QCPLayoutElement*)0);
2920 }
2921 
2922 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2923 void QCPLayoutGrid::updateLayout()
2924 {
2925  QVector<int> minColWidths, minRowHeights, maxColWidths, maxRowHeights;
2926  getMinimumRowColSizes(&minColWidths, &minRowHeights);
2927  getMaximumRowColSizes(&maxColWidths, &maxRowHeights);
2928 
2929  int totalRowSpacing = (rowCount()-1) * mRowSpacing;
2930  int totalColSpacing = (columnCount()-1) * mColumnSpacing;
2931  QVector<int> colWidths = getSectionSizes(maxColWidths, minColWidths, mColumnStretchFactors.toVector(), mRect.width()-totalColSpacing);
2932  QVector<int> rowHeights = getSectionSizes(maxRowHeights, minRowHeights, mRowStretchFactors.toVector(), mRect.height()-totalRowSpacing);
2933 
2934  // go through cells and set rects accordingly:
2935  int yOffset = mRect.top();
2936  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
2937  {
2938  if (row > 0)
2939  yOffset += rowHeights.at(row-1)+mRowSpacing;
2940  int xOffset = mRect.left();
2941  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
2942  {
2943  if (col > 0)
2944  xOffset += colWidths.at(col-1)+mColumnSpacing;
2945  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
2946  mElements.at(row).at(col)->setOuterRect(QRect(xOffset, yOffset, colWidths.at(col), rowHeights.at(row)));
2947  }
2948  }
2949 }
2950 
2951 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2952 int QCPLayoutGrid::elementCount() const
2953 {
2954  return rowCount()*columnCount();
2955 }
2956 
2957 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2958 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::elementAt(int index) const
2959 {
2960  if (index >= 0 && index < elementCount())
2961  return mElements.at(index / columnCount()).at(index % columnCount());
2962  else
2963  return 0;
2964 }
2965 
2966 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2967 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::takeAt(int index)
2968 {
2969  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(index))
2970  {
2971  releaseElement(el);
2972  mElements[index / columnCount()][index % columnCount()] = 0;
2973  return el;
2974  } else
2975  {
2976  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Attempt to take invalid index:" << index;
2977  return 0;
2978  }
2979 }
2980 
2981 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2982 bool QCPLayoutGrid::take(QCPLayoutElement *element)
2983 {
2984  if (element)
2985  {
2986  for (int i=0; i<elementCount(); ++i)
2987  {
2988  if (elementAt(i) == element)
2989  {
2990  takeAt(i);
2991  return true;
2992  }
2993  }
2994  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Element not in this layout, couldn't take";
2995  } else
2996  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't take null element";
2997  return false;
2998 }
2999 
3000 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3001 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPLayoutGrid::elements(bool recursive) const
3002 {
3003  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
3004  int colC = columnCount();
3005  int rowC = rowCount();
3006 #if QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0)
3007  result.reserve(colC*rowC);
3008 #endif
3009  for (int row=0; row<rowC; ++row)
3010  {
3011  for (int col=0; col<colC; ++col)
3012  {
3013  result.append(mElements.at(row).at(col));
3014  }
3015  }
3016  if (recursive)
3017  {
3018  int c = result.size();
3019  for (int i=0; i<c; ++i)
3020  {
3021  if (result.at(i))
3022  result << result.at(i)->elements(recursive);
3023  }
3024  }
3025  return result;
3026 }
3027 
3031 void QCPLayoutGrid::simplify()
3032 {
3033  // remove rows with only empty cells:
3034  for (int row=rowCount()-1; row>=0; --row)
3035  {
3036  bool hasElements = false;
3037  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
3038  {
3039  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
3040  {
3041  hasElements = true;
3042  break;
3043  }
3044  }
3045  if (!hasElements)
3046  {
3047  mRowStretchFactors.removeAt(row);
3048  mElements.removeAt(row);
3049  if (mElements.isEmpty()) // removed last element, also remove stretch factor (wouldn't happen below because also columnCount changed to 0 now)
3050  mColumnStretchFactors.clear();
3051  }
3052  }
3053 
3054  // remove columns with only empty cells:
3055  for (int col=columnCount()-1; col>=0; --col)
3056  {
3057  bool hasElements = false;
3058  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
3059  {
3060  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
3061  {
3062  hasElements = true;
3063  break;
3064  }
3065  }
3066  if (!hasElements)
3067  {
3068  mColumnStretchFactors.removeAt(col);
3069  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
3070  mElements[row].removeAt(col);
3071  }
3072  }
3073 }
3074 
3075 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3076 QSize QCPLayoutGrid::minimumSizeHint() const
3077 {
3078  QVector<int> minColWidths, minRowHeights;
3079  getMinimumRowColSizes(&minColWidths, &minRowHeights);
3080  QSize result(0, 0);
3081  for (int i=0; i<minColWidths.size(); ++i)
3082  result.rwidth() += minColWidths.at(i);
3083  for (int i=0; i<minRowHeights.size(); ++i)
3084  result.rheight() += minRowHeights.at(i);
3085  result.rwidth() += qMax(0, columnCount()-1) * mColumnSpacing + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
3086  result.rheight() += qMax(0, rowCount()-1) * mRowSpacing + mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
3087  return result;
3088 }
3089 
3090 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3091 QSize QCPLayoutGrid::maximumSizeHint() const
3092 {
3093  QVector<int> maxColWidths, maxRowHeights;
3094  getMaximumRowColSizes(&maxColWidths, &maxRowHeights);
3095 
3096  QSize result(0, 0);
3097  for (int i=0; i<maxColWidths.size(); ++i)
3098  result.setWidth(qMin(result.width()+maxColWidths.at(i), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX));
3099  for (int i=0; i<maxRowHeights.size(); ++i)
3100  result.setHeight(qMin(result.height()+maxRowHeights.at(i), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX));
3101  result.rwidth() += qMax(0, columnCount()-1) * mColumnSpacing + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
3102  result.rheight() += qMax(0, rowCount()-1) * mRowSpacing + mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
3103  return result;
3104 }
3105 
3118 void QCPLayoutGrid::getMinimumRowColSizes(QVector<int> *minColWidths, QVector<int> *minRowHeights) const
3119 {
3120  *minColWidths = QVector<int>(columnCount(), 0);
3121  *minRowHeights = QVector<int>(rowCount(), 0);
3122  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
3123  {
3124  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
3125  {
3126  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
3127  {
3128  QSize minHint = mElements.at(row).at(col)->minimumSizeHint();
3129  QSize min = mElements.at(row).at(col)->minimumSize();
3130  QSize final(min.width() > 0 ? min.width() : minHint.width(), min.height() > 0 ? min.height() : minHint.height());
3131  if (minColWidths->at(col) < final.width())
3132  (*minColWidths)[col] = final.width();
3133  if (minRowHeights->at(row) < final.height())
3134  (*minRowHeights)[row] = final.height();
3135  }
3136  }
3137  }
3138 }
3139 
3152 void QCPLayoutGrid::getMaximumRowColSizes(QVector<int> *maxColWidths, QVector<int> *maxRowHeights) const
3153 {
3154  *maxColWidths = QVector<int>(columnCount(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
3155  *maxRowHeights = QVector<int>(rowCount(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
3156  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
3157  {
3158  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
3159  {
3160  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
3161  {
3162  QSize maxHint = mElements.at(row).at(col)->maximumSizeHint();
3163  QSize max = mElements.at(row).at(col)->maximumSize();
3164  QSize final(max.width() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? max.width() : maxHint.width(), max.height() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? max.height() : maxHint.height());
3165  if (maxColWidths->at(col) > final.width())
3166  (*maxColWidths)[col] = final.width();
3167  if (maxRowHeights->at(row) > final.height())
3168  (*maxRowHeights)[row] = final.height();
3169  }
3170  }
3171  }
3172 }
3173 
3174 
3178 
3196 /* start documentation of inline functions */
3197 
3204 /* end documentation of inline functions */
3205 
3209 QCPLayoutInset::QCPLayoutInset()
3210 {
3211 }
3212 
3213 QCPLayoutInset::~QCPLayoutInset()
3214 {
3215  // clear all child layout elements. This is important because only the specific layouts know how
3216  // to handle removing elements (clear calls virtual removeAt method to do that).
3217  clear();
3218 }
3219 
3223 QCPLayoutInset::InsetPlacement QCPLayoutInset::insetPlacement(int index) const
3224 {
3225  if (elementAt(index))
3226  return mInsetPlacement.at(index);
3227  else
3228  {
3229  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3230  return ipFree;
3231  }
3232 }
3233 
3238 Qt::Alignment QCPLayoutInset::insetAlignment(int index) const
3239 {
3240  if (elementAt(index))
3241  return mInsetAlignment.at(index);
3242  else
3243  {
3244  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3245  return 0;
3246  }
3247 }
3248 
3253 QRectF QCPLayoutInset::insetRect(int index) const
3254 {
3255  if (elementAt(index))
3256  return mInsetRect.at(index);
3257  else
3258  {
3259  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3260  return QRectF();
3261  }
3262 }
3263 
3269 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetPlacement(int index, QCPLayoutInset::InsetPlacement placement)
3270 {
3271  if (elementAt(index))
3272  mInsetPlacement[index] = placement;
3273  else
3274  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3275 }
3276 
3285 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetAlignment(int index, Qt::Alignment alignment)
3286 {
3287  if (elementAt(index))
3288  mInsetAlignment[index] = alignment;
3289  else
3290  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3291 }
3292 
3304 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetRect(int index, const QRectF &rect)
3305 {
3306  if (elementAt(index))
3307  mInsetRect[index] = rect;
3308  else
3309  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3310 }
3311 
3312 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3313 void QCPLayoutInset::updateLayout()
3314 {
3315  for (int i=0; i<mElements.size(); ++i)
3316  {
3317  QRect insetRect;
3318  QSize finalMinSize, finalMaxSize;
3319  QSize minSizeHint = mElements.at(i)->minimumSizeHint();
3320  QSize maxSizeHint = mElements.at(i)->maximumSizeHint();
3321  finalMinSize.setWidth(mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().width() > 0 ? mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().width() : minSizeHint.width());
3322  finalMinSize.setHeight(mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().height() > 0 ? mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().height() : minSizeHint.height());
3323  finalMaxSize.setWidth(mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().width() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().width() : maxSizeHint.width());
3324  finalMaxSize.setHeight(mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().height() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().height() : maxSizeHint.height());
3325  if (mInsetPlacement.at(i) == ipFree)
3326  {
3327  insetRect = QRect(rect().x()+rect().width()*mInsetRect.at(i).x(),
3328  rect().y()+rect().height()*mInsetRect.at(i).y(),
3329  rect().width()*mInsetRect.at(i).width(),
3330  rect().height()*mInsetRect.at(i).height());
3331  if (insetRect.size().width() < finalMinSize.width())
3332  insetRect.setWidth(finalMinSize.width());
3333  if (insetRect.size().height() < finalMinSize.height())
3334  insetRect.setHeight(finalMinSize.height());
3335  if (insetRect.size().width() > finalMaxSize.width())
3336  insetRect.setWidth(finalMaxSize.width());
3337  if (insetRect.size().height() > finalMaxSize.height())
3338  insetRect.setHeight(finalMaxSize.height());
3339  } else if (mInsetPlacement.at(i) == ipBorderAligned)
3340  {
3341  insetRect.setSize(finalMinSize);
3342  Qt::Alignment al = mInsetAlignment.at(i);
3343  if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignLeft)) insetRect.moveLeft(rect().x());
3344  else if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight)) insetRect.moveRight(rect().x()+rect().width());
3345  else insetRect.moveLeft(rect().x()+rect().width()*0.5-finalMinSize.width()*0.5); // default to Qt::AlignHCenter
3346  if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignTop)) insetRect.moveTop(rect().y());
3347  else if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom)) insetRect.moveBottom(rect().y()+rect().height());
3348  else insetRect.moveTop(rect().y()+rect().height()*0.5-finalMinSize.height()*0.5); // default to Qt::AlignVCenter
3349  }
3350  mElements.at(i)->setOuterRect(insetRect);
3351  }
3352 }
3353 
3354 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3355 int QCPLayoutInset::elementCount() const
3356 {
3357  return mElements.size();
3358 }
3359 
3360 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3361 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutInset::elementAt(int index) const
3362 {
3363  if (index >= 0 && index < mElements.size())
3364  return mElements.at(index);
3365  else
3366  return 0;
3367 }
3368 
3369 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3370 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutInset::takeAt(int index)
3371 {
3372  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(index))
3373  {
3374  releaseElement(el);
3375  mElements.removeAt(index);
3376  mInsetPlacement.removeAt(index);
3377  mInsetAlignment.removeAt(index);
3378  mInsetRect.removeAt(index);
3379  return el;
3380  } else
3381  {
3382  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Attempt to take invalid index:" << index;
3383  return 0;
3384  }
3385 }
3386 
3387 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3388 bool QCPLayoutInset::take(QCPLayoutElement *element)
3389 {
3390  if (element)
3391  {
3392  for (int i=0; i<elementCount(); ++i)
3393  {
3394  if (elementAt(i) == element)
3395  {
3396  takeAt(i);
3397  return true;
3398  }
3399  }
3400  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Element not in this layout, couldn't take";
3401  } else
3402  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't take null element";
3403  return false;
3404 }
3405 
3415 double QCPLayoutInset::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
3416 {
3417  Q_UNUSED(details)
3418  if (onlySelectable)
3419  return -1;
3420 
3421  for (int i=0; i<mElements.size(); ++i)
3422  {
3423  // inset layout shall only return positive selectTest, if actually an inset object is at pos
3424  // else it would block the entire underlying QCPAxisRect with its surface.
3425  if (mElements.at(i)->realVisibility() && mElements.at(i)->selectTest(pos, onlySelectable) >= 0)
3426  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
3427  }
3428  return -1;
3429 }
3430 
3442 void QCPLayoutInset::addElement(QCPLayoutElement *element, Qt::Alignment alignment)
3443 {
3444  if (element)
3445  {
3446  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
3447  element->layout()->take(element);
3448  mElements.append(element);
3449  mInsetPlacement.append(ipBorderAligned);
3450  mInsetAlignment.append(alignment);
3451  mInsetRect.append(QRectF(0.6, 0.6, 0.4, 0.4));
3452  adoptElement(element);
3453  } else
3454  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element";
3455 }
3456 
3468 void QCPLayoutInset::addElement(QCPLayoutElement *element, const QRectF &rect)
3469 {
3470  if (element)
3471  {
3472  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
3473  element->layout()->take(element);
3474  mElements.append(element);
3475  mInsetPlacement.append(ipFree);
3476  mInsetAlignment.append(Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
3477  mInsetRect.append(rect);
3478  adoptElement(element);
3479  } else
3480  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element";
3481 }
3482 
3483 
3487

3513  mWidth(8),
3514  mLength(10),
3515  mInverted(false)
3516 {
3517 }
3518

3523  mStyle(style),
3524  mWidth(width),
3525  mLength(length),
3526  mInverted(inverted)
3527 {

3547 }

3557  mLength = length;
3558 }
3559 
3568 void QCPLineEnding::setInverted(bool inverted)
3569 {
3570  mInverted = inverted;
3571 }
3572 
3582 double QCPLineEnding::boundingDistance() const
3583 {
3584  switch (mStyle)
3585  {
3586  case esNone:
3587  return 0;
3588 
3589  case esFlatArrow:
3590  case esSpikeArrow:
3591  case esLineArrow:
3592  case esSkewedBar:
3593  return qSqrt(mWidth*mWidth+mLength*mLength); // items that have width and length
3594 
3595  case esDisc:
3596  case esSquare:
3597  case esDiamond:
3598  case esBar:
3599  case esHalfBar:
3600  return mWidth*1.42; // items that only have a width -> width*sqrt(2)
3601 
3602  }
3603  return 0;
3604 }
3605 
3617 double QCPLineEnding::realLength() const
3618 {
3619  switch (mStyle)
3620  {
3621  case esNone:
3622  case esLineArrow:
3623  case esSkewedBar:
3624  case esBar:
3625  case esHalfBar:
3626  return 0;
3627 
3628  case esFlatArrow:
3629  return mLength;
3630 
3631  case esDisc:
3632  case esSquare:
3633  case esDiamond:
3634  return mWidth*0.5;
3635 
3636  case esSpikeArrow:
3637  return mLength*0.8;
3638  }
3639  return 0;
3640 }
3641 
3647 void QCPLineEnding::draw(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector2D &pos, const QVector2D &dir) const
3648 {
3649  if (mStyle == esNone)
3650  return;
3651 
3652  QVector2D lengthVec(dir.normalized());
3653  if (lengthVec.isNull())
3654  lengthVec = QVector2D(1, 0);
3655  QVector2D widthVec(-lengthVec.y(), lengthVec.x());
3656  lengthVec *= (float)(mLength*(mInverted ? -1 : 1));
3657  widthVec *= (float)(mWidth*0.5*(mInverted ? -1 : 1));
3658 
3659  QPen penBackup = painter->pen();
3660  QBrush brushBackup = painter->brush();
3661  QPen miterPen = penBackup;
3662  miterPen.setJoinStyle(Qt::MiterJoin); // to make arrow heads spikey
3663  QBrush brush(painter->pen().color(), Qt::SolidPattern);
3664  switch (mStyle)
3665  {
3666  case esNone: break;
3667  case esFlatArrow:
3668  {
3669  QPointF points[3] = {pos.toPointF(),
3670  (pos-lengthVec+widthVec).toPointF(),
3671  (pos-lengthVec-widthVec).toPointF()
3672  };
3673  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3674  painter->setBrush(brush);
3675  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 3);
3676  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3677  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3678  break;
3679  }
3680  case esSpikeArrow:
3681  {
3682  QPointF points[4] = {pos.toPointF(),
3683  (pos-lengthVec+widthVec).toPointF(),
3684  (pos-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(),
3685  (pos-lengthVec-widthVec).toPointF()
3686  };
3687  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3688  painter->setBrush(brush);
3689  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3690  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3691  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3692  break;
3693  }
3694  case esLineArrow:
3695  {
3696  QPointF points[3] = {(pos-lengthVec+widthVec).toPointF(),
3697  pos.toPointF(),
3698  (pos-lengthVec-widthVec).toPointF()
3699  };
3700  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3701  painter->drawPolyline(points, 3);
3702  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3703  break;
3704  }
3705  case esDisc:
3706  {
3707  painter->setBrush(brush);
3708  painter->drawEllipse(pos.toPointF(), mWidth*0.5, mWidth*0.5);
3709  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3710  break;
3711  }
3712  case esSquare:
3713  {
3714  QVector2D widthVecPerp(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
3715  QPointF points[4] = {(pos-widthVecPerp+widthVec).toPointF(),
3716  (pos-widthVecPerp-widthVec).toPointF(),
3717  (pos+widthVecPerp-widthVec).toPointF(),
3718  (pos+widthVecPerp+widthVec).toPointF()
3719  };
3720  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3721  painter->setBrush(brush);
3722  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3723  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3724  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3725  break;
3726  }
3727  case esDiamond:
3728  {
3729  QVector2D widthVecPerp(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
3730  QPointF points[4] = {(pos-widthVecPerp).toPointF(),
3731  (pos-widthVec).toPointF(),
3732  (pos+widthVecPerp).toPointF(),
3733  (pos+widthVec).toPointF()
3734  };
3735  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3736  painter->setBrush(brush);
3737  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3738  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3739  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3740  break;
3741  }
3742  case esBar:
3743  {
3744  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec).toPointF(), (pos-widthVec).toPointF());
3745  break;
3746  }
3747  case esHalfBar:
3748  {
3749  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec).toPointF(), pos.toPointF());
3750  break;
3751  }
3752  case esSkewedBar:
3753  {
3754  if (qFuzzyIsNull(painter->pen().widthF()) && !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic))
3755  {
3756  // if drawing with cosmetic pen (perfectly thin stroke, happens only in vector exports), draw bar exactly on tip of line
3757  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec+lengthVec*0.2f*(mInverted?-1:1)).toPointF(),
3758  (pos-widthVec-lengthVec*0.2f*(mInverted?-1:1)).toPointF());
3759  } else
3760  {
3761  // if drawing with thick (non-cosmetic) pen, shift bar a little in line direction to prevent line from sticking through bar slightly
3762  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec+lengthVec*0.2f*(mInverted?-1:1)+dir.normalized()*qMax(1.0f, (float)painter->pen().widthF())*0.5f).toPointF(),
3763  (pos-widthVec-lengthVec*0.2f*(mInverted?-1:1)+dir.normalized()*qMax(1.0f, (float)painter->pen().widthF())*0.5f).toPointF());
3764  }
3765  break;
3766  }
3767  }
3768 }
3769 
3775 void QCPLineEnding::draw(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector2D &pos, double angle) const
3776 {
3777  draw(painter, pos, QVector2D(qCos(angle), qSin(angle)));
3778 }
3779 
3780 
3784 
3803 QCPGrid::QCPGrid(QCPAxis *parentAxis) :
3804  QCPLayerable(parentAxis->parentPlot(), "", parentAxis),
3805  mParentAxis(parentAxis)
3806 {
3807  // warning: this is called in QCPAxis constructor, so parentAxis members should not be accessed/called
3808  setParent(parentAxis);
3809  setPen(QPen(QColor(200,200,200), 0, Qt::DotLine));
3810  setSubGridPen(QPen(QColor(220,220,220), 0, Qt::DotLine));
3811  setZeroLinePen(QPen(QColor(200,200,200), 0, Qt::SolidLine));
3812  setSubGridVisible(false);
3813  setAntialiased(false);
3814  setAntialiasedSubGrid(false);
3815  setAntialiasedZeroLine(false);
3816 }
3817 
3823 void QCPGrid::setSubGridVisible(bool visible)
3824 {
3825  mSubGridVisible = visible;
3826 }
3827 
3831 void QCPGrid::setAntialiasedSubGrid(bool enabled)
3832 {
3833  mAntialiasedSubGrid = enabled;
3834 }
3835 
3839 void QCPGrid::setAntialiasedZeroLine(bool enabled)
3840 {
3841  mAntialiasedZeroLine = enabled;
3842 }
3843 
3847 void QCPGrid::setPen(const QPen &pen)
3848 {
3849  mPen = pen;
3850 }
3851 
3855 void QCPGrid::setSubGridPen(const QPen &pen)
3856 {
3857  mSubGridPen = pen;
3858 }
3859 
3866 void QCPGrid::setZeroLinePen(const QPen &pen)
3867 {
3868  mZeroLinePen = pen;
3869 }
3870 
3884 void QCPGrid::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
3885 {
3886  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeGrid);
3887 }
3888 
3894 void QCPGrid::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
3895 {
3896  if (!mParentAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis"; return; }
3897 
3898  if (mSubGridVisible)
3899  drawSubGridLines(painter);
3900  drawGridLines(painter);
3901 }
3902 
3909 void QCPGrid::drawGridLines(QCPPainter *painter) const
3910 {
3911  if (!mParentAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis"; return; }
3912 
3913  int lowTick = mParentAxis->mLowestVisibleTick;
3914  int highTick = mParentAxis->mHighestVisibleTick;
3915  double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
3916  if (mParentAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
3917  {
3918  // draw zeroline:
3919  int zeroLineIndex = -1;
3920  if (mZeroLinePen.style() != Qt::NoPen && mParentAxis->mRange.lower < 0 && mParentAxis->mRange.upper > 0)
3921  {
3922  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedZeroLine, QCP::aeZeroLine);
3923  painter->setPen(mZeroLinePen);
3924  double epsilon = mParentAxis->range().size()*1E-6; // for comparing double to zero
3925  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3926  {
3927  if (qAbs(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)) < epsilon)
3928  {
3929  zeroLineIndex = i;
3930  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // x
3931  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
3932  break;
3933  }
3934  }
3935  }
3936  // draw grid lines:
3937  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
3938  painter->setPen(mPen);
3939  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3940  {
3941  if (i == zeroLineIndex) continue; // don't draw a gridline on top of the zeroline
3942  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // x
3943  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
3944  }
3945  } else
3946  {
3947  // draw zeroline:
3948  int zeroLineIndex = -1;
3949  if (mZeroLinePen.style() != Qt::NoPen && mParentAxis->mRange.lower < 0 && mParentAxis->mRange.upper > 0)
3950  {
3951  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedZeroLine, QCP::aeZeroLine);
3952  painter->setPen(mZeroLinePen);
3953  double epsilon = mParentAxis->mRange.size()*1E-6; // for comparing double to zero
3954  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3955  {
3956  if (qAbs(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)) < epsilon)
3957  {
3958  zeroLineIndex = i;
3959  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // y
3960  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
3961  break;
3962  }
3963  }
3964  }
3965  // draw grid lines:
3966  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
3967  painter->setPen(mPen);
3968  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3969  {
3970  if (i == zeroLineIndex) continue; // don't draw a gridline on top of the zeroline
3971  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // y
3972  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
3973  }
3974  }
3975 }
3976 
3983 void QCPGrid::drawSubGridLines(QCPPainter *painter) const
3984 {
3985  if (!mParentAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis"; return; }
3986 
3987  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedSubGrid, QCP::aeSubGrid);
3988  double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
3989  painter->setPen(mSubGridPen);
3990  if (mParentAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
3991  {
3992  for (int i=0; i<mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
3993  {
3994  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.at(i)); // x
3995  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
3996  }
3997  } else
3998  {
3999  for (int i=0; i<mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
4000  {
4001  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.at(i)); // y
4002  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
4003  }
4004  }
4005 }
4006 
4007 
4011 
4030 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
4031 
4053 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
4054 /* start of documentation of signals */
4055 
4101 /* end of documentation of signals */
4102 
4107 QCPAxis::QCPAxis(QCPAxisRect *parent, AxisType type) :
4108  QCPLayerable(parent->parentPlot(), "", parent),
4109  // axis base:
4110  mAxisType(type),
4111  mAxisRect(parent),
4112  mPadding(5),
4113  mOrientation(orientation(type)),
4114  mSelectableParts(spAxis | spTickLabels | spAxisLabel),
4115  mSelectedParts(spNone),
4116  mBasePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4117  mSelectedBasePen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4118  // axis label:
4119  mLabel(""),
4120  mLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
4121  mSelectedLabelFont(QFont(mLabelFont.family(), mLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
4122  mLabelColor(Qt::black),
4123  mSelectedLabelColor(Qt::blue),
4124  // tick labels:
4125  mTickLabels(true),
4126  mAutoTickLabels(true),
4127  mTickLabelType(ltNumber),
4128  mTickLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
4129  mSelectedTickLabelFont(QFont(mTickLabelFont.family(), mTickLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
4130  mTickLabelColor(Qt::black),
4131  mSelectedTickLabelColor(Qt::blue),
4132  mDateTimeFormat("hh:mm:ss\ndd.MM.yy"),
4133  mDateTimeSpec(Qt::LocalTime),
4134  mNumberPrecision(6),
4135  mNumberFormatChar('g'),
4136  mNumberBeautifulPowers(true),
4137  // ticks and subticks:
4138  mTicks(true),
4139  mTickStep(1),
4140  mSubTickCount(4),
4141  mAutoTickCount(6),
4142  mAutoTicks(true),
4143  mAutoTickStep(true),
4144  mAutoSubTicks(true),
4145  mTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4146  mSelectedTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4147  mSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4148  mSelectedSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4149  // scale and range:
4150  mRange(0, 5),
4151  mRangeReversed(false),
4152  mScaleType(stLinear),
4153  mScaleLogBase(10),
4154  mScaleLogBaseLogInv(1.0/qLn(mScaleLogBase)),
4155  // internal members:
4156  mGrid(new QCPGrid(this)),
4157  mAxisPainter(new QCPAxisPainterPrivate(parent->parentPlot())),
4158  mLowestVisibleTick(0),
4159  mHighestVisibleTick(-1),
4160  mCachedMarginValid(false),
4161  mCachedMargin(0)
4162 {
4163  mGrid->setVisible(false);
4164  setAntialiased(false);
4165  setLayer(mParentPlot->currentLayer()); // it's actually on that layer already, but we want it in front of the grid, so we place it on there again
4166 
4167  if (type == atTop)
4168  {
4169  setTickLabelPadding(3);
4170  setLabelPadding(6);
4171  } else if (type == atRight)
4172  {
4173  setTickLabelPadding(7);
4174  setLabelPadding(12);
4175  } else if (type == atBottom)
4176  {
4177  setTickLabelPadding(3);
4178  setLabelPadding(3);
4179  } else if (type == atLeft)
4180  {
4181  setTickLabelPadding(5);
4182  setLabelPadding(10);
4183  }
4184 }
4185 
4186 QCPAxis::~QCPAxis()
4187 {
4188  delete mAxisPainter;
4189 }
4190 
4191 /* No documentation as it is a property getter */
4192 int QCPAxis::tickLabelPadding() const
4193 {
4194  return mAxisPainter->tickLabelPadding;
4195 }
4196

4198 double QCPAxis::tickLabelRotation() const
4199 {
4200  return mAxisPainter->tickLabelRotation;
4201 }
4202 
4203 /* No documentation as it is a property getter */
4204 QString QCPAxis::numberFormat() const
4205 {
4206  QString result;
4207  result.append(mNumberFormatChar);
4208  if (mNumberBeautifulPowers)
4209  {
4210  result.append("b");
4211  if (mAxisPainter->numberMultiplyCross)
4212  result.append("c");
4213  }
4214  return result;
4215 }

4264 
4278 void QCPAxis::setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType type)
4279 {
4280  if (mScaleType != type)
4281  {
4282  mScaleType = type;
4283  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4284  setRange(mRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
4285  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4286  emit scaleTypeChanged(mScaleType);
4287  }
4288 }
4289 
4297 void QCPAxis::setScaleLogBase(double base)
4298 {
4299  if (base > 1)
4300  {
4301  mScaleLogBase = base;
4302  mScaleLogBaseLogInv = 1.0/qLn(mScaleLogBase); // buffer for faster baseLog() calculation
4303  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4304  } else
4305  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid logarithmic scale base (must be greater 1):" << base;
4306 }
4307 
4316 void QCPAxis::setRange(const QCPRange &range)
4317 {
4318  if (range.lower == mRange.lower && range.upper == mRange.upper)
4319  return;
4320 
4321  if (!QCPRange::validRange(range)) return;
4322  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
4323  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4324  {
4325  mRange = range.sanitizedForLogScale();
4326  } else
4327  {
4328  mRange = range.sanitizedForLinScale();
4329  }
4330  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4331  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4332  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
4333 }
4334 
4345 void QCPAxis::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
4346 {
4347  if (mSelectableParts != selectable)
4348  {
4349  mSelectableParts = selectable;
4350  emit selectableChanged(mSelectableParts);
4351  }
4352 }
4353 
4369 void QCPAxis::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
4370 {
4371  if (mSelectedParts != selected)
4372  {
4373  mSelectedParts = selected;
4374  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
4375  }
4376 }
4377 
4387 void QCPAxis::setRange(double lower, double upper)
4388 {
4389  if (lower == mRange.lower && upper == mRange.upper)
4390  return;
4391 
4392  if (!QCPRange::validRange(lower, upper)) return;
4393  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
4394  mRange.lower = lower;
4395  mRange.upper = upper;
4396  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4397  {
4398  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4399  } else
4400  {
4401  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4402  }
4403  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4404  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4405  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
4406 }
4407 
4419 void QCPAxis::setRange(double position, double size, Qt::AlignmentFlag alignment)
4420 {
4421  if (alignment == Qt::AlignLeft)
4422  setRange(position, position+size);
4423  else if (alignment == Qt::AlignRight)
4424  setRange(position-size, position);
4425  else // alignment == Qt::AlignCenter
4426  setRange(position-size/2.0, position+size/2.0);
4427 }
4428 
4433 void QCPAxis::setRangeLower(double lower)
4434 {
4435  if (mRange.lower == lower)
4436  return;
4437 
4438  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
4439  mRange.lower = lower;
4440  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4441  {
4442  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4443  } else
4444  {
4445  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4446  }
4447  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4448  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4449  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
4450 }
4451 
4456 void QCPAxis::setRangeUpper(double upper)
4457 {
4458  if (mRange.upper == upper)
4459  return;
4460 
4461  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
4462  mRange.upper = upper;
4463  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4464  {
4465  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4466  } else
4467  {
4468  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4469  }
4470  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4471  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4472  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
4473 }
4474 
4484 void QCPAxis::setRangeReversed(bool reversed)
4485 {
4486  if (mRangeReversed != reversed)
4487  {
4488  mRangeReversed = reversed;
4489  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4490  }
4491 }
4492 
4508 void QCPAxis::setAutoTicks(bool on)
4509 {
4510  if (mAutoTicks != on)
4511  {
4512  mAutoTicks = on;
4513  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4514  }
4515 }
4516 
4528 void QCPAxis::setAutoTickCount(int approximateCount)
4529 {
4530  if (mAutoTickCount != approximateCount)
4531  {
4532  if (approximateCount > 0)
4533  {
4534  mAutoTickCount = approximateCount;
4535  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4536  } else
4537  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "approximateCount must be greater than zero:" << approximateCount;
4538  }
4539 }
4540 
4556 void QCPAxis::setAutoTickLabels(bool on)

4558  if (mAutoTickLabels != on)
4559  {
4560  mAutoTickLabels = on;
4561  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4562  }
4563 }

4751 
4788 void QCPAxis::setNumberFormat(const QString &formatCode)
4789 {
4790  if (formatCode.isEmpty())
4791  {
4792  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed formatCode is empty";
4793  return;
4794  }
4795  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4796 
4797  // interpret first char as number format char:
4798  QString allowedFormatChars = "eEfgG";
4799  if (allowedFormatChars.contains(formatCode.at(0)))
4800  {
4801  mNumberFormatChar = formatCode.at(0).toLatin1();
4802  } else
4803  {
4804  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (first char not in 'eEfgG'):" << formatCode;
4805  return;
4806  }
4807  if (formatCode.length() < 2)
4808  {
4809  mNumberBeautifulPowers = false;
4810  mAxisPainter->numberMultiplyCross = false;
4811  return;
4812  }
4813 
4814  // interpret second char as indicator for beautiful decimal powers:
4815  if (formatCode.at(1) == 'b' && (mNumberFormatChar == 'e' || mNumberFormatChar == 'g'))
4816  {
4817  mNumberBeautifulPowers = true;
4818  } else
4819  {
4820  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (second char not 'b' or first char neither 'e' nor 'g'):" << formatCode;
4821  return;
4822  }
4823  if (formatCode.length() < 3)
4824  {
4825  mAxisPainter->numberMultiplyCross = false;
4826  return;
4827  }
4828 
4829  // interpret third char as indicator for dot or cross multiplication symbol:
4830  if (formatCode.at(2) == 'c')
4831  {
4832  mAxisPainter->numberMultiplyCross = true;
4833  } else if (formatCode.at(2) == 'd')
4834  {
4835  mAxisPainter->numberMultiplyCross = false;
4836  } else
4837  {
4838  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (third char neither 'c' nor 'd'):" << formatCode;
4839  return;
4840  }
4841 }
4842 
4854 void QCPAxis::setNumberPrecision(int precision)
4855 {
4856  if (mNumberPrecision != precision)
4857  {
4858  mNumberPrecision = precision;
4859  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4860  }
4861 }
4862

4869 {
4870  if (mTickStep != step)
4871  {
4872  mTickStep = step;

4874  }
4875 }
4876
