5239 
5247 void QCPAxis::moveRange(double diff)
5248 {
5249  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
5250  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5251  {
5252  mRange.lower += diff;
5253  mRange.upper += diff;
5254  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5255  {
5256  mRange.lower *= diff;
5257  mRange.upper *= diff;
5258  }
5259  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5260  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
5261  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
5262 }
5263 
5270 void QCPAxis::scaleRange(double factor, double center)
5271 {
5272  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
5273  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5274  {
5275  QCPRange newRange;
5276  newRange.lower = (mRange.lower-center)*factor + center;
5277  newRange.upper = (mRange.upper-center)*factor + center;
5278  if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
5279  mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
5280  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5281  {
5282  if ((mRange.upper < 0 && center < 0) || (mRange.upper > 0 && center > 0)) // make sure center has same sign as range
5283  {
5284  QCPRange newRange;
5285  newRange.lower = pow(mRange.lower/center, factor)*center;
5286  newRange.upper = pow(mRange.upper/center, factor)*center;
5287  if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
5288  mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
5289  } else
5290  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Center of scaling operation doesn't lie in same logarithmic sign domain as range:" << center;
5291  }
5292  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5293  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
5294  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
5295 }
5296 
5310 void QCPAxis::setScaleRatio(const QCPAxis *otherAxis, double ratio)
5311 {
5312  int otherPixelSize, ownPixelSize;
5313 
5314  if (otherAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5315  otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->width();
5316  else
5317  otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->height();
5318 
5319  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5320  ownPixelSize = axisRect()->width();
5321  else
5322  ownPixelSize = axisRect()->height();
5323 
5324  double newRangeSize = ratio*otherAxis->range().size()*ownPixelSize/(double)otherPixelSize;
5325  setRange(range().center(), newRangeSize, Qt::AlignCenter);
5326 }
5327 
5334 void QCPAxis::rescale(bool onlyVisiblePlottables)
5335 {
5336  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> p = plottables();
5337  QCPRange newRange;
5338  bool haveRange = false;
5339  for (int i=0; i<p.size(); ++i)
5340  {
5341  if (!p.at(i)->realVisibility() && onlyVisiblePlottables)
5342  continue;
5343  QCPRange plottableRange;
5344  bool currentFoundRange;
5345  QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain signDomain = QCPAbstractPlottable::sdBoth;
5346  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
5347  signDomain = (mRange.upper < 0 ? QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative : QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive);
5348  if (p.at(i)->keyAxis() == this)
5349  plottableRange = p.at(i)->getKeyRange(currentFoundRange, signDomain);
5350  else
5351  plottableRange = p.at(i)->getValueRange(currentFoundRange, signDomain);
5352  if (currentFoundRange)
5353  {
5354  if (!haveRange)
5355  newRange = plottableRange;
5356  else
5357  newRange.expand(plottableRange);
5358  haveRange = true;
5359  }
5360  }
5361  if (haveRange)
5362  {
5363  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
5364  {
5365  double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
5366  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5367  {
5368  newRange.lower = center-mRange.size()/2.0;
5369  newRange.upper = center+mRange.size()/2.0;
5370  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5371  {
5372  newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(mRange.upper/mRange.lower);
5373  newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(mRange.upper/mRange.lower);
5374  }
5375  }
5376  setRange(newRange);
5377  }
5378 }
5379 
5383 double QCPAxis::pixelToCoord(double value) const
5384 {
5385  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5386  {
5387  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5388  {
5389  if (!mRangeReversed)
5390  return (value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width()*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
5391  else
5392  return -(value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width()*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
5393  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5394  {
5395  if (!mRangeReversed)
5396  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width())*mRange.lower;
5397  else
5398  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect->left()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->width())*mRange.upper;
5399  }
5400  } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
5401  {
5402  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5403  {
5404  if (!mRangeReversed)
5405  return (mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height()*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
5406  else
5407  return -(mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height()*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
5408  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5409  {
5410  if (!mRangeReversed)
5411  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height())*mRange.lower;
5412  else
5413  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect->bottom())/(double)mAxisRect->height())*mRange.upper;
5414  }
5415  }
5416 }
5417 
5421 double QCPAxis::coordToPixel(double value) const
5422 {
5423  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5424  {
5425  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5426  {
5427  if (!mRangeReversed)
5428  return (value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5429  else
5430  return (mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5431  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5432  {
5433  if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5434  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->right()+200 : mAxisRect->left()-200;
5435  else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5436  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->left()-200 : mAxisRect->right()+200;
5437  else
5438  {
5439  if (!mRangeReversed)
5440  return baseLog(value/mRange.lower)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5441  else
5442  return baseLog(mRange.upper/value)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5443  }
5444  }
5445  } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
5446  {
5447  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5448  {
5449  if (!mRangeReversed)
5450  return mAxisRect->bottom()-(value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->height();
5451  else
5452  return mAxisRect->bottom()-(mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->height();
5453  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5454  {
5455  if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5456  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->top()-200 : mAxisRect->bottom()+200;
5457  else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5458  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->bottom()+200 : mAxisRect->top()-200;
5459  else
5460  {
5461  if (!mRangeReversed)
5462  return mAxisRect->bottom()-baseLog(value/mRange.lower)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->height();
5463  else
5464  return mAxisRect->bottom()-baseLog(mRange.upper/value)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->height();
5465  }
5466  }
5467  }
5468 }
5469 
5479 QCPAxis::SelectablePart QCPAxis::getPartAt(const QPointF &pos) const
5480 {
5481  if (!mVisible)
5482  return spNone;
5483 
5484  if (mAxisPainter->axisSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
5485  return spAxis;
5486  else if (mAxisPainter->tickLabelsSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
5487  return spTickLabels;
5488  else if (mAxisPainter->labelSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
5489  return spAxisLabel;
5490  else
5491  return spNone;
5492 }
5493 
5494 /* inherits documentation from base class */
5495 double QCPAxis::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
5496 {
5497  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
5498  SelectablePart part = getPartAt(pos);
5499  if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(part)) || part == spNone)
5500  return -1;
5501 
5502  if (details)
5503  details->setValue(part);
5504  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
5505 }
5506 
5514 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxis::plottables() const
5515 {
5516  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
5517  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5518 
5519  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mPlottables.size(); ++i)
5520  {
5521  if (mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->keyAxis() == this ||mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->valueAxis() == this)
5522  result.append(mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i));
5523  }
5524  return result;
5525 }
5526 
5532 QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxis::graphs() const
5533 {
5534  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
5535  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5536 
5537  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mGraphs.size(); ++i)
5538  {
5539  if (mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis() == this || mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->valueAxis() == this)
5540  result.append(mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i));
5541  }
5542  return result;
5543 }
5544 
5551 QList<QCPAbstractItem*> QCPAxis::items() const
5552 {
5553  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
5554  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5555 
5556  for (int itemId=0; itemId<mParentPlot->mItems.size(); ++itemId)
5557  {
5558  QList<QCPItemPosition*> positions = mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->positions();
5559  for (int posId=0; posId<positions.size(); ++posId)
5560  {
5561  if (positions.at(posId)->keyAxis() == this || positions.at(posId)->valueAxis() == this)
5562  {
5563  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
5564  break;
5565  }
5566  }
5567  }
5568  return result;
5569 }
5570 
5575 QCPAxis::AxisType QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(QCP::MarginSide side)
5576 {
5577  switch (side)
5578  {
5579  case QCP::msLeft: return atLeft;
5580  case QCP::msRight: return atRight;
5581  case QCP::msTop: return atTop;
5582  case QCP::msBottom: return atBottom;
5583  default: break;
5584  }
5585  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid margin side passed:" << (int)side;
5586  return atLeft;
5587 }
5588 
5592 QCPAxis::AxisType QCPAxis::opposite(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
5593 {
5594  switch (type)
5595  {
5596  case atLeft: return atRight; break;
5597  case atRight: return atLeft; break;
5598  case atBottom: return atTop; break;
5599  case atTop: return atBottom; break;
5600  default: qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis type"; return atLeft; break;
5601  }
5602 }
5603 
5611 void QCPAxis::setupTickVectors()
5612 {
5613  if (!mParentPlot) return;
5614  if ((!mTicks && !mTickLabels && !mGrid->visible()) || mRange.size() <= 0) return;
5615 
5616  // fill tick vectors, either by auto generating or by notifying user to fill the vectors himself
5617  if (mAutoTicks)
5618  {
5619  generateAutoTicks();
5620  } else
5621  {
5622  emit ticksRequest();
5623  }
5624 
5625  visibleTickBounds(mLowestVisibleTick, mHighestVisibleTick);
5626  if (mTickVector.isEmpty())
5627  {
5628  mSubTickVector.clear();
5629  return;
5630  }
5631 
5632  // generate subticks between ticks:
5633  mSubTickVector.resize((mTickVector.size()-1)*mSubTickCount);
5634  if (mSubTickCount > 0)
5635  {
5636  double subTickStep = 0;
5637  double subTickPosition = 0;
5638  int subTickIndex = 0;
5639  bool done = false;
5640  int lowTick = mLowestVisibleTick > 0 ? mLowestVisibleTick-1 : mLowestVisibleTick;
5641  int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick < mTickVector.size()-1 ? mHighestVisibleTick+1 : mHighestVisibleTick;
5642  for (int i=lowTick+1; i<=highTick; ++i)
5643  {
5644  subTickStep = (mTickVector.at(i)-mTickVector.at(i-1))/(double)(mSubTickCount+1);
5645  for (int k=1; k<=mSubTickCount; ++k)
5646  {
5647  subTickPosition = mTickVector.at(i-1) + k*subTickStep;
5648  if (subTickPosition < mRange.lower)
5649  continue;
5650  if (subTickPosition > mRange.upper)
5651  {
5652  done = true;
5653  break;
5654  }
5655  mSubTickVector[subTickIndex] = subTickPosition;
5656  subTickIndex++;
5657  }
5658  if (done) break;
5659  }
5660  mSubTickVector.resize(subTickIndex);
5661  }
5662 
5663  // generate tick labels according to tick positions:
5664  if (mAutoTickLabels)
5665  {
5666  int vecsize = mTickVector.size();
5667  mTickVectorLabels.resize(vecsize);
5668  if (mTickLabelType == ltNumber)
5669  {
5670  for (int i=mLowestVisibleTick; i<=mHighestVisibleTick; ++i)
5671  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(mTickVector.at(i), mNumberFormatChar, mNumberPrecision);
5672  } else if (mTickLabelType == ltDateTime)
5673  {
5674  for (int i=mLowestVisibleTick; i<=mHighestVisibleTick; ++i)
5675  {
5676 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0) // use fromMSecsSinceEpoch function if available, to gain sub-second accuracy on tick labels (e.g. for format "hh:mm:ss:zzz")
5677  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(QDateTime::fromTime_t(mTickVector.at(i)).toTimeSpec(mDateTimeSpec), mDateTimeFormat);
5678 #else
5679  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(QDateTime::fromMSecsSinceEpoch(mTickVector.at(i)*1000).toTimeSpec(mDateTimeSpec), mDateTimeFormat);
5680 #endif
5681  }
5682  }
5683  } else // mAutoTickLabels == false
5684  {
5685  if (mAutoTicks) // ticks generated automatically, but not ticklabels, so emit ticksRequest here for labels
5686  {
5687  emit ticksRequest();
5688  }
5689  // make sure provided tick label vector has correct (minimal) length:
5690  if (mTickVectorLabels.size() < mTickVector.size())
5691  mTickVectorLabels.resize(mTickVector.size());
5692  }
5693 }
5694 
5704 void QCPAxis::generateAutoTicks()
5705 {
5706  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5707  {
5708  if (mAutoTickStep)
5709  {
5710  // Generate tick positions according to linear scaling:
5711  mTickStep = mRange.size()/(double)(mAutoTickCount+1e-10); // mAutoTickCount ticks on average, the small addition is to prevent jitter on exact integers
5712  double magnitudeFactor = qPow(10.0, qFloor(qLn(mTickStep)/qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
5713  double tickStepMantissa = mTickStep/magnitudeFactor;
5714  if (tickStepMantissa < 5)
5715  {
5716  // round digit after decimal point to 0.5
5717  mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa*2)/2.0*magnitudeFactor;
5718  } else
5719  {
5720  // round to first digit in multiples of 2
5721  mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa/2.0)*2.0*magnitudeFactor;
5722  }
5723  }
5724  if (mAutoSubTicks)
5725  mSubTickCount = calculateAutoSubTickCount(mTickStep);
5726  // Generate tick positions according to mTickStep:
5727  qint64 firstStep = floor(mRange.lower/mTickStep);
5728  qint64 lastStep = ceil(mRange.upper/mTickStep);
5729  int tickcount = lastStep-firstStep+1;
5730  if (tickcount < 0) tickcount = 0;
5731  mTickVector.resize(tickcount);
5732  for (int i=0; i<tickcount; ++i)
5733  mTickVector[i] = (firstStep+i)*mTickStep;
5734  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5735  {
5736  // Generate tick positions according to logbase scaling:
5737  if (mRange.lower > 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // positive range
5738  {
5739  double lowerMag = basePow((int)floor(baseLog(mRange.lower)));
5740  double currentMag = lowerMag;
5741  mTickVector.clear();
5742  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5743  while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag > 0) // currentMag might be zero for ranges ~1e-300, just cancel in that case
5744  {
5745  currentMag *= mScaleLogBase;
5746  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5747  }
5748  } else if (mRange.lower < 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // negative range
5749  {
5750  double lowerMag = -basePow((int)ceil(baseLog(-mRange.lower)));
5751  double currentMag = lowerMag;
5752  mTickVector.clear();
5753  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5754  while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag < 0) // currentMag might be zero for ranges ~1e-300, just cancel in that case
5755  {
5756  currentMag /= mScaleLogBase;
5757  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5758  }
5759  } else // invalid range for logarithmic scale, because lower and upper have different sign
5760  {
5761  mTickVector.clear();
5762  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid range for logarithmic plot: " << mRange.lower << "-" << mRange.upper;
5763  }
5764  }
5765 }
5766 
5780 int QCPAxis::calculateAutoSubTickCount(double tickStep) const
5781 {
5782  int result = mSubTickCount; // default to current setting, if no proper value can be found
5783 
5784  // get mantissa of tickstep:
5785  double magnitudeFactor = qPow(10.0, qFloor(qLn(tickStep)/qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
5786  double tickStepMantissa = tickStep/magnitudeFactor;
5787 
5788  // separate integer and fractional part of mantissa:
5789  double epsilon = 0.01;
5790  double intPartf;
5791  int intPart;
5792  double fracPart = modf(tickStepMantissa, &intPartf);
5793  intPart = intPartf;
5794 
5795  // handle cases with (almost) integer mantissa:
5796  if (fracPart < epsilon || 1.0-fracPart < epsilon)
5797  {
5798  if (1.0-fracPart < epsilon)
5799  ++intPart;
5800  switch (intPart)
5801  {
5802  case 1: result = 4; break; // 1.0 -> 0.2 substep
5803  case 2: result = 3; break; // 2.0 -> 0.5 substep
5804  case 3: result = 2; break; // 3.0 -> 1.0 substep
5805  case 4: result = 3; break; // 4.0 -> 1.0 substep
5806  case 5: result = 4; break; // 5.0 -> 1.0 substep
5807  case 6: result = 2; break; // 6.0 -> 2.0 substep
5808  case 7: result = 6; break; // 7.0 -> 1.0 substep
5809  case 8: result = 3; break; // 8.0 -> 2.0 substep
5810  case 9: result = 2; break; // 9.0 -> 3.0 substep
5811  }
5812  } else
5813  {
5814  // handle cases with significantly fractional mantissa:
5815  if (qAbs(fracPart-0.5) < epsilon) // *.5 mantissa
5816  {
5817  switch (intPart)
5818  {
5819  case 1: result = 2; break; // 1.5 -> 0.5 substep
5820  case 2: result = 4; break; // 2.5 -> 0.5 substep
5821  case 3: result = 4; break; // 3.5 -> 0.7 substep
5822  case 4: result = 2; break; // 4.5 -> 1.5 substep
5823  case 5: result = 4; break; // 5.5 -> 1.1 substep (won't occur with autoTickStep from here on)
5824  case 6: result = 4; break; // 6.5 -> 1.3 substep
5825  case 7: result = 2; break; // 7.5 -> 2.5 substep
5826  case 8: result = 4; break; // 8.5 -> 1.7 substep
5827  case 9: result = 4; break; // 9.5 -> 1.9 substep
5828  }
5829  }
5830  // if mantissa fraction isnt 0.0 or 0.5, don't bother finding good sub tick marks, leave default
5831  }
5832 
5833  return result;
5834 }
5835 
5836 /* inherits documentation from base class */
5837 void QCPAxis::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
5838 {
5839  Q_UNUSED(event)
5840  SelectablePart part = details.value<SelectablePart>();
5841  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(part))
5842  {
5843  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
5844  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^part : part);
5845  if (selectionStateChanged)
5846  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
5847  }
5848 }
5849 
5850 /* inherits documentation from base class */
5851 void QCPAxis::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
5852 {
5853  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
5854  setSelectedParts(mSelectedParts & ~mSelectableParts);
5855  if (selectionStateChanged)
5856  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
5857 }
5858 
5872 void QCPAxis::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
5873 {
5874  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeAxes);
5875 }
5876 
5882 void QCPAxis::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
5883 {
5884  const int lowTick = mLowestVisibleTick;
5885  const int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick;
5886  QVector<double> subTickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
5887  QVector<double> tickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
5888  QVector<QString> tickLabels; // the final vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
5889  tickPositions.reserve(highTick-lowTick+1);
5890  tickLabels.reserve(highTick-lowTick+1);
5891  subTickPositions.reserve(mSubTickVector.size());
5892 
5893  if (mTicks)
5894  {
5895  for (int i=lowTick; i<=highTick; ++i)
5896  {
5897  tickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)));
5898  if (mTickLabels)
5899  tickLabels.append(mTickVectorLabels.at(i));
5900  }
5901 
5902  if (mSubTickCount > 0)
5903  {
5904  const int subTickCount = mSubTickVector.size();
5905  for (int i=0; i<subTickCount; ++i) // no need to check bounds because subticks are always only created inside current mRange
5906  subTickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mSubTickVector.at(i)));
5907  }
5908  }
5909  // transfer all properties of this axis to QCPAxisPainterPrivate which it needs to draw the axis.
5910  // Note that some axis painter properties are already set by direct feed-through with QCPAxis setters
5911  mAxisPainter->type = mAxisType;
5912  mAxisPainter->basePen = getBasePen();
5913  mAxisPainter->labelFont = getLabelFont();
5914  mAxisPainter->labelColor = getLabelColor();
5915  mAxisPainter->label = mLabel;
5916  mAxisPainter->substituteExponent = mAutoTickLabels && mNumberBeautifulPowers && mTickLabelType == ltNumber;
5917  mAxisPainter->tickPen = getTickPen();
5918  mAxisPainter->subTickPen = getSubTickPen();
5919  mAxisPainter->tickLabelFont = getTickLabelFont();
5920  mAxisPainter->tickLabelColor = getTickLabelColor();
5921  mAxisPainter->alignmentRect = mAxisRect->rect();
5922  mAxisPainter->viewportRect = mParentPlot->viewport();
5923  mAxisPainter->abbreviateDecimalPowers = mScaleType == stLogarithmic;
5924  mAxisPainter->reversedEndings = mRangeReversed;
5925  mAxisPainter->tickPositions = tickPositions;
5926  mAxisPainter->tickLabels = tickLabels;
5927  mAxisPainter->subTickPositions = subTickPositions;
5928  mAxisPainter->draw(painter);
5929 }
5930 
5947 void QCPAxis::visibleTickBounds(int &lowIndex, int &highIndex) const
5948 {
5949  bool lowFound = false;
5950  bool highFound = false;
5951  lowIndex = 0;
5952  highIndex = -1;
5953 
5954  for (int i=0; i < mTickVector.size(); ++i)
5955  {
5956  if (mTickVector.at(i) >= mRange.lower)
5957  {
5958  lowFound = true;
5959  lowIndex = i;
5960  break;
5961  }
5962  }
5963  for (int i=mTickVector.size()-1; i >= 0; --i)
5964  {
5965  if (mTickVector.at(i) <= mRange.upper)
5966  {
5967  highFound = true;
5968  highIndex = i;
5969  break;
5970  }
5971  }
5972 
5973  if (!lowFound && highFound)
5974  lowIndex = highIndex+1;
5975  else if (lowFound && !highFound)
5976  highIndex = lowIndex-1;
5977 }
5978 
5987 double QCPAxis::baseLog(double value) const
5988 {
5989  return qLn(value)*mScaleLogBaseLogInv;
5990 }
5991 
5999 double QCPAxis::basePow(double value) const
6000 {
6001  return qPow(mScaleLogBase, value);
6002 }
6003 
6009 QPen QCPAxis::getBasePen() const
6010 {
6011  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedBasePen : mBasePen;
6012 }
6013 
6019 QPen QCPAxis::getTickPen() const
6020 {
6021  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedTickPen : mTickPen;
6022 }
6023 
6029 QPen QCPAxis::getSubTickPen() const
6030 {
6031  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedSubTickPen : mSubTickPen;
6032 }
6033 
6039 QFont QCPAxis::getTickLabelFont() const
6040 {
6041  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelFont : mTickLabelFont;
6042 }
6043 
6049 QFont QCPAxis::getLabelFont() const
6050 {
6051  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelFont : mLabelFont;
6052 }
6053 
6059 QColor QCPAxis::getTickLabelColor() const
6060 {
6061  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelColor : mTickLabelColor;
6062 }
6063 
6069 QColor QCPAxis::getLabelColor() const
6070 {
6071  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelColor : mLabelColor;
6072 }
6073 
6088 int QCPAxis::calculateMargin()
6089 {
6090  if (!mVisible) // if not visible, directly return 0, don't cache 0 because we can't react to setVisible in QCPAxis
6091  return 0;
6092 
6093  if (mCachedMarginValid)
6094  return mCachedMargin;
6095 
6096  // run through similar steps as QCPAxis::draw, and caluclate margin needed to fit axis and its labels
6097  int margin = 0;
6098 
6099  int lowTick, highTick;
6100  visibleTickBounds(lowTick, highTick);
6101  QVector<double> tickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
6102  QVector<QString> tickLabels; // the final vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
6103  tickPositions.reserve(highTick-lowTick+1);
6104  tickLabels.reserve(highTick-lowTick+1);
6105  if (mTicks)
6106  {
6107  for (int i=lowTick; i<=highTick; ++i)
6108  {
6109  tickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)));
6110  if (mTickLabels)
6111  tickLabels.append(mTickVectorLabels.at(i));
6112  }
6113  }
6114  // transfer all properties of this axis to QCPAxisPainterPrivate which it needs to calculate the size.
6115  // Note that some axis painter properties are already set by direct feed-through with QCPAxis setters
6116  mAxisPainter->type = mAxisType;
6117  mAxisPainter->labelFont = getLabelFont();
6118  mAxisPainter->label = mLabel;
6119  mAxisPainter->tickLabelFont = mTickLabelFont;
6120  mAxisPainter->alignmentRect = mAxisRect->rect();
6121  mAxisPainter->viewportRect = mParentPlot->viewport();
6122  mAxisPainter->tickPositions = tickPositions;
6123  mAxisPainter->tickLabels = tickLabels;
6124  margin += mAxisPainter->size();
6125  margin += mPadding;
6126 
6127  mCachedMargin = margin;
6128  mCachedMarginValid = true;
6129  return margin;
6130 }
6131 
6132 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6133 QCP::Interaction QCPAxis::selectionCategory() const
6134 {
6135  return QCP::iSelectAxes;
6136 }
6137 
6138 
6142 
6159 QCPAxisPainterPrivate::QCPAxisPainterPrivate(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
6160  type(QCPAxis::atLeft),
6161  basePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
6162  lowerEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
6163  upperEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
6164  labelPadding(0),
6165  tickLabelPadding(0),
6166  tickLabelRotation(0),
6167  substituteExponent(true),
6168  numberMultiplyCross(false),
6169  tickLengthIn(5),
6170  tickLengthOut(0),
6171  subTickLengthIn(2),
6172  subTickLengthOut(0),
6173  tickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
6174  subTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
6175  offset(0),
6176  abbreviateDecimalPowers(false),
6177  reversedEndings(false),
6178  mParentPlot(parentPlot),
6179  mLabelCache(16) // cache at most 16 (tick) labels
6180 {
6181 }
6182 
6183 QCPAxisPainterPrivate::~QCPAxisPainterPrivate()
6184 {
6185 }
6186 
6194 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
6195 {
6196  QByteArray newHash = generateLabelParameterHash();
6197  if (newHash != mLabelParameterHash)
6198  {
6199  mLabelCache.clear();
6200  mLabelParameterHash = newHash;
6201  }
6202 
6203  QPoint origin;
6204  switch (type)
6205  {
6206  case QCPAxis::atLeft: origin = alignmentRect.bottomLeft() +QPoint(-offset, 0); break;
6207  case QCPAxis::atRight: origin = alignmentRect.bottomRight()+QPoint(+offset, 0); break;
6208  case QCPAxis::atTop: origin = alignmentRect.topLeft() +QPoint(0, -offset); break;
6209  case QCPAxis::atBottom: origin = alignmentRect.bottomLeft() +QPoint(0, +offset); break;
6210  }
6211 
6212  double xCor = 0, yCor = 0; // paint system correction, for pixel exact matches (affects baselines and ticks of top/right axes)
6213  switch (type)
6214  {
6215  case QCPAxis::atTop: yCor = -1; break;
6216  case QCPAxis::atRight: xCor = 1; break;
6217  default: break;
6218  }
6219 
6220  int margin = 0;
6221  // draw baseline:
6222  QLineF baseLine;
6223  painter->setPen(basePen);
6224  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6225  baseLine.setPoints(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(alignmentRect.width()+xCor, yCor));
6226  else
6227  baseLine.setPoints(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(xCor, -alignmentRect.height()+yCor));
6228  if (reversedEndings)
6229  baseLine = QLineF(baseLine.p2(), baseLine.p1()); // won't make a difference for line itself, but for line endings later
6230  painter->drawLine(baseLine);
6231 
6232  // draw ticks:
6233  if (!tickPositions.isEmpty())
6234  {
6235  painter->setPen(tickPen);
6236  int tickDir = (type == QCPAxis::atBottom || type == QCPAxis::atRight) ? -1 : 1; // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
6237  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6238  {
6239  for (int i=0; i<tickPositions.size(); ++i)
6240  painter->drawLine(QLineF(tickPositions.at(i)+xCor, origin.y()-tickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, tickPositions.at(i)+xCor, origin.y()+tickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
6241  } else
6242  {
6243  for (int i=0; i<tickPositions.size(); ++i)
6244  painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-tickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, tickPositions.at(i)+yCor, origin.x()+tickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, tickPositions.at(i)+yCor));
6245  }
6246  }
6247 
6248  // draw subticks:
6249  if (!subTickPositions.isEmpty())
6250  {
6251  painter->setPen(subTickPen);
6252  // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
6253  int tickDir = (type == QCPAxis::atBottom || type == QCPAxis::atRight) ? -1 : 1;
6254  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6255  {
6256  for (int i=0; i<subTickPositions.size(); ++i)
6257  painter->drawLine(QLineF(subTickPositions.at(i)+xCor, origin.y()-subTickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, subTickPositions.at(i)+xCor, origin.y()+subTickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
6258  } else
6259  {
6260  for (int i=0; i<subTickPositions.size(); ++i)
6261  painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-subTickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, subTickPositions.at(i)+yCor, origin.x()+subTickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, subTickPositions.at(i)+yCor));
6262  }
6263  }
6264  margin += qMax(0, qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut));
6265 
6266  // draw axis base endings:
6267  bool antialiasingBackup = painter->antialiasing();
6268  painter->setAntialiasing(true); // always want endings to be antialiased, even if base and ticks themselves aren't
6269  painter->setBrush(QBrush(basePen.color()));
6270  QVector2D baseLineVector(baseLine.dx(), baseLine.dy());
6271  if (lowerEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
6272  lowerEnding.draw(painter, QVector2D(baseLine.p1())-baseLineVector.normalized()*lowerEnding.realLength()*(lowerEnding.inverted()?-1:1), -baseLineVector);
6273  if (upperEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
6274  upperEnding.draw(painter, QVector2D(baseLine.p2())+baseLineVector.normalized()*upperEnding.realLength()*(upperEnding.inverted()?-1:1), baseLineVector);
6275  painter->setAntialiasing(antialiasingBackup);
6276 
6277  // tick labels:
6278  QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0); // size of largest tick label, for offset calculation of axis label
6279  if (!tickLabels.isEmpty())
6280  {
6281  margin += tickLabelPadding;
6282  painter->setFont(tickLabelFont);
6283  painter->setPen(QPen(tickLabelColor));
6284  const int maxLabelIndex = qMin(tickPositions.size(), tickLabels.size());
6285  for (int i=0; i<maxLabelIndex; ++i)
6286  placeTickLabel(painter, tickPositions.at(i), margin, tickLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize);
6287  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6288  margin += tickLabelsSize.height();
6289  else
6290  margin += tickLabelsSize.width();
6291  }
6292 
6293  // axis label:
6294  QRect labelBounds;
6295  if (!label.isEmpty())
6296  {
6297  margin += labelPadding;
6298  painter->setFont(labelFont);
6299  painter->setPen(QPen(labelColor));
6300  labelBounds = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, label);
6301  if (type == QCPAxis::atLeft)
6302  {
6303  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
6304  painter->translate((origin.x()-margin-labelBounds.height()), origin.y());
6305  painter->rotate(-90);
6306  painter->drawText(0, 0, alignmentRect.height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6307  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
6308  }
6309  else if (type == QCPAxis::atRight)
6310  {
6311  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
6312  painter->translate((origin.x()+margin+labelBounds.height()), origin.y()-alignmentRect.height());
6313  painter->rotate(90);
6314  painter->drawText(0, 0, alignmentRect.height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6315  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
6316  }
6317  else if (type == QCPAxis::atTop)
6318  painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()-margin-labelBounds.height(), alignmentRect.width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6319  else if (type == QCPAxis::atBottom)
6320  painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()+margin, alignmentRect.width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6321  }
6322 
6323  // set selection boxes:
6324  int selectionTolerance = 0;
6325  if (mParentPlot)
6326  selectionTolerance = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance();
6327  else
6328  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "mParentPlot is null";
6329  int selAxisOutSize = qMax(qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut), selectionTolerance);
6330  int selAxisInSize = selectionTolerance;
6331  int selTickLabelSize = (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width());
6332  int selTickLabelOffset = qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut)+tickLabelPadding;
6333  int selLabelSize = labelBounds.height();
6334  int selLabelOffset = selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize+labelPadding;
6335  if (type == QCPAxis::atLeft)
6336  {
6337  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selAxisOutSize, alignmentRect.top(), origin.x()+selAxisInSize, alignmentRect.bottom());
6338  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, alignmentRect.top(), origin.x()-selTickLabelOffset, alignmentRect.bottom());
6339  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, alignmentRect.top(), origin.x()-selLabelOffset, alignmentRect.bottom());
6340  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atRight)
6341  {
6342  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selAxisInSize, alignmentRect.top(), origin.x()+selAxisOutSize, alignmentRect.bottom());
6343  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, alignmentRect.top(), origin.x()+selTickLabelOffset, alignmentRect.bottom());
6344  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, alignmentRect.top(), origin.x()+selLabelOffset, alignmentRect.bottom());
6345  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atTop)
6346  {
6347  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(alignmentRect.left(), origin.y()-selAxisOutSize, alignmentRect.right(), origin.y()+selAxisInSize);
6348  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(alignmentRect.left(), origin.y()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, alignmentRect.right(), origin.y()-selTickLabelOffset);
6349  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(alignmentRect.left(), origin.y()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, alignmentRect.right(), origin.y()-selLabelOffset);
6350  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atBottom)
6351  {
6352  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(alignmentRect.left(), origin.y()-selAxisInSize, alignmentRect.right(), origin.y()+selAxisOutSize);
6353  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(alignmentRect.left(), origin.y()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, alignmentRect.right(), origin.y()+selTickLabelOffset);
6354  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(alignmentRect.left(), origin.y()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, alignmentRect.right(), origin.y()+selLabelOffset);
6355  }
6356  // draw hitboxes for debug purposes:
6357  //painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
6358  //painter->drawRects(QVector<QRect>() << mAxisSelectionBox << mTickLabelsSelectionBox << mLabelSelectionBox);
6359 }
6360 
6366 int QCPAxisPainterPrivate::size() const
6367 {
6368  int result = 0;
6369 
6370  // get length of tick marks pointing outwards:
6371  if (!tickPositions.isEmpty())
6372  result += qMax(0, qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut));
6373 
6374  // calculate size of tick labels:
6375  QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0);
6376  if (!tickLabels.isEmpty())
6377  {
6378  for (int i=0; i<tickLabels.size(); ++i)
6379  getMaxTickLabelSize(tickLabelFont, tickLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize);
6380  result += QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width();
6381  result += tickLabelPadding;
6382  }
6383 
6384  // calculate size of axis label (only height needed, because left/right labels are rotated by 90 degrees):
6385  if (!label.isEmpty())
6386  {
6387  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(labelFont);
6388  QRect bounds;
6389  bounds = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignVCenter, label);
6390  result += bounds.height() + labelPadding;
6391  }
6392 
6393  return result;
6394 }
6395 
6402 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::clearCache()
6403 {
6404  mLabelCache.clear();
6405 }
6406 
6414 QByteArray QCPAxisPainterPrivate::generateLabelParameterHash() const
6415 {
6416  QByteArray result;
6417  result.append(QByteArray::number(tickLabelRotation));
6418  result.append(QByteArray::number((int)substituteExponent));
6419  result.append(QByteArray::number((int)numberMultiplyCross));
6420  result.append(tickLabelColor.name()+QByteArray::number(tickLabelColor.alpha(), 16));
6421  result.append(tickLabelFont.toString());
6422  return result;
6423 }
6424 
6444 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::placeTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double position, int distanceToAxis, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize)
6445 {
6446  // warning: if you change anything here, also adapt getMaxTickLabelSize() accordingly!
6447  if (text.isEmpty()) return;
6448  QSize finalSize;
6449  QPointF labelAnchor;
6450  switch (type)
6451  {
6452  case QCPAxis::atLeft: labelAnchor = QPointF(alignmentRect.left()-distanceToAxis-offset, position); break;
6453  case QCPAxis::atRight: labelAnchor = QPointF(alignmentRect.right()+distanceToAxis+offset, position); break;
6454  case QCPAxis::atTop: labelAnchor = QPointF(position, alignmentRect.top()-distanceToAxis-offset); break;
6455  case QCPAxis::atBottom: labelAnchor = QPointF(position, alignmentRect.bottom()+distanceToAxis+offset); break;
6456  }
6457  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) && !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching)) // label caching enabled
6458  {
6459  if (!mLabelCache.contains(text)) // no cached label exists, create it
6460  {
6461  CachedLabel *newCachedLabel = new CachedLabel;
6462  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
6463  QPointF drawOffset = getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData);
6464  newCachedLabel->offset = drawOffset+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft();
6465  newCachedLabel->pixmap = QPixmap(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size());
6466  newCachedLabel->pixmap.fill(Qt::transparent);
6467  QCPPainter cachePainter(&newCachedLabel->pixmap);
6468  cachePainter.setPen(painter->pen());
6469  drawTickLabel(&cachePainter, -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().x(), -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().y(), labelData);
6470  mLabelCache.insert(text, newCachedLabel, 1);
6471  }
6472  // draw cached label:
6473  const CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.object(text);
6474  // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it:
6475  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6476  {
6477  if (labelAnchor.x()+cachedLabel->offset.x()+cachedLabel->pixmap.width() > viewportRect.right() ||
6478  labelAnchor.x()+cachedLabel->offset.x() < viewportRect.left())
6479  return;
6480  } else
6481  {
6482  if (labelAnchor.y()+cachedLabel->offset.y()+cachedLabel->pixmap.height() >viewportRect.bottom() ||
6483  labelAnchor.y()+cachedLabel->offset.y() < viewportRect.top())
6484  return;
6485  }
6486  painter->drawPixmap(labelAnchor+cachedLabel->offset, cachedLabel->pixmap);
6487  finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size();
6488  } else // label caching disabled, draw text directly on surface:
6489  {
6490  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
6491  QPointF finalPosition = labelAnchor + getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData);
6492  // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it:
6493  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6494  {
6495  if (finalPosition.x()+(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.width()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left()) > viewportRect.right() ||
6496  finalPosition.x()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left() < viewportRect.left())
6497  return;
6498  } else
6499  {
6500  if (finalPosition.y()+(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.height()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top()) > viewportRect.bottom() ||
6501  finalPosition.y()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top() < viewportRect.top())
6502  return;
6503  }
6504  drawTickLabel(painter, finalPosition.x(), finalPosition.y(), labelData);
6505  finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
6506  }
6507 
6508  // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
6509  if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
6510  tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
6511  if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
6512  tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
6513 }
6514 
6524 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::drawTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y, const TickLabelData &labelData) const
6525 {
6526  // backup painter settings that we're about to change:
6527  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
6528  QFont oldFont = painter->font();
6529 
6530  // transform painter to position/rotation:
6531  painter->translate(x, y);
6532  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation))
6533  painter->rotate(tickLabelRotation);
6534 
6535  // draw text:
6536  if (!labelData.expPart.isEmpty()) // indicator that beautiful powers must be used
6537  {
6538  painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
6539  painter->drawText(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.basePart);
6540  painter->setFont(labelData.expFont);
6541  painter->drawText(labelData.baseBounds.width()+1, 0, labelData.expBounds.width(), labelData.expBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.expPart);
6542  } else
6543  {
6544  painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
6545  painter->drawText(0, 0, labelData.totalBounds.width(), labelData.totalBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, labelData.basePart);
6546  }
6547 
6548  // reset painter settings to what it was before:
6549  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
6550  painter->setFont(oldFont);
6551 }
6552 
6561 QCPAxisPainterPrivate::TickLabelData QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getTickLabelData(const QFont &font, const QString &text) const
6562 {
6563  TickLabelData result;
6564 
6565  // determine whether beautiful decimal powers should be used
6566  bool useBeautifulPowers = false;
6567  int ePos = -1;
6568  if (substituteExponent)
6569  {
6570  ePos = text.indexOf('e');
6571  if (ePos > -1)
6572  useBeautifulPowers = true;
6573  }
6574 
6575  // calculate text bounding rects and do string preparation for beautiful decimal powers:
6576  result.baseFont = font;
6577  if (result.baseFont.pointSizeF() > 0) // On some rare systems, this sometimes is initialized with -1 (Qt bug?), so we check here before possibly setting a negative value in the next line
6578  result.baseFont.setPointSizeF(result.baseFont.pointSizeF()+0.05); // QFontMetrics.boundingRect has a bug for exact point sizes that make the results oscillate due to internal rounding
6579  if (useBeautifulPowers)
6580  {
6581  // split text into parts of number/symbol that will be drawn normally and part that will be drawn as exponent:
6582  result.basePart = text.left(ePos);
6583  // in log scaling, we want to turn "1*10^n" into "10^n", else add multiplication sign and decimal base:
6584  if (abbreviateDecimalPowers && result.basePart == "1")
6585  result.basePart = "10";
6586  else
6587  result.basePart += (numberMultiplyCross ? QString(QChar(215)) : QString(QChar(183))) + "10";
6588  result.expPart = text.mid(ePos+1);
6589  // clip "+" and leading zeros off expPart:
6590  while (result.expPart.length() > 2 && result.expPart.at(1) == '0') // length > 2 so we leave one zero when numberFormatChar is 'e'
6591  result.expPart.remove(1, 1);
6592  if (!result.expPart.isEmpty() && result.expPart.at(0) == '+')
6593  result.expPart.remove(0, 1);
6594  // prepare smaller font for exponent:
6595  result.expFont = font;
6596  result.expFont.setPointSize(result.expFont.pointSize()*0.75);
6597  // calculate bounding rects of base part, exponent part and total one:
6598  result.baseBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.basePart);
6599  result.expBounds = QFontMetrics(result.expFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.expPart);
6600  result.totalBounds = result.baseBounds.adjusted(0, 0, result.expBounds.width()+2, 0); // +2 consists of the 1 pixel spacing between base and exponent (see drawTickLabel) and an extra pixel to include AA
6601  } else // useBeautifulPowers == false
6602  {
6603  result.basePart = text;
6604  result.totalBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, result.basePart);
6605  }
6606  result.totalBounds.moveTopLeft(QPoint(0, 0)); // want bounding box aligned top left at origin, independent of how it was created, to make further processing simpler
6607 
6608  // calculate possibly different bounding rect after rotation:
6609  result.rotatedTotalBounds = result.totalBounds;
6610  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation))
6611  {
6612  QTransform transform;
6613  transform.rotate(tickLabelRotation);
6614  result.rotatedTotalBounds = transform.mapRect(result.rotatedTotalBounds);
6615  }
6616 
6617  return result;
6618 }
6619 
6630 QPointF QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getTickLabelDrawOffset(const TickLabelData &labelData) const
6631 {
6632  /*
6633  calculate label offset from base point at tick (non-trivial, for best visual appearance): short
6634  explanation for bottom axis: The anchor, i.e. the point in the label that is placed
6635  horizontally under the corresponding tick is always on the label side that is closer to the
6636  axis (e.g. the left side of the text when we're rotating clockwise). On that side, the height
6637  is halved and the resulting point is defined the anchor. This way, a 90 degree rotated text
6638  will be centered under the tick (i.e. displaced horizontally by half its height). At the same
6639  time, a 45 degree rotated text will "point toward" its tick, as is typical for rotated tick
6640  labels.
6641  */
6642  bool doRotation = !qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation);
6643  bool flip = qFuzzyCompare(qAbs(tickLabelRotation), 90.0); // perfect +/-90 degree flip. Indicates vertical label centering on vertical axes.
6644  double radians = tickLabelRotation/180.0*M_PI;
6645  int x=0, y=0;
6646  if (type == QCPAxis::atLeft)
6647  {
6648  if (doRotation)
6649  {
6650  if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
6651  {
6652  x = -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width();
6653  y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6654  } else
6655  {
6656  x = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6657  y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : +qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6658  }
6659  } else
6660  {
6661  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width();
6662  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6663  }
6664  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atRight)
6665  {
6666  if (doRotation)
6667  {
6668  if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
6669  {
6670  x = +qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6671  y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6672  } else
6673  {
6674  x = 0;
6675  y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6676  }
6677  } else
6678  {
6679  x = 0;
6680  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6681  }
6682  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atTop)
6683  {
6684  if (doRotation)
6685  {
6686  if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
6687  {
6688  x = -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()+qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6689  y = -qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6690  } else
6691  {
6692  x = -qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6693  y = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6694  }
6695  } else
6696  {
6697  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0;
6698  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height();
6699  }
6700  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atBottom)
6701  {
6702  if (doRotation)
6703  {
6704  if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
6705  {
6706  x = +qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6707  y = 0;
6708  } else
6709  {
6710  x = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6711  y = +qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width();
6712  }
6713  } else
6714  {
6715  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0;
6716  y = 0;
6717  }
6718  }
6719 
6720  return QPointF(x, y);
6721 }
6722 
6730 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getMaxTickLabelSize(const QFont &font, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize) const
6731 {
6732  // note: this function must return the same tick label sizes as the placeTickLabel function.
6733  QSize finalSize;
6734  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) && mLabelCache.contains(text)) // label caching enabled and have cached label
6735  {
6736  const CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.object(text);
6737  finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size();
6738  } else // label caching disabled or no label with this text cached:
6739  {
6740  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(font, text);
6741  finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
6742  }
6743 
6744  // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
6745  if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
6746  tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
6747  if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
6748  tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
6749 }
6750 
6751 
6755 
6822 /* start of documentation of pure virtual functions */
6823 
6869 /* end of documentation of pure virtual functions */
6870 /* start of documentation of signals */
6871 
6885 /* end of documentation of signals */
6886 
6898 QCPAbstractPlottable::QCPAbstractPlottable(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
6899  QCPLayerable(keyAxis->parentPlot(), "", keyAxis->axisRect()),
6900  mName(""),
6901  mAntialiasedFill(true),
6902  mAntialiasedScatters(true),
6903  mAntialiasedErrorBars(false),
6904  mPen(Qt::black),
6905  mSelectedPen(Qt::black),
6906  mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
6907  mSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
6908  mKeyAxis(keyAxis),
6909  mValueAxis(valueAxis),
6910  mSelectable(true),
6911  mSelected(false)
6912 {
6913  if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != valueAxis->parentPlot())
6914  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Parent plot of keyAxis is not the same as that of valueAxis.";
6915  if (keyAxis->orientation() == valueAxis->orientation())
6916  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "keyAxis and valueAxis must be orthogonal to each other.";
6917 }
6918

6924 {
6925  mName = name;
6926 }

6937 }

6946 {
6947  mAntialiasedScatters = enabled;
6948 }
6949 
6956 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedErrorBars(bool enabled)
6957 {
6958  mAntialiasedErrorBars = enabled;
6959 }

6973  mPen = pen;

6983 {
6984  mSelectedPen = pen;

6999 }

7009  mSelectedBrush = brush;
7010 }

7023 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setKeyAxis(QCPAxis *axis)

7042 }
