7053 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectable(bool selectable)
7054 {
7055  if (mSelectable != selectable)
7056  {
7057  mSelectable = selectable;
7058  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
7059  }
7060 }
7061 
7076 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelected(bool selected)
7077 {
7078  if (mSelected != selected)
7079  {
7080  mSelected = selected;
7081  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
7082  }
7083 }
7084 
7098 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge) const
7099 {
7100  rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge);
7101  rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge);
7102 }
7103 
7109 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
7110 {
7111  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7112  if (!keyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
7113 
7114  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
7115  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
7116  signDomain = (keyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
7117 
7118  bool foundRange;
7119  QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(foundRange, signDomain);
7120  if (foundRange)
7121  {
7122  if (onlyEnlarge)
7123  newRange.expand(keyAxis->range());
7124  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
7125  {
7126  double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
7127  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
7128  {
7129  newRange.lower = center-keyAxis->range().size()/2.0;
7130  newRange.upper = center+keyAxis->range().size()/2.0;
7131  } else // scaleType() == stLogarithmic
7132  {
7133  newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(keyAxis->range().upper/keyAxis->range().lower);
7134  newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(keyAxis->range().upper/keyAxis->range().lower);
7135  }
7136  }
7137  keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
7138  }
7139 }
7140 
7149 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
7150 {
7151  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7152  if (!valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid value axis"; return; }
7153 
7154  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
7155  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
7156  signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
7157 
7158  bool foundRange;
7159  QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(foundRange, signDomain);
7160  if (foundRange)
7161  {
7162  if (onlyEnlarge)
7163  newRange.expand(valueAxis->range());
7164  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
7165  {
7166  double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
7167  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
7168  {
7169  newRange.lower = center-valueAxis->range().size()/2.0;
7170  newRange.upper = center+valueAxis->range().size()/2.0;
7171  } else // scaleType() == stLogarithmic
7172  {
7173  newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(valueAxis->range().upper/valueAxis->range().lower);
7174  newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(valueAxis->range().upper/valueAxis->range().lower);
7175  }
7176  }
7177  valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
7178  }
7179 }
7180 
7193 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::addToLegend()
7194 {
7195  if (!mParentPlot || !mParentPlot->legend)
7196  return false;
7197 
7198  if (!mParentPlot->legend->hasItemWithPlottable(this))
7199  {
7200  mParentPlot->legend->addItem(new QCPPlottableLegendItem(mParentPlot->legend, this));
7201  return true;
7202  } else
7203  return false;
7204 }
7205 
7216 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::removeFromLegend() const
7217 {
7218  if (!mParentPlot->legend)
7219  return false;
7220 
7221  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *lip = mParentPlot->legend->itemWithPlottable(this))
7222  return mParentPlot->legend->removeItem(lip);
7223  else
7224  return false;
7225 }
7226 
7227 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7228 QRect QCPAbstractPlottable::clipRect() const
7229 {
7230  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
7231  return mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect() & mValueAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect();
7232  else
7233  return QRect();
7234 }
7235 
7236 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7237 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractPlottable::selectionCategory() const
7238 {
7239  return QCP::iSelectPlottables;
7240 }
7241 
7252 void QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value, double &x, double &y) const
7253 {
7254  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7255  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7256  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
7257 
7258  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7259  {
7260  x = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
7261  y = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
7262  } else
7263  {
7264  y = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
7265  x = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
7266  }
7267 }
7268 
7274 const QPointF QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value) const
7275 {
7276  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7277  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7278  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
7279 
7280  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7281  return QPointF(keyAxis->coordToPixel(key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(value));
7282  else
7283  return QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(key));
7284 }
7285 
7296 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(double x, double y, double &key, double &value) const
7297 {
7298  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7299  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7300  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
7301 
7302  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7303  {
7304  key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
7305  value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
7306  } else
7307  {
7308  key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
7309  value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
7310  }
7311 }
7312 
7318 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(const QPointF &pixelPos, double &key, double &value) const
7319 {
7320  pixelsToCoords(pixelPos.x(), pixelPos.y(), key, value);
7321 }
7322 
7328 QPen QCPAbstractPlottable::mainPen() const
7329 {
7330  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
7331 }
7332 
7338 QBrush QCPAbstractPlottable::mainBrush() const
7339 {
7340  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
7341 }
7342 
7356 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
7357 {
7358  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aePlottables);
7359 }
7360 
7372 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyFillAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
7373 {
7374  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedFill, QCP::aeFills);
7375 }
7376 
7388 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyScattersAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
7389 {
7390  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedScatters, QCP::aeScatters);
7391 }
7392 
7404 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
7405 {
7406  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedErrorBars, QCP::aeErrorBars);
7407 }
7408 
7419 double QCPAbstractPlottable::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start, const QPointF &end, const QPointF &point) const
7420 {
7421  QVector2D a(start);
7422  QVector2D b(end);
7423  QVector2D p(point);
7424  QVector2D v(b-a);
7425 
7426  double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
7427  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr))
7428  {
7429  double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p-a, v)/vLengthSqr;
7430  if (mu < 0)
7431  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7432  else if (mu > 1)
7433  return (b-p).lengthSquared();
7434  else
7435  return ((a + mu*v)-p).lengthSquared();
7436  } else
7437  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7438 }
7439 
7440 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7441 void QCPAbstractPlottable::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
7442 {
7443  Q_UNUSED(event)
7444  Q_UNUSED(details)
7445  if (mSelectable)
7446  {
7447  bool selBefore = mSelected;
7448  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
7449  if (selectionStateChanged)
7450  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
7451  }
7452 }
7453 
7454 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7455 void QCPAbstractPlottable::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
7456 {
7457  if (mSelectable)
7458  {
7459  bool selBefore = mSelected;
7460  setSelected(false);
7461  if (selectionStateChanged)
7462  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
7463  }
7464 }
7465 
7466 
7470 
7492 /* start documentation of inline functions */
7493 
7504 /* end documentation of inline functions */
7505 
7511 QCPItemAnchor::QCPItemAnchor(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString name, int anchorId) :
7512  mName(name),
7513  mParentPlot(parentPlot),
7514  mParentItem(parentItem),
7515  mAnchorId(anchorId)
7516 {
7517 }
7518 
7519 QCPItemAnchor::~QCPItemAnchor()
7520 {
7521  // unregister as parent at children:
7522  QList<QCPItemPosition*> currentChildren(mChildren.toList());
7523  for (int i=0; i<currentChildren.size(); ++i)
7524  currentChildren.at(i)->setParentAnchor(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildren
7525 }
7526 
7533 QPointF QCPItemAnchor::pixelPoint() const
7534 {
7535  if (mParentItem)
7536  {
7537  if (mAnchorId > -1)
7538  {
7539  return mParentItem->anchorPixelPoint(mAnchorId);
7540  } else
7541  {
7542  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no valid anchor id set:" << mAnchorId;
7543  return QPointF();
7544  }
7545  } else
7546  {
7547  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent item set";
7548  return QPointF();
7549  }
7550 }
7551 
7559 void QCPItemAnchor::addChild(QCPItemPosition *pos)
7560 {
7561  if (!mChildren.contains(pos))
7562  mChildren.insert(pos);
7563  else
7564  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos is child already" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
7565 }
7566 
7573 void QCPItemAnchor::removeChild(QCPItemPosition *pos)
7574 {
7575  if (!mChildren.remove(pos))
7576  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos isn't child" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
7577 }
7578 
7579 
7583 
7615 QCPItemPosition::QCPItemPosition(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString name) :
7616  QCPItemAnchor(parentPlot, parentItem, name),
7617  mPositionType(ptAbsolute),
7618  mKey(0),
7619  mValue(0),
7620  mParentAnchor(0)
7621 {
7622 }
7623 
7624 QCPItemPosition::~QCPItemPosition()
7625 {
7626  // unregister as parent at children:
7627  // Note: this is done in ~QCPItemAnchor again, but it's important QCPItemPosition does it itself, because only then
7628  // the setParentAnchor(0) call the correct QCPItemPosition::pixelPoint function instead of QCPItemAnchor::pixelPoint
7629  QList<QCPItemPosition*> currentChildren(mChildren.toList());
7630  for (int i=0; i<currentChildren.size(); ++i)
7631  currentChildren.at(i)->setParentAnchor(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildren
7632  // unregister as child in parent:
7633  if (mParentAnchor)
7634  mParentAnchor->removeChild(this);
7635 }
7636 
7637 /* can't make this a header inline function, because QPointer breaks with forward declared types, see QTBUG-29588 */
7638 QCPAxisRect *QCPItemPosition::axisRect() const
7639 {
7640  return mAxisRect.data();
7641 }
7642 
7665 void QCPItemPosition::setType(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
7666 {
7667  if (mPositionType != type)
7668  {
7669  // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because axes or axis rect
7670  // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPoint() because it would output a qDebug warning.
7671  bool recoverPixelPosition = true;
7672  if ((mPositionType == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) && (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
7673  recoverPixelPosition = false;
7674  if ((mPositionType == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) && (!mAxisRect))
7675  recoverPixelPosition = false;
7676 
7677  QPointF pixelP;
7678  if (recoverPixelPosition)
7679  pixelP = pixelPoint();
7680 
7681  mPositionType = type;
7682 
7683  if (recoverPixelPosition)
7684  setPixelPoint(pixelP);
7685  }
7686 }
7687 
7703 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchor(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
7704 {
7705  // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
7706  if (parentAnchor == this)
7707  {
7708  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7709  return false;
7710  }
7711  // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
7712  QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
7713  while (currentParent)
7714  {
7715  if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos = currentParent->toQCPItemPosition())
7716  {
7717  // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
7718  if (currentParentPos == this)
7719  {
7720  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7721  return false;
7722  }
7723  currentParent = currentParentPos->mParentAnchor;
7724  } else
7725  {
7726  // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent items aren't the
7727  // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself depends on the position,
7728  // because they're both on the same item:
7729  if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem)
7730  {
7731  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which itself depends on this position" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7732  return false;
7733  }
7734  break;
7735  }
7736  }
7737 
7738  // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to ptAbsolute:
7739  if (!mParentAnchor && mPositionType == ptPlotCoords)
7740  setType(ptAbsolute);
7741 
7742  // save pixel position:
7743  QPointF pixelP;
7744  if (keepPixelPosition)
7745  pixelP = pixelPoint();
7746  // unregister at current parent anchor:
7747  if (mParentAnchor)
7748  mParentAnchor->removeChild(this);
7749  // register at new parent anchor:
7750  if (parentAnchor)
7751  parentAnchor->addChild(this);
7752  mParentAnchor = parentAnchor;
7753  // restore pixel position under new parent:
7754  if (keepPixelPosition)
7755  setPixelPoint(pixelP);
7756  else
7757  setCoords(0, 0);
7758  return true;
7759 }
7760 
7774 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(double key, double value)
7775 {
7776  mKey = key;
7777  mValue = value;
7778 }
7779 
7785 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(const QPointF &pos)
7786 {
7787  setCoords(pos.x(), pos.y());
7788 }
7789 
7796 QPointF QCPItemPosition::pixelPoint() const
7797 {
7798  switch (mPositionType)
7799  {
7800  case ptAbsolute:
7801  {
7802  if (mParentAnchor)
7803  return QPointF(mKey, mValue) + mParentAnchor->pixelPoint();
7804  else
7805  return QPointF(mKey, mValue);
7806  }
7807 
7808  case ptViewportRatio:
7809  {
7810  if (mParentAnchor)
7811  {
7812  return QPointF(mKey*mParentPlot->viewport().width(),
7813  mValue*mParentPlot->viewport().height()) + mParentAnchor->pixelPoint();
7814  } else
7815  {
7816  return QPointF(mKey*mParentPlot->viewport().width(),
7817  mValue*mParentPlot->viewport().height()) + mParentPlot->viewport().topLeft();
7818  }
7819  }
7820 
7821  case ptAxisRectRatio:
7822  {
7823  if (mAxisRect)
7824  {
7825  if (mParentAnchor)
7826  {
7827  return QPointF(mKey*mAxisRect.data()->width(),
7828  mValue*mAxisRect.data()->height()) + mParentAnchor->pixelPoint();
7829  } else
7830  {
7831  return QPointF(mKey*mAxisRect.data()->width(),
7832  mValue*mAxisRect.data()->height()) + mAxisRect.data()->topLeft();
7833  }
7834  } else
7835  {
7836  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axis rect defined";
7837  return QPointF(mKey, mValue);
7838  }
7839  }
7840 
7841  case ptPlotCoords:
7842  {
7843  double x, y;
7844  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
7845  {
7846  // both key and value axis are given, translate key/value to x/y coordinates:
7847  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7848  {
7849  x = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7850  y = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7851  } else
7852  {
7853  y = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7854  x = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7855  }
7856  } else if (mKeyAxis)
7857  {
7858  // only key axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to key coordinate, other stays pixel:
7859  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7860  {
7861  x = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7862  y = mValue;
7863  } else
7864  {
7865  y = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7866  x = mValue;
7867  }
7868  } else if (mValueAxis)
7869  {
7870  // only value axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to value coordinate, other stays pixel:
7871  if (mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7872  {
7873  x = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7874  y = mKey;
7875  } else
7876  {
7877  y = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7878  x = mKey;
7879  }
7880  } else
7881  {
7882  // no axis given, basically the same as if mPositionType were ptAbsolute
7883  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axes defined";
7884  x = mKey;
7885  y = mValue;
7886  }
7887  return QPointF(x, y);
7888  }
7889  }
7890  return QPointF();
7891 }
7892 
7898 void QCPItemPosition::setAxes(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
7899 {
7900  mKeyAxis = keyAxis;
7901  mValueAxis = valueAxis;
7902 }
7903 
7909 void QCPItemPosition::setAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *axisRect)
7910 {
7911  mAxisRect = axisRect;
7912 }
7913 
7924 void QCPItemPosition::setPixelPoint(const QPointF &pixelPoint)
7925 {
7926  switch (mPositionType)
7927  {
7928  case ptAbsolute:
7929  {
7930  if (mParentAnchor)
7931  setCoords(pixelPoint-mParentAnchor->pixelPoint());
7932  else
7933  setCoords(pixelPoint);
7934  break;
7935  }
7936 
7937  case ptViewportRatio:
7938  {
7939  if (mParentAnchor)
7940  {
7941  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mParentAnchor->pixelPoint());
7942  p.rx() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().width();
7943  p.ry() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().height();
7944  setCoords(p);
7945  } else
7946  {
7947  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mParentPlot->viewport().topLeft());
7948  p.rx() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().width();
7949  p.ry() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().height();
7950  setCoords(p);
7951  }
7952  break;
7953  }
7954 
7955  case ptAxisRectRatio:
7956  {
7957  if (mAxisRect)
7958  {
7959  if (mParentAnchor)
7960  {
7961  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mParentAnchor->pixelPoint());
7962  p.rx() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->width();
7963  p.ry() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->height();
7964  setCoords(p);
7965  } else
7966  {
7967  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mAxisRect.data()->topLeft());
7968  p.rx() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->width();
7969  p.ry() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->height();
7970  setCoords(p);
7971  }
7972  } else
7973  {
7974  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axis rect defined";
7975  setCoords(pixelPoint);
7976  }
7977  break;
7978  }
7979 
7980  case ptPlotCoords:
7981  {
7982  double newKey, newValue;
7983  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
7984  {
7985  // both key and value axis are given, translate point to key/value coordinates:
7986  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7987  {
7988  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
7989  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
7990  } else
7991  {
7992  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
7993  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
7994  }
7995  } else if (mKeyAxis)
7996  {
7997  // only key axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to key coordinate, other stays pixel:
7998  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7999  {
8000  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
8001  newValue = pixelPoint.y();
8002  } else
8003  {
8004  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
8005  newValue = pixelPoint.x();
8006  }
8007  } else if (mValueAxis)
8008  {
8009  // only value axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to value coordinate, other stays pixel:
8010  if (mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
8011  {
8012  newKey = pixelPoint.y();
8013  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
8014  } else
8015  {
8016  newKey = pixelPoint.x();
8017  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
8018  }
8019  } else
8020  {
8021  // no axis given, basically the same as if mPositionType were ptAbsolute
8022  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axes defined";
8023  newKey = pixelPoint.x();
8024  newValue = pixelPoint.y();
8025  }
8026  setCoords(newKey, newValue);
8027  break;
8028  }
8029  }
8030 }
8031 
8032 
8036 
8159 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
8160 
8176 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
8177 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
8178 
8189 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
8190 /* start documentation of signals */
8191 
8197 /* end documentation of signals */
8198 
8202 QCPAbstractItem::QCPAbstractItem(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
8203  QCPLayerable(parentPlot),
8204  mClipToAxisRect(false),
8205  mSelectable(true),
8206  mSelected(false)
8207 {
8208  QList<QCPAxisRect*> rects = parentPlot->axisRects();
8209  if (rects.size() > 0)
8210  {
8211  setClipToAxisRect(true);
8212  setClipAxisRect(rects.first());
8213  }
8214 }
8215 
8216 QCPAbstractItem::~QCPAbstractItem()
8217 {
8218  // don't delete mPositions because every position is also an anchor and thus in mAnchors
8219  qDeleteAll(mAnchors);
8220 }
8221 
8222 /* can't make this a header inline function, because QPointer breaks with forward declared types, see QTBUG-29588 */
8223 QCPAxisRect *QCPAbstractItem::clipAxisRect() const
8224 {
8225  return mClipAxisRect.data();
8226 }
8227 
8234 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipToAxisRect(bool clip)
8235 {
8236  mClipToAxisRect = clip;
8237  if (mClipToAxisRect)
8238  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
8239 }
8240 
8247 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *rect)
8248 {
8249  mClipAxisRect = rect;
8250  if (mClipToAxisRect)
8251  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
8252 }
8253 
8263 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
8264 {
8265  if (mSelectable != selectable)
8266  {
8267  mSelectable = selectable;
8268  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
8269  }
8270 }
8271 
8286 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelected(bool selected)
8287 {
8288  if (mSelected != selected)
8289  {
8290  mSelected = selected;
8291  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
8292  }
8293 }
8294 
8305 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::position(const QString &name) const
8306 {
8307  for (int i=0; i<mPositions.size(); ++i)
8308  {
8309  if (mPositions.at(i)->name() == name)
8310  return mPositions.at(i);
8311  }
8312  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "position with name not found:" << name;
8313  return 0;
8314 }
8315 
8326 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::anchor(const QString &name) const
8327 {
8328  for (int i=0; i<mAnchors.size(); ++i)
8329  {
8330  if (mAnchors.at(i)->name() == name)
8331  return mAnchors.at(i);
8332  }
8333  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor with name not found:" << name;
8334  return 0;
8335 }
8336 
8345 bool QCPAbstractItem::hasAnchor(const QString &name) const
8346 {
8347  for (int i=0; i<mAnchors.size(); ++i)
8348  {
8349  if (mAnchors.at(i)->name() == name)
8350  return true;
8351  }
8352  return false;
8353 }
8354 
8364 QRect QCPAbstractItem::clipRect() const
8365 {
8366  if (mClipToAxisRect && mClipAxisRect)
8367  return mClipAxisRect.data()->rect();
8368  else
8369  return mParentPlot->viewport();
8370 }
8371 
8385 void QCPAbstractItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
8386 {
8387  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeItems);
8388 }
8389 
8402 double QCPAbstractItem::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start, const QPointF &end, const QPointF &point) const
8403 {
8404  QVector2D a(start);
8405  QVector2D b(end);
8406  QVector2D p(point);
8407  QVector2D v(b-a);
8408 
8409  double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
8410  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr))
8411  {
8412  double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p-a, v)/vLengthSqr;
8413  if (mu < 0)
8414  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
8415  else if (mu > 1)
8416  return (b-p).lengthSquared();
8417  else
8418  return ((a + mu*v)-p).lengthSquared();
8419  } else
8420  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
8421 }
8422 
8440 double QCPAbstractItem::rectSelectTest(const QRectF &rect, const QPointF &pos, bool filledRect) const
8441 {
8442  double result = -1;
8443 
8444  // distance to border:
8445  QList<QLineF> lines;
8446  lines << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.topRight()) << QLineF(rect.bottomLeft(), rect.bottomRight())
8447  << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.bottomLeft()) << QLineF(rect.topRight(), rect.bottomRight());
8448  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
8449  for (int i=0; i<lines.size(); ++i)
8450  {
8451  double distSqr = distSqrToLine(lines.at(i).p1(), lines.at(i).p2(), pos);
8452  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
8453  minDistSqr = distSqr;
8454  }
8455  result = qSqrt(minDistSqr);
8456 
8457  // filled rect, allow click inside to count as hit:
8458  if (filledRect && result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99)
8459  {
8460  if (rect.contains(pos))
8461  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
8462  }
8463  return result;
8464 }
8465 
8476 QPointF QCPAbstractItem::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
8477 {
8478  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called on item which shouldn't have any anchors (this method not reimplemented). anchorId" << anchorId;
8479  return QPointF();
8480 }
8481 
8496 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::createPosition(const QString &name)
8497 {
8498  if (hasAnchor(name))
8499  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
8500  QCPItemPosition *newPosition = new QCPItemPosition(mParentPlot, this, name);
8501  mPositions.append(newPosition);
8502  mAnchors.append(newPosition); // every position is also an anchor
8503  newPosition->setAxes(mParentPlot->xAxis, mParentPlot->yAxis);
8504  newPosition->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
8505  if (mParentPlot->axisRect())
8506  newPosition->setAxisRect(mParentPlot->axisRect());
8507  newPosition->setCoords(0, 0);
8508  return newPosition;
8509 }
8510 
8530 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::createAnchor(const QString &name, int anchorId)
8531 {
8532  if (hasAnchor(name))
8533  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
8534  QCPItemAnchor *newAnchor = new QCPItemAnchor(mParentPlot, this, name, anchorId);
8535  mAnchors.append(newAnchor);
8536  return newAnchor;
8537 }
8538 
8539 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8540 void QCPAbstractItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
8541 {
8542  Q_UNUSED(event)
8543  Q_UNUSED(details)
8544  if (mSelectable)
8545  {
8546  bool selBefore = mSelected;
8547  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
8548  if (selectionStateChanged)
8549  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
8550  }
8551 }
8552 
8553 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8554 void QCPAbstractItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
8555 {
8556  if (mSelectable)
8557  {
8558  bool selBefore = mSelected;
8559  setSelected(false);
8560  if (selectionStateChanged)
8561  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
8562  }
8563 }
8564 
8565 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8566 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractItem::selectionCategory() const
8567 {
8568  return QCP::iSelectItems;
8569 }
8570 
8571 
8765 
8778 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
8779 
8801 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
8802 /* start of documentation of signals */
8803 
8991 /* end of documentation of signals */
8992 /* start of documentation of public members */
8993 
9065 /* end of documentation of public members */
9066 
9070 QCustomPlot::QCustomPlot(QWidget *parent) :
9071  QWidget(parent),
9072  xAxis(0),
9073  yAxis(0),
9074  xAxis2(0),
9075  yAxis2(0),
9076  legend(0),
9077  mPlotLayout(0),
9078  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend(true),
9079  mAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
9080  mNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
9081  mInteractions(0),
9082  mSelectionTolerance(8),
9083  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag(false),
9084  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::white, Qt::SolidPattern),
9085  mBackgroundScaled(true),
9086  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
9087  mCurrentLayer(0),
9088  mPlottingHints(QCP::phCacheLabels|QCP::phForceRepaint),
9089  mMultiSelectModifier(Qt::ControlModifier),
9090  mPaintBuffer(size()),
9091  mMouseEventElement(0),
9092  mReplotting(false)
9093 {
9094  setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoMousePropagation);
9095  setAttribute(Qt::WA_OpaquePaintEvent);
9096  setMouseTracking(true);
9097  QLocale currentLocale = locale();
9098  currentLocale.setNumberOptions(QLocale::OmitGroupSeparator);
9099  setLocale(currentLocale);
9100 
9101  // create initial layers:
9102  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "background"));
9103  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "grid"));
9104  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "main"));
9105  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "axes"));
9106  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "legend"));
9107  updateLayerIndices();
9108  setCurrentLayer("main");
9109 
9110  // create initial layout, axis rect and legend:
9111  mPlotLayout = new QCPLayoutGrid;
9112  mPlotLayout->initializeParentPlot(this);
9113  mPlotLayout->setParent(this); // important because if parent is QWidget, QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged will call QWidget::updateGeometry
9114  mPlotLayout->setLayer("main");
9115  QCPAxisRect *defaultAxisRect = new QCPAxisRect(this, true);
9116  mPlotLayout->addElement(0, 0, defaultAxisRect);
9117  xAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
9118  yAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
9119  xAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
9120  yAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
9121  legend = new QCPLegend;
9122  legend->setVisible(false);
9123  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->addElement(legend, Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
9124  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->setMargins(QMargins(12, 12, 12, 12));
9125 
9126  defaultAxisRect->setLayer("background");
9127  xAxis->setLayer("axes");
9128  yAxis->setLayer("axes");
9129  xAxis2->setLayer("axes");
9130  yAxis2->setLayer("axes");
9131  xAxis->grid()->setLayer("grid");
9132  yAxis->grid()->setLayer("grid");
9133  xAxis2->grid()->setLayer("grid");
9134  yAxis2->grid()->setLayer("grid");
9135  legend->setLayer("legend");
9136 
9137  setViewport(rect()); // needs to be called after mPlotLayout has been created
9138 
9139  replot();
9140 }
9141 
9142 QCustomPlot::~QCustomPlot()
9143 {
9144  clearPlottables();
9145  clearItems();
9146 
9147  if (mPlotLayout)
9148  {
9149  delete mPlotLayout;
9150  mPlotLayout = 0;
9151  }
9152 
9153  mCurrentLayer = 0;
9154  qDeleteAll(mLayers); // don't use removeLayer, because it would prevent the last layer to be removed
9155  mLayers.clear();
9156 }
9157 
9175 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &antialiasedElements)
9176 {
9177  mAntialiasedElements = antialiasedElements;
9178 
9179  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
9180  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
9181  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
9182 }
9183 
9191 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement antialiasedElement, bool enabled)
9192 {
9193  if (!enabled && mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
9194  mAntialiasedElements &= ~antialiasedElement;
9195  else if (enabled && !mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
9196  mAntialiasedElements |= antialiasedElement;
9197 
9198  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
9199  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
9200  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
9201 }
9202 
9221 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &notAntialiasedElements)
9222 {
9223  mNotAntialiasedElements = notAntialiasedElements;
9224 
9225  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
9226  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
9227  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
9228 }
9229 
9237 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement notAntialiasedElement, bool enabled)
9238 {
9239  if (!enabled && mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
9240  mNotAntialiasedElements &= ~notAntialiasedElement;
9241  else if (enabled && !mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
9242  mNotAntialiasedElements |= notAntialiasedElement;
9243 
9244  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
9245  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
9246  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
9247 }
9248 
9255 void QCustomPlot::setAutoAddPlottableToLegend(bool on)
9256 {
9257  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend = on;
9258 }
9259 
9314 void QCustomPlot::setInteractions(const QCP::Interactions &interactions)
9315 {
9316  mInteractions = interactions;
9317 }
9318 
9326 void QCustomPlot::setInteraction(const QCP::Interaction &interaction, bool enabled)
9327 {
9328  if (!enabled && mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
9329  mInteractions &= ~interaction;
9330  else if (enabled && !mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
9331  mInteractions |= interaction;
9332 }

9347 void QCustomPlot::setSelectionTolerance(int pixels)
9348 {
9349  mSelectionTolerance = pixels;

9363  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag = enabled;
9364 }

9371 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHints(const QCP::PlottingHints &hints)
9372 {
9373  mPlottingHints = hints;
9374 }
9375 
9381 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHint(QCP::PlottingHint hint, bool enabled)
9382 {
9383  QCP::PlottingHints newHints = mPlottingHints;
9384  if (!enabled)
9385  newHints &= ~hint;
9386  else
9387  newHints |= hint;
9388 
9389  if (newHints != mPlottingHints)
9390  setPlottingHints(newHints);
9391 }
9392 
9403 void QCustomPlot::setMultiSelectModifier(Qt::KeyboardModifier modifier)
9404 {
9405  mMultiSelectModifier = modifier;
9406 }
9407

9416 {
9417  mViewport = rect;
9418  if (mPlotLayout)
9419  mPlotLayout->setOuterRect(mViewport);
9420 }

9439  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
9440  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();

9457 {
9458  mBackgroundBrush = brush;
9459 }

9468 void QCustomPlot::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
9469 {
9470  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
9471  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
9472  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
9473  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
9474 }

9486 void QCustomPlot::setBackgroundScaled(bool scaled)
9487 {
9488  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
9489 }
