9498 {
9499  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
9500 }
9501 
9510 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable(int index)
9511 {
9512  if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
9513  {
9514  return mPlottables.at(index);
9515  } else
9516  {
9517  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
9518  return 0;
9519  }
9520 }
9521 
9529 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable()
9530 {
9531  if (!mPlottables.isEmpty())
9532  {
9533  return mPlottables.last();
9534  } else
9535  return 0;
9536 }
9537 
9548 bool QCustomPlot::addPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
9549 {
9550  if (mPlottables.contains(plottable))
9551  {
9552  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable already added to this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
9553  return false;
9554  }
9555  if (plottable->parentPlot() != this)
9556  {
9557  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
9558  return false;
9559  }
9560 
9561  mPlottables.append(plottable);
9562  // possibly add plottable to legend:
9563  if (mAutoAddPlottableToLegend)
9564  plottable->addToLegend();
9565  // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
9566  if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph*>(plottable))
9567  mGraphs.append(graph);
9568  if (!plottable->layer()) // usually the layer is already set in the constructor of the plottable (via QCPLayerable constructor)
9569  plottable->setLayer(currentLayer());
9570  return true;
9571 }
9572 
9580 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
9581 {
9582  if (!mPlottables.contains(plottable))
9583  {
9584  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
9585  return false;
9586  }
9587 
9588  // remove plottable from legend:
9589  plottable->removeFromLegend();
9590  // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
9591  if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph*>(plottable))
9592  mGraphs.removeOne(graph);
9593  // remove plottable:
9594  delete plottable;
9595  mPlottables.removeOne(plottable);
9596  return true;
9597 }
9598 
9603 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(int index)
9604 {
9605  if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
9606  return removePlottable(mPlottables[index]);
9607  else
9608  {
9609  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
9610  return false;
9611  }
9612 }
9613 
9621 int QCustomPlot::clearPlottables()
9622 {
9623  int c = mPlottables.size();
9624  for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
9625  removePlottable(mPlottables[i]);
9626  return c;
9627 }
9628 
9634 int QCustomPlot::plottableCount() const
9635 {
9636  return mPlottables.size();
9637 }
9638 
9646 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCustomPlot::selectedPlottables() const
9647 {
9648  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
9649  foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mPlottables)
9650  {
9651  if (plottable->selected())
9652  result.append(plottable);
9653  }
9654  return result;
9655 }
9656 
9669 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottableAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable) const
9670 {
9671  QCPAbstractPlottable *resultPlottable = 0;
9672  double resultDistance = mSelectionTolerance; // only regard clicks with distances smaller than mSelectionTolerance as selections, so initialize with that value
9673 
9674  foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mPlottables)
9675  {
9676  if (onlySelectable && !plottable->selectable()) // we could have also passed onlySelectable to the selectTest function, but checking here is faster, because we have access to QCPabstractPlottable::selectable
9677  continue;
9678  if ((plottable->keyAxis()->axisRect()->rect() & plottable->valueAxis()->axisRect()->rect()).contains(pos.toPoint())) // only consider clicks inside the rect that is spanned by the plottable's key/value axes
9679  {
9680  double currentDistance = plottable->selectTest(pos, false);
9681  if (currentDistance >= 0 && currentDistance < resultDistance)
9682  {
9683  resultPlottable = plottable;
9684  resultDistance = currentDistance;
9685  }
9686  }
9687  }
9688 
9689  return resultPlottable;
9690 }
9691 
9697 bool QCustomPlot::hasPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
9698 {
9699  return mPlottables.contains(plottable);
9700 }
9701 
9710 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph(int index) const
9711 {
9712  if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
9713  {
9714  return mGraphs.at(index);
9715  } else
9716  {
9717  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
9718  return 0;
9719  }
9720 }
9721 
9729 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph() const
9730 {
9731  if (!mGraphs.isEmpty())
9732  {
9733  return mGraphs.last();
9734  } else
9735  return 0;
9736 }
9737 
9750 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::addGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
9751 {
9752  if (!keyAxis) keyAxis = xAxis;
9753  if (!valueAxis) valueAxis = yAxis;
9754  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis)
9755  {
9756  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't use default QCustomPlot xAxis or yAxis, because at least one is invalid (has been deleted)";
9757  return 0;
9758  }
9759  if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != this || valueAxis->parentPlot() != this)
9760  {
9761  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed keyAxis or valueAxis doesn't have this QCustomPlot as parent";
9762  return 0;
9763  }
9764 
9765  QCPGraph *newGraph = new QCPGraph(keyAxis, valueAxis);
9766  if (addPlottable(newGraph))
9767  {
9768  newGraph->setName("Graph "+QString::number(mGraphs.size()));
9769  return newGraph;
9770  } else
9771  {
9772  delete newGraph;
9773  return 0;
9774  }
9775 }
9776 
9786 bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
9787 {
9788  return removePlottable(graph);
9789 }
9790 
9795 bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(int index)
9796 {
9797  if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
9798  return removeGraph(mGraphs[index]);
9799  else
9800  return false;
9801 }
9802 
9810 int QCustomPlot::clearGraphs()
9811 {
9812  int c = mGraphs.size();
9813  for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
9814  removeGraph(mGraphs[i]);
9815  return c;
9816 }
9817 
9823 int QCustomPlot::graphCount() const
9824 {
9825  return mGraphs.size();
9826 }
9827 
9836 QList<QCPGraph*> QCustomPlot::selectedGraphs() const
9837 {
9838  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
9839  foreach (QCPGraph *graph, mGraphs)
9840  {
9841  if (graph->selected())
9842  result.append(graph);
9843  }
9844  return result;
9845 }
9846 
9855 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::item(int index) const
9856 {
9857  if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
9858  {
9859  return mItems.at(index);
9860  } else
9861  {
9862  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
9863  return 0;
9864  }
9865 }
9866 
9874 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::item() const
9875 {
9876  if (!mItems.isEmpty())
9877  {
9878  return mItems.last();
9879  } else
9880  return 0;
9881 }
9882 
9891 bool QCustomPlot::addItem(QCPAbstractItem *item)
9892 {
9893  if (!mItems.contains(item) && item->parentPlot() == this)
9894  {
9895  mItems.append(item);
9896  return true;
9897  } else
9898  {
9899  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item either already in list or not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
9900  return false;
9901  }
9902 }
9903 
9911 bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(QCPAbstractItem *item)
9912 {
9913  if (mItems.contains(item))
9914  {
9915  delete item;
9916  mItems.removeOne(item);
9917  return true;
9918  } else
9919  {
9920  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
9921  return false;
9922  }
9923 }
9924 
9929 bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(int index)
9930 {
9931  if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
9932  return removeItem(mItems[index]);
9933  else
9934  {
9935  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
9936  return false;
9937  }
9938 }
9939 
9947 int QCustomPlot::clearItems()
9948 {
9949  int c = mItems.size();
9950  for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
9951  removeItem(mItems[i]);
9952  return c;
9953 }
9954 
9960 int QCustomPlot::itemCount() const
9961 {
9962  return mItems.size();
9963 }
9964 
9970 QList<QCPAbstractItem*> QCustomPlot::selectedItems() const
9971 {
9972  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
9973  foreach (QCPAbstractItem *item, mItems)
9974  {
9975  if (item->selected())
9976  result.append(item);
9977  }
9978  return result;
9979 }
9980 
9994 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::itemAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable) const
9995 {
9996  QCPAbstractItem *resultItem = 0;
9997  double resultDistance = mSelectionTolerance; // only regard clicks with distances smaller than mSelectionTolerance as selections, so initialize with that value
9998 
9999  foreach (QCPAbstractItem *item, mItems)
10000  {
10001  if (onlySelectable && !item->selectable()) // we could have also passed onlySelectable to the selectTest function, but checking here is faster, because we have access to QCPAbstractItem::selectable
10002  continue;
10003  if (!item->clipToAxisRect() || item->clipRect().contains(pos.toPoint())) // only consider clicks inside axis cliprect of the item if actually clipped to it
10004  {
10005  double currentDistance = item->selectTest(pos, false);
10006  if (currentDistance >= 0 && currentDistance < resultDistance)
10007  {
10008  resultItem = item;
10009  resultDistance = currentDistance;
10010  }
10011  }
10012  }
10013 
10014  return resultItem;
10015 }
10016 
10022 bool QCustomPlot::hasItem(QCPAbstractItem *item) const
10023 {
10024  return mItems.contains(item);
10025 }
10026 
10035 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(const QString &name) const
10036 {
10037  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
10038  {
10039  if (layer->name() == name)
10040  return layer;
10041  }
10042  return 0;
10043 }
10044 
10051 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(int index) const
10052 {
10053  if (index >= 0 && index < mLayers.size())
10054  {
10055  return mLayers.at(index);
10056  } else
10057  {
10058  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
10059  return 0;
10060  }
10061 }
10062 
10066 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::currentLayer() const
10067 {
10068  return mCurrentLayer;
10069 }
10070 
10081 bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(const QString &name)
10082 {
10083  if (QCPLayer *newCurrentLayer = layer(name))
10084  {
10085  return setCurrentLayer(newCurrentLayer);
10086  } else
10087  {
10088  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer with name doesn't exist:" << name;
10089  return false;
10090  }
10091 }
10092 
10101 bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
10102 {
10103  if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
10104  {
10105  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
10106  return false;
10107  }
10108 
10109  mCurrentLayer = layer;
10110  return true;
10111 }
10112 
10118 int QCustomPlot::layerCount() const
10119 {
10120  return mLayers.size();
10121 }
10122 
10136 bool QCustomPlot::addLayer(const QString &name, QCPLayer *otherLayer, QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode)
10137 {
10138  if (!otherLayer)
10139  otherLayer = mLayers.last();
10140  if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer))
10141  {
10142  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
10143  return false;
10144  }
10145  if (layer(name))
10146  {
10147  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "A layer exists already with the name" << name;
10148  return false;
10149  }
10150 
10151  QCPLayer *newLayer = new QCPLayer(this, name);
10152  mLayers.insert(otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 1:0), newLayer);
10153  updateLayerIndices();
10154  return true;
10155 }
10156 
10171 bool QCustomPlot::removeLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
10172 {
10173  if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
10174  {
10175  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
10176  return false;
10177  }
10178  if (mLayers.size() < 2)
10179  {
10180  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't remove last layer";
10181  return false;
10182  }
10183 
10184  // append all children of this layer to layer below (if this is lowest layer, prepend to layer above)
10185  int removedIndex = layer->index();
10186  bool isFirstLayer = removedIndex==0;
10187  QCPLayer *targetLayer = isFirstLayer ? mLayers.at(removedIndex+1) : mLayers.at(removedIndex-1);
10188  QList<QCPLayerable*> children = layer->children();
10189  if (isFirstLayer) // prepend in reverse order (so order relative to each other stays the same)
10190  {
10191  for (int i=children.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
10192  children.at(i)->moveToLayer(targetLayer, true);
10193  } else // append normally
10194  {
10195  for (int i=0; i<children.size(); ++i)
10196  children.at(i)->moveToLayer(targetLayer, false);
10197  }
10198  // if removed layer is current layer, change current layer to layer below/above:
10199  if (layer == mCurrentLayer)
10200  setCurrentLayer(targetLayer);
10201  // remove layer:
10202  delete layer;
10203  mLayers.removeOne(layer);
10204  updateLayerIndices();
10205  return true;
10206 }
10207 
10217 bool QCustomPlot::moveLayer(QCPLayer *layer, QCPLayer *otherLayer, QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode)
10218 {
10219  if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
10220  {
10221  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
10222  return false;
10223  }
10224  if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer))
10225  {
10226  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
10227  return false;
10228  }
10229 
10230  mLayers.move(layer->index(), otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 1:0));
10231  updateLayerIndices();
10232  return true;
10233 }
10234 
10244 int QCustomPlot::axisRectCount() const
10245 {
10246  return axisRects().size();
10247 }
10248 
10258 QCPAxisRect *QCustomPlot::axisRect(int index) const
10259 {
10260  const QList<QCPAxisRect*> rectList = axisRects();
10261  if (index >= 0 && index < rectList.size())
10262  {
10263  return rectList.at(index);
10264  } else
10265  {
10266  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis rect index" << index;
10267  return 0;
10268  }
10269 }
10270 
10276 QList<QCPAxisRect*> QCustomPlot::axisRects() const
10277 {
10278  QList<QCPAxisRect*> result;
10279  QStack<QCPLayoutElement*> elementStack;
10280  if (mPlotLayout)
10281  elementStack.push(mPlotLayout);
10282 
10283  while (!elementStack.isEmpty())
10284  {
10285  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *element, elementStack.pop()->elements(false))
10286  {
10287  if (element)
10288  {
10289  elementStack.push(element);
10290  if (QCPAxisRect *ar = qobject_cast<QCPAxisRect*>(element))
10291  result.append(ar);
10292  }
10293  }
10294  }
10295 
10296  return result;
10297 }
10298 
10308 QCPLayoutElement *QCustomPlot::layoutElementAt(const QPointF &pos) const
10309 {
10310  QCPLayoutElement *currentElement = mPlotLayout;
10311  bool searchSubElements = true;
10312  while (searchSubElements && currentElement)
10313  {
10314  searchSubElements = false;
10315  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, currentElement->elements(false))
10316  {
10317  if (subElement && subElement->realVisibility() && subElement->selectTest(pos, false) >= 0)
10318  {
10319  currentElement = subElement;
10320  searchSubElements = true;
10321  break;
10322  }
10323  }
10324  }
10325  return currentElement;
10326 }
10327 
10335 QList<QCPAxis*> QCustomPlot::selectedAxes() const
10336 {
10337  QList<QCPAxis*> result, allAxes;
10338  foreach (QCPAxisRect *rect, axisRects())
10339  allAxes << rect->axes();
10340 
10341  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, allAxes)
10342  {
10343  if (axis->selectedParts() != QCPAxis::spNone)
10344  result.append(axis);
10345  }
10346 
10347  return result;
10348 }
10349 
10357 QList<QCPLegend*> QCustomPlot::selectedLegends() const
10358 {
10359  QList<QCPLegend*> result;
10360 
10361  QStack<QCPLayoutElement*> elementStack;
10362  if (mPlotLayout)
10363  elementStack.push(mPlotLayout);
10364 
10365  while (!elementStack.isEmpty())
10366  {
10367  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, elementStack.pop()->elements(false))
10368  {
10369  if (subElement)
10370  {
10371  elementStack.push(subElement);
10372  if (QCPLegend *leg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(subElement))
10373  {
10374  if (leg->selectedParts() != QCPLegend::spNone)
10375  result.append(leg);
10376  }
10377  }
10378  }
10379  }
10380 
10381  return result;
10382 }
10383 
10393 void QCustomPlot::deselectAll()
10394 {
10395  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
10396  {
10397  foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
10398  layerable->deselectEvent(0);
10399  }
10400 }
10401 
10415 void QCustomPlot::replot(QCustomPlot::RefreshPriority refreshPriority)
10416 {
10417  if (mReplotting) // incase signals loop back to replot slot
10418  return;
10419  mReplotting = true;
10420  emit beforeReplot();
10421 
10422  mPaintBuffer.fill(mBackgroundBrush.style() == Qt::SolidPattern ? mBackgroundBrush.color() : Qt::transparent);
10423  QCPPainter painter;
10424  painter.begin(&mPaintBuffer);
10425  if (painter.isActive())
10426  {
10427  painter.setRenderHint(QPainter::HighQualityAntialiasing); // to make Antialiasing look good if using the OpenGL graphicssystem
10428  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::SolidPattern && mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
10429  painter.fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
10430  draw(&painter);
10431  painter.end();
10432  if ((refreshPriority == rpHint && mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phForceRepaint)) || refreshPriority==rpImmediate)
10433  repaint();
10434  else
10435  update();
10436  } else // might happen if QCustomPlot has width or height zero
10437  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Couldn't activate painter on buffer";
10438 
10439  emit afterReplot();
10440  mReplotting = false;
10441 }
10442 
10451 void QCustomPlot::rescaleAxes(bool onlyVisiblePlottables)
10452 {
10453  QList<QCPAxis*> allAxes;
10454  foreach (QCPAxisRect *rect, axisRects())
10455  allAxes << rect->axes();
10456 
10457  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, allAxes)
10458  axis->rescale(onlyVisiblePlottables);
10459 }
10460 
10498 bool QCustomPlot::savePdf(const QString &fileName, bool noCosmeticPen, int width, int height, const QString &pdfCreator, const QString &pdfTitle)
10499 {
10500  bool success = false;
10501 #ifdef QT_NO_PRINTER
10502  Q_UNUSED(fileName)
10503  Q_UNUSED(noCosmeticPen)
10504  Q_UNUSED(width)
10505  Q_UNUSED(height)
10506  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Qt was built without printer support (QT_NO_PRINTER). PDF not created.";
10507 #else
10508  int newWidth, newHeight;
10509  if (width == 0 || height == 0)
10510  {
10511  newWidth = this->width();
10512  newHeight = this->height();
10513  } else
10514  {
10515  newWidth = width;
10516  newHeight = height;
10517  }
10518 
10519  QPrinter printer(QPrinter::ScreenResolution);
10520  printer.setOutputFileName(fileName);
10521  printer.setOutputFormat(QPrinter::PdfFormat);
10522  printer.setFullPage(true);
10523  printer.setColorMode(QPrinter::Color);
10524  printer.printEngine()->setProperty(QPrintEngine::PPK_Creator, pdfCreator);
10525  printer.printEngine()->setProperty(QPrintEngine::PPK_DocumentName, pdfTitle);
10526  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
10527  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
10528  printer.setPaperSize(viewport().size(), QPrinter::DevicePixel);
10529  QCPPainter printpainter;
10530  if (printpainter.begin(&printer))
10531  {
10532  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmVectorized);
10533  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
10534  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic, noCosmeticPen);
10535  printpainter.setWindow(mViewport);
10536  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush &&
10537  mBackgroundBrush.color() != Qt::white &&
10538  mBackgroundBrush.color() != Qt::transparent &&
10539  mBackgroundBrush.color().alpha() > 0) // draw pdf background color if not white/transparent
10540  printpainter.fillRect(viewport(), mBackgroundBrush);
10541  draw(&printpainter);
10542  printpainter.end();
10543  success = true;
10544  }
10545  setViewport(oldViewport);
10546 #endif // QT_NO_PRINTER
10547  return success;
10548 }
10549 
10587 bool QCustomPlot::savePng(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int quality)
10588 {
10589  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "PNG", quality);
10590 }
10591 
10626 bool QCustomPlot::saveJpg(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int quality)
10627 {
10628  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "JPG", quality);
10629 }
10630 
10662 bool QCustomPlot::saveBmp(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale)
10663 {
10664  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "BMP");
10665 }
10666 
10675 QSize QCustomPlot::minimumSizeHint() const
10676 {
10677  return mPlotLayout->minimumSizeHint();
10678 }
10679 
10685 QSize QCustomPlot::sizeHint() const
10686 {
10687  return mPlotLayout->minimumSizeHint();
10688 }
10689 
10695 void QCustomPlot::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event)
10696 {
10697  Q_UNUSED(event);
10698  QPainter painter(this);
10699  painter.drawPixmap(0, 0, mPaintBuffer);
10700 }
10701 
10708 void QCustomPlot::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event)
10709 {
10710  // resize and repaint the buffer:
10711  mPaintBuffer = QPixmap(event->size());
10712  setViewport(rect());
10713  replot(rpQueued); // queued update is important here, to prevent painting issues in some contexts
10714 }
10715 
10725 void QCustomPlot::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
10726 {
10727  emit mouseDoubleClick(event);
10728 
10729  QVariant details;
10730  QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable = layerableAt(event->pos(), false, &details);
10731 
10732  // emit specialized object double click signals:
10733  if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractPlottable*>(clickedLayerable))
10734  emit plottableDoubleClick(ap, event);
10735  else if (QCPAxis *ax = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(clickedLayerable))
10736  emit axisDoubleClick(ax, details.value<QCPAxis::SelectablePart>(), event);
10737  else if (QCPAbstractItem *ai = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractItem*>(clickedLayerable))
10738  emit itemDoubleClick(ai, event);
10739  else if (QCPLegend *lg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(clickedLayerable))
10740  emit legendDoubleClick(lg, 0, event);
10741  else if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *li = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(clickedLayerable))
10742  emit legendDoubleClick(li->parentLegend(), li, event);
10743  else if (QCPPlotTitle *pt = qobject_cast<QCPPlotTitle*>(clickedLayerable))
10744  emit titleDoubleClick(event, pt);
10745 
10746  // call double click event of affected layout element:
10747  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = layoutElementAt(event->pos()))
10748  el->mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
10749 
10750  // call release event of affected layout element (as in mouseReleaseEvent, since the mouseDoubleClick replaces the second release event in double click case):
10751  if (mMouseEventElement)
10752  {
10753  mMouseEventElement->mouseReleaseEvent(event);
10754  mMouseEventElement = 0;
10755  }
10756 
10757  //QWidget::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event); don't call base class implementation because it would just cause a mousePress/ReleaseEvent, which we don't want.
10758 }
10759 
10767 void QCustomPlot::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
10768 {
10769  emit mousePress(event);
10770  mMousePressPos = event->pos(); // need this to determine in releaseEvent whether it was a click (no position change between press and release)
10771 
10772  // call event of affected layout element:
10773  mMouseEventElement = layoutElementAt(event->pos());
10774  if (mMouseEventElement)
10775  mMouseEventElement->mousePressEvent(event);
10776 
10777  QWidget::mousePressEvent(event);
10778 }
10779 
10789 void QCustomPlot::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
10790 {
10791  emit mouseMove(event);
10792 
10793  // call event of affected layout element:
10794  if (mMouseEventElement)
10795  mMouseEventElement->mouseMoveEvent(event);
10796 
10797  QWidget::mouseMoveEvent(event);
10798 }
10799 
10814 void QCustomPlot::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
10815 {
10816  emit mouseRelease(event);
10817  bool doReplot = false;
10818 
10819  if ((mMousePressPos-event->pos()).manhattanLength() < 5) // determine whether it was a click operation
10820  {
10821  if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
10822  {
10823  // handle selection mechanism:
10824  QVariant details;
10825  QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable = layerableAt(event->pos(), true, &details);
10826  bool selectionStateChanged = false;
10827  bool additive = mInteractions.testFlag(QCP::iMultiSelect) && event->modifiers().testFlag(mMultiSelectModifier);
10828  // deselect all other layerables if not additive selection:
10829  if (!additive)
10830  {
10831  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
10832  {
10833  foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
10834  {
10835  if (layerable != clickedLayerable && mInteractions.testFlag(layerable->selectionCategory()))
10836  {
10837  bool selChanged = false;
10838  layerable->deselectEvent(&selChanged);
10839  selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
10840  }
10841  }
10842  }
10843  }
10844  if (clickedLayerable && mInteractions.testFlag(clickedLayerable->selectionCategory()))
10845  {
10846  // a layerable was actually clicked, call its selectEvent:
10847  bool selChanged = false;
10848  clickedLayerable->selectEvent(event, additive, details, &selChanged);
10849  selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
10850  }
10851  doReplot = true;
10852  if (selectionStateChanged)
10853  emit selectionChangedByUser();
10854  }
10855 
10856  // emit specialized object click signals:
10857  QVariant details;
10858  QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable = layerableAt(event->pos(), false, &details); // for these signals, selectability is ignored, that's why we call this again with onlySelectable set to false
10859  if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractPlottable*>(clickedLayerable))
10860  emit plottableClick(ap, event);
10861  else if (QCPAxis *ax = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(clickedLayerable))
10862  emit axisClick(ax, details.value<QCPAxis::SelectablePart>(), event);
10863  else if (QCPAbstractItem *ai = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractItem*>(clickedLayerable))
10864  emit itemClick(ai, event);
10865  else if (QCPLegend *lg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(clickedLayerable))
10866  emit legendClick(lg, 0, event);
10867  else if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *li = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(clickedLayerable))
10868  emit legendClick(li->parentLegend(), li, event);
10869  else if (QCPPlotTitle *pt = qobject_cast<QCPPlotTitle*>(clickedLayerable))
10870  emit titleClick(event, pt);
10871  }
10872 
10873  // call event of affected layout element:
10874  if (mMouseEventElement)
10875  {
10876  mMouseEventElement->mouseReleaseEvent(event);
10877  mMouseEventElement = 0;
10878  }
10879 
10880  if (doReplot || noAntialiasingOnDrag())
10881  replot();
10882 
10883  QWidget::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
10884 }
10885 
10892 void QCustomPlot::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
10893 {
10894  emit mouseWheel(event);
10895 
10896  // call event of affected layout element:
10897  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = layoutElementAt(event->pos()))
10898  el->wheelEvent(event);
10899 
10900  QWidget::wheelEvent(event);
10901 }
10902 
10910 void QCustomPlot::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
10911 {
10912  // run through layout phases:
10913  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upPreparation);
10914  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upMargins);
10915  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upLayout);
10916 
10917  // draw viewport background pixmap:
10918  drawBackground(painter);
10919 
10920  // draw all layered objects (grid, axes, plottables, items, legend,...):
10921  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
10922  {
10923  foreach (QCPLayerable *child, layer->children())
10924  {
10925  if (child->realVisibility())
10926  {
10927  painter->save();
10928  painter->setClipRect(child->clipRect().translated(0, -1));
10929  child->applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
10930  child->draw(painter);
10931  painter->restore();
10932  }
10933  }
10934  }
10935 
10936  /* Debug code to draw all layout element rects
10937  foreach (QCPLayoutElement* el, findChildren<QCPLayoutElement*>())
10938  {
10939  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
10940  painter->setPen(QPen(QColor(0, 0, 0, 100), 0, Qt::DashLine));
10941  painter->drawRect(el->rect());
10942  painter->setPen(QPen(QColor(255, 0, 0, 100), 0, Qt::DashLine));
10943  painter->drawRect(el->outerRect());
10944  }
10945  */
10946 }
10947 
10965 void QCustomPlot::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
10966 {
10967  // Note: background color is handled in individual replot/save functions
10968 
10969  // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
10970  if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
10971  {
10972  if (mBackgroundScaled)
10973  {
10974  // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
10975  QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
10976  scaledSize.scale(mViewport.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
10977  if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
10978  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mViewport.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
10979  painter->drawPixmap(mViewport.topLeft(), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mViewport.width(), mViewport.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
10980  } else
10981  {
10982  painter->drawPixmap(mViewport.topLeft(), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mViewport.width(), mViewport.height()));
10983  }
10984  }
10985 }
10986 
10987 
10993 void QCustomPlot::axisRemoved(QCPAxis *axis)
10994 {
10995  if (xAxis == axis)
10996  xAxis = 0;
10997  if (xAxis2 == axis)
10998  xAxis2 = 0;
10999  if (yAxis == axis)
11000  yAxis = 0;
11001  if (yAxis2 == axis)
11002  yAxis2 = 0;
11003 
11004  // Note: No need to take care of range drag axes and range zoom axes, because they are stored in smart pointers
11005 }
11006 
11012 void QCustomPlot::legendRemoved(QCPLegend *legend)
11013 {
11014  if (this->legend == legend)
11015  this->legend = 0;
11016 }
11017 
11024 void QCustomPlot::updateLayerIndices() const
11025 {
11026  for (int i=0; i<mLayers.size(); ++i)
11027  mLayers.at(i)->mIndex = i;
11028 }
11029 
11042 QCPLayerable *QCustomPlot::layerableAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *selectionDetails) const
11043 {
11044  for (int layerIndex=mLayers.size()-1; layerIndex>=0; --layerIndex)
11045  {
11046  const QList<QCPLayerable*> layerables = mLayers.at(layerIndex)->children();
11047  double minimumDistance = selectionTolerance()*1.1;
11048  QCPLayerable *minimumDistanceLayerable = 0;
11049  for (int i=layerables.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
11050  {
11051  if (!layerables.at(i)->realVisibility())
11052  continue;
11053  QVariant details;
11054  double dist = layerables.at(i)->selectTest(pos, onlySelectable, &details);
11055  if (dist >= 0 && dist < minimumDistance)
11056  {
11057  minimumDistance = dist;
11058  minimumDistanceLayerable = layerables.at(i);
11059  if (selectionDetails) *selectionDetails = details;
11060  }
11061  }
11062  if (minimumDistance < selectionTolerance())
11063  return minimumDistanceLayerable;
11064  }
11065  return 0;
11066 }
11067 
11079 bool QCustomPlot::saveRastered(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, const char *format, int quality)
11080 {
11081  QPixmap buffer = toPixmap(width, height, scale);
11082  if (!buffer.isNull())
11083  return buffer.save(fileName, format, quality);
11084  else
11085  return false;
11086 }
11087 
11096 QPixmap QCustomPlot::toPixmap(int width, int height, double scale)
11097 {
11098  // this method is somewhat similar to toPainter. Change something here, and a change in toPainter might be necessary, too.
11099  int newWidth, newHeight;
11100  if (width == 0 || height == 0)
11101  {
11102  newWidth = this->width();
11103  newHeight = this->height();
11104  } else
11105  {
11106  newWidth = width;
11107  newHeight = height;
11108  }
11109  int scaledWidth = qRound(scale*newWidth);
11110  int scaledHeight = qRound(scale*newHeight);
11111 
11112  QPixmap result(scaledWidth, scaledHeight);
11113  result.fill(mBackgroundBrush.style() == Qt::SolidPattern ? mBackgroundBrush.color() : Qt::transparent); // if using non-solid pattern, make transparent now and draw brush pattern later
11114  QCPPainter painter;
11115  painter.begin(&result);
11116  if (painter.isActive())
11117  {
11118  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
11119  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
11120  painter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
11121  if (!qFuzzyCompare(scale, 1.0))
11122  {
11123  if (scale > 1.0) // for scale < 1 we always want cosmetic pens where possible, because else lines might disappear for very small scales
11124  painter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic);
11125  painter.scale(scale, scale);
11126  }
11127  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::SolidPattern && mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
11128  painter.fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
11129  draw(&painter);
11130  setViewport(oldViewport);
11131  painter.end();
11132  } else // might happen if pixmap has width or height zero
11133  {
11134  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Couldn't activate painter on pixmap";
11135  return QPixmap();
11136  }
11137  return result;
11138 }
11139 
11152 void QCustomPlot::toPainter(QCPPainter *painter, int width, int height)
11153 {
11154  // this method is somewhat similar to toPixmap. Change something here, and a change in toPixmap might be necessary, too.
11155  int newWidth, newHeight;
11156  if (width == 0 || height == 0)
11157  {
11158  newWidth = this->width();
11159  newHeight = this->height();
11160  } else
11161  {
11162  newWidth = width;
11163  newHeight = height;
11164  }
11165 
11166  if (painter->isActive())
11167  {
11168  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
11169  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
11170  painter->setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
11171  // warning: the following is different in toPixmap, because a solid background color is applied there via QPixmap::fill
11172  // here, we need to do this via QPainter::fillRect.
11173  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
11174  painter->fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
11175  draw(painter);
11176  setViewport(oldViewport);
11177  } else
11178  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed painter is not active";
11179 }
11180 
11181 
11185 
11218 QCPColorGradient::QCPColorGradient(GradientPreset preset) :
11219  mLevelCount(350),
11220  mColorInterpolation(ciRGB),
11221  mPeriodic(false),
11222  mColorBufferInvalidated(true)
11223 {
11224  mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0), mLevelCount);
11225  loadPreset(preset);
11226 }
11227 
11228 /* undocumented operator */
11229 bool QCPColorGradient::operator==(const QCPColorGradient &other) const
11230 {
11231  return ((other.mLevelCount == this->mLevelCount) &&
11232  (other.mColorInterpolation == this->mColorInterpolation) &&
11233  (other.mPeriodic == this->mPeriodic) &&
11234  (other.mColorStops == this->mColorStops));
11235 }
11236 
11243 void QCPColorGradient::setLevelCount(int n)
11244 {
11245  if (n < 2)
11246  {
11247  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "n must be greater or equal 2 but was" << n;
11248  n = 2;
11249  }
11250  if (n != mLevelCount)
11251  {
11252  mLevelCount = n;
11253  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
11254  }
11255 }
11256 
11267 void QCPColorGradient::setColorStops(const QMap<double, QColor> &colorStops)
11268 {
11269  mColorStops = colorStops;
11270  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
11271 }
11272 
11279 void QCPColorGradient::setColorStopAt(double position, const QColor &color)
11280 {
11281  mColorStops.insert(position, color);
11282  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
11283 }
11284 
11292 void QCPColorGradient::setColorInterpolation(QCPColorGradient::ColorInterpolation interpolation)
11293 {
11294  if (interpolation != mColorInterpolation)
11295  {
11296  mColorInterpolation = interpolation;
11297  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
11298  }
11299 }
11300 
11316 void QCPColorGradient::setPeriodic(bool enabled)
11317 {
11318  mPeriodic = enabled;
11319 }
11320 
11333 void QCPColorGradient::colorize(const double *data, const QCPRange &range, QRgb *scanLine, int n, int dataIndexFactor, bool logarithmic)
11334 {
11335  // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt ::color()
11336  if (!data)
11337  {
11338  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as data";
11339  return;
11340  }
11341  if (!scanLine)
11342  {
11343  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as scanLine";
11344  return;
11345  }
11346  if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
11347  updateColorBuffer();
11348 
11349  if (!logarithmic)
11350  {
11351  const double posToIndexFactor = mLevelCount/range.size();
11352  if (mPeriodic)
11353  {
11354  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
11355  {
11356  int index = (int)((data[dataIndexFactor*i]-range.lower)*posToIndexFactor) % mLevelCount;
11357  if (index < 0)
11358  index += mLevelCount;
11359  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
11360  }
11361  } else
11362  {
11363  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
11364  {
11365  int index = (data[dataIndexFactor*i]-range.lower)*posToIndexFactor;
11366  if (index < 0)
11367  index = 0;
11368  else if (index >= mLevelCount)
11369  index = mLevelCount-1;
11370  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
11371  }
11372  }
11373  } else // logarithmic == true
11374  {
11375  if (mPeriodic)
11376  {
11377  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
11378  {
11379  int index = (int)(qLn(data[dataIndexFactor*i]/range.lower)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower)*mLevelCount) % mLevelCount;
11380  if (index < 0)
11381  index += mLevelCount;
11382  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
11383  }
11384  } else
11385  {
11386  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
11387  {
11388  int index = qLn(data[dataIndexFactor*i]/range.lower)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower)*mLevelCount;
11389  if (index < 0)
11390  index = 0;
11391  else if (index >= mLevelCount)
11392  index = mLevelCount-1;
11393  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
11394  }
11395  }
11396  }
11397 }
11398 
11408 QRgb QCPColorGradient::color(double position, const QCPRange &range, bool logarithmic)
11409 {
11410  // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt ::colorize()
11411  if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
11412  updateColorBuffer();
11413  int index = 0;
11414  if (!logarithmic)
11415  index = (position-range.lower)*mLevelCount/range.size();
11416  else
11417  index = qLn(position/range.lower)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower)*mLevelCount;
11418  if (mPeriodic)
11419  {
11420  index = index % mLevelCount;
11421  if (index < 0)
11422  index += mLevelCount;
11423  } else
11424  {
11425  if (index < 0)
11426  index = 0;
11427  else if (index >= mLevelCount)
11428  index = mLevelCount-1;
11429  }
11430  return mColorBuffer.at(index);
11431 }
11432 
11440 void QCPColorGradient::loadPreset(GradientPreset preset)
11441 {
11442  clearColorStops();
11443  switch (preset)
11444  {
11445  case gpGrayscale:
11446  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11447  setColorStopAt(0, Qt::black);
11448  setColorStopAt(1, Qt::white);
11449  break;
11450  case gpHot:
11451  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11452  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 0, 0));
11453  setColorStopAt(0.2, QColor(180, 10, 0));
11454  setColorStopAt(0.4, QColor(245, 50, 0));
11455  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 150, 10));
11456  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(255, 255, 50));
11457  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
11458  break;
11459  case gpCold:
11460  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11461  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 50));
11462  setColorStopAt(0.2, QColor(0, 10, 180));
11463  setColorStopAt(0.4, QColor(0, 50, 245));
11464  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(10, 150, 255));
11465  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(50, 255, 255));
11466  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
11467  break;
11468  case gpNight:
11469  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
11470  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(10, 20, 30));
11471  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(250, 255, 250));
11472  break;
11473  case gpCandy:
11474  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
11475  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 255));
11476  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 250, 250));
11477  break;
11478  case gpGeography:
11479  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11480  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(70, 170, 210));
11481  setColorStopAt(0.20, QColor(90, 160, 180));
11482  setColorStopAt(0.25, QColor(45, 130, 175));
11483  setColorStopAt(0.30, QColor(100, 140, 125));
11484  setColorStopAt(0.5, QColor(100, 140, 100));
11485  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(130, 145, 120));
11486  setColorStopAt(0.7, QColor(140, 130, 120));
11487  setColorStopAt(0.9, QColor(180, 190, 190));
11488  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(210, 210, 230));
11489  break;
11490  case gpIon:
11491  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
11492  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 10, 10));
11493  setColorStopAt(0.45, QColor(0, 0, 255));
11494  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(0, 255, 255));
11495  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(0, 255, 0));
11496  break;
11497  case gpThermal:
11498  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11499  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 50));
11500  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(20, 0, 120));
11501  setColorStopAt(0.33, QColor(200, 30, 140));
11502  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 100, 0));
11503  setColorStopAt(0.85, QColor(255, 255, 40));
11504  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
11505  break;
11506  case gpPolar:
11507  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11508  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 255, 255));
11509  setColorStopAt(0.18, QColor(10, 70, 255));
11510  setColorStopAt(0.28, QColor(10, 10, 190));
11511  setColorStopAt(0.5, QColor(0, 0, 0));
11512  setColorStopAt(0.72, QColor(190, 10, 10));
11513  setColorStopAt(0.82, QColor(255, 70, 10));
11514  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 50));
11515  break;
11516  case gpSpectrum:
11517  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
11518  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 0, 50));
11519  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(0, 0, 255));
11520  setColorStopAt(0.35, QColor(0, 255, 255));
11521  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 255, 0));
11522  setColorStopAt(0.75, QColor(255, 30, 0));
11523  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(50, 0, 0));
11524  break;
11525  case gpJet:
11526  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11527  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 100));
11528  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(0, 50, 255));
11529  setColorStopAt(0.35, QColor(0, 255, 255));
11530  setColorStopAt(0.65, QColor(255, 255, 0));
11531  setColorStopAt(0.85, QColor(255, 30, 0));
11532  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(100, 0, 0));
11533  break;
11534  case gpHues:
11535  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
11536  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(255, 0, 0));
11537  setColorStopAt(1.0/3.0, QColor(0, 0, 255));
11538  setColorStopAt(2.0/3.0, QColor(0, 255, 0));
11539  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 0, 0));
11540  break;
11541  }
11542 }
11543 
11549 void QCPColorGradient::clearColorStops()
11550 {
11551  mColorStops.clear();
11552  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
11553 }
11554 
11561 QCPColorGradient QCPColorGradient::inverted() const
11562 {
11563  QCPColorGradient result(*this);
11564  result.clearColorStops();
11565  for (QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it=mColorStops.constBegin(); it!=mColorStops.constEnd(); ++it)
11566  result.setColorStopAt(1.0-it.key(), it.value());
11567  return result;
11568 }
11569 
11575 void QCPColorGradient::updateColorBuffer()
11576 {
11577  if (mColorBuffer.size() != mLevelCount)
11578  mColorBuffer.resize(mLevelCount);
11579  if (mColorStops.size() > 1)
11580  {
11581  double indexToPosFactor = 1.0/(double)(mLevelCount-1);
11582  for (int i=0; i<mLevelCount; ++i)
11583  {
11584  double position = i*indexToPosFactor;
11585  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it = mColorStops.lowerBound(position);
11586  if (it == mColorStops.constEnd()) // position is on or after last stop, use color of last stop
11587  {
11588  mColorBuffer[i] = (it-1).value().rgb();
11589  } else if (it == mColorStops.constBegin()) // position is on or before first stop, use color of first stop
11590  {
11591  mColorBuffer[i] = it.value().rgb();
11592  } else // position is in between stops (or on an intermediate stop), interpolate color
11593  {
11594  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator high = it;
11595  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator low = it-1;
11596  double t = (position-low.key())/(high.key()-low.key()); // interpolation factor 0..1
11597  switch (mColorInterpolation)
11598  {
11599  case ciRGB:
11600  {
11601  mColorBuffer[i] = qRgb((1-t)*low.value().red() + t*high.value().red(),
11602  (1-t)*low.value().green() + t*high.value().green(),
11603  (1-t)*low.value().blue() + t*high.value().blue());
11604  break;
11605  }
11606  case ciHSV:
11607  {
11608  QColor lowHsv = low.value().toHsv();
11609  QColor highHsv = high.value().toHsv();
11610  double hue = 0;
11611  double hueDiff = highHsv.hueF()-lowHsv.hueF();
11612  if (hueDiff > 0.5)
11613  hue = lowHsv.hueF() - t*(1.0-hueDiff);
11614  else if (hueDiff < -0.5)
11615  hue = lowHsv.hueF() + t*(1.0+hueDiff);
11616  else
11617  hue = lowHsv.hueF() + t*hueDiff;
11618  if (hue < 0) hue += 1.0;
11619  else if (hue >= 1.0) hue -= 1.0;
11620  mColorBuffer[i] = QColor::fromHsvF(hue, (1-t)*lowHsv.saturationF() + t*highHsv.saturationF(), (1-t)*lowHsv.valueF() + t*highHsv.valueF()).rgb();
11621  break;
11622  }
11623  }
11624  }
11625  }
11626  } else if (mColorStops.size() == 1)
11627  {
11628  mColorBuffer.fill(mColorStops.constBegin().value().rgb());
11629  } else // mColorStops is empty, fill color buffer with black
11630  {
11631  mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0));
11632  }
11633  mColorBufferInvalidated = false;
11634 }
11635 
11636 
11640 
11678 /* start documentation of inline functions */
11679 
11760 /* end documentation of inline functions */
11761 
11766 QCPAxisRect::QCPAxisRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, bool setupDefaultAxes) :
11767  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
11768  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
11769  mBackgroundScaled(true),
11770  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
11771  mInsetLayout(new QCPLayoutInset),
11772  mRangeDrag(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
11773  mRangeZoom(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
11774  mRangeZoomFactorHorz(0.85),
11775  mRangeZoomFactorVert(0.85),
11776  mDragging(false)
11777 {
11778  mInsetLayout->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
11779  mInsetLayout->setParentLayerable(this);
11780  mInsetLayout->setParent(this);
11781 
11782  setMinimumSize(50, 50);
11783  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(15, 15, 15, 15));
11784  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atLeft, QList<QCPAxis*>());
11785  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atRight, QList<QCPAxis*>());
11786  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atTop, QList<QCPAxis*>());
11787  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atBottom, QList<QCPAxis*>());
11788 
11789  if (setupDefaultAxes)
11790  {
11791  QCPAxis *xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
11792  QCPAxis *yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
11793  QCPAxis *xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
11794  QCPAxis *yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
11795  setRangeDragAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
11796  setRangeZoomAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
11797  xAxis2->setVisible(false);
11798  yAxis2->setVisible(false);
11799  xAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
11800  yAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
11801  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
11802  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
11803  xAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
11804  yAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
11805  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
11806  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
11807  }
11808 }
11809 
11810 QCPAxisRect::~QCPAxisRect()
11811 {
11812  delete mInsetLayout;
11813  mInsetLayout = 0;
11814 
11815  QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = axes();
11816  for (int i=0; i<axesList.size(); ++i)
11817  removeAxis(axesList.at(i));
11818 }
11819 
11825 int QCPAxisRect::axisCount(QCPAxis::AxisType type) const
11826 {
11827  return mAxes.value(type).size();
11828 }
11829 
11835 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::axis(QCPAxis::AxisType type, int index) const
11836 {
11837  QList<QCPAxis*> ax(mAxes.value(type));
11838  if (index >= 0 && index < ax.size())
11839  {
11840  return ax.at(index);
11841  } else
11842  {
11843  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis index out of bounds:" << index;
11844  return 0;
11845  }
11846 }
11847 
11856 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types) const
11857 {
11858  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
11859  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
11860  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atLeft);
11861  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
11862  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atRight);
11863  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
11864  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atTop);
11865  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
11866  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atBottom);
11867  return result;
11868 }
11869 
11874 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes() const
11875 {
11876  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
11877  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
11878  while (it.hasNext())
11879  {
11880  it.next();
11881  result << it.value();
11882  }
11883  return result;
11884 }
11885 
11895 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::addAxis(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
11896 {
11897  QCPAxis *newAxis = new QCPAxis(this, type);
11898  if (mAxes[type].size() > 0) // multiple axes on one side, add half-bar axis ending to additional axes with offset
11899  {
11900  bool invert = (type == QCPAxis::atRight) || (type == QCPAxis::atBottom);
11901  newAxis->setLowerEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, !invert));
11902  newAxis->setUpperEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, invert));
11903  }
11904  mAxes[type].append(newAxis);
11905  return newAxis;
11906 }
11907 
11916 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::addAxes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types)
11917 {
11918  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
11919  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
11920  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
11921  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
11922  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
11923  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
11924  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
11925  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
11926  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
11927  return result;
11928 }
11929 
11937 bool QCPAxisRect::removeAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
11938 {
11939  // don't access axis->axisType() to provide safety when axis is an invalid pointer, rather go through all axis containers:
11940  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
11941  while (it.hasNext())
11942  {
11943  it.next();
11944  if (it.value().contains(axis))
11945  {
11946  mAxes[it.key()].removeOne(axis);
11947  if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot*>(parentPlot())) // make sure this isn't called from QObject dtor when QCustomPlot is already destructed (happens when the axis rect is not in any layout and thus QObject-child of QCustomPlot)
11948  parentPlot()->axisRemoved(axis);
11949  delete axis;
11950  return true;
11951  }
11952  }
11953  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis isn't in axis rect:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(axis);
11954  return false;
11955 }
11956 
11983 void QCPAxisRect::setupFullAxesBox(bool connectRanges)
11984 {
11985  QCPAxis *xAxis, *yAxis, *xAxis2, *yAxis2;
11986  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atBottom) == 0)
11987  xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
11988  else
11989  xAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
11990 
11991  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atLeft) == 0)
11992  yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
11993  else
11994  yAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
11995 
11996  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atTop) == 0)
11997  xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
11998  else
11999  xAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
12000 
12001  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atRight) == 0)
12002  yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
12003  else
12004  yAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
12005 
12006  xAxis->setVisible(true);
12007  yAxis->setVisible(true);
12008  xAxis2->setVisible(true);
12009  yAxis2->setVisible(true);
12010  xAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
12011  yAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
12012 
12013  xAxis2->setRange(xAxis->range());
12014  xAxis2->setRangeReversed(xAxis->rangeReversed());
12015  xAxis2->setScaleType(xAxis->scaleType());
12016  xAxis2->setScaleLogBase(xAxis->scaleLogBase());
12017  xAxis2->setTicks(xAxis->ticks());
12018  xAxis2->setAutoTickCount(xAxis->autoTickCount());
12019  xAxis2->setSubTickCount(xAxis->subTickCount());
12020  xAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(xAxis->autoSubTicks());
12021  xAxis2->setTickStep(xAxis->tickStep());
12022  xAxis2->setAutoTickStep(xAxis->autoTickStep());
12023  xAxis2->setNumberFormat(xAxis->numberFormat());
12024  xAxis2->setNumberPrecision(xAxis->numberPrecision());
12025  xAxis2->setTickLabelType(xAxis->tickLabelType());
12026  xAxis2->setDateTimeFormat(xAxis->dateTimeFormat());
12027  xAxis2->setDateTimeSpec(xAxis->dateTimeSpec());
12028 
12029  yAxis2->setRange(yAxis->range());
12030  yAxis2->setRangeReversed(yAxis->rangeReversed());
12031  yAxis2->setScaleType(yAxis->scaleType());
12032  yAxis2->setScaleLogBase(yAxis->scaleLogBase());
12033  yAxis2->setTicks(yAxis->ticks());
12034  yAxis2->setAutoTickCount(yAxis->autoTickCount());
12035  yAxis2->setSubTickCount(yAxis->subTickCount());
12036  yAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(yAxis->autoSubTicks());
12037  yAxis2->setTickStep(yAxis->tickStep());
12038  yAxis2->setAutoTickStep(yAxis->autoTickStep());
12039  yAxis2->setNumberFormat(yAxis->numberFormat());
12040  yAxis2->setNumberPrecision(yAxis->numberPrecision());
12041  yAxis2->setTickLabelType(yAxis->tickLabelType());
12042  yAxis2->setDateTimeFormat(yAxis->dateTimeFormat());
12043  yAxis2->setDateTimeSpec(yAxis->dateTimeSpec());
12044 
12045  if (connectRanges)
12046  {
12047  connect(xAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), xAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
12048  connect(yAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), yAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
12049  }
12050 }
12051 
12060 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxisRect::plottables() const
12061 {
12062  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::plottables() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
12063  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
12064  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mPlottables.size(); ++i)
12065  {
12066  if (mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
12067  result.append(mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i));
12068  }
12069  return result;
12070 }
12071 
12080 QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxisRect::graphs() const
12081 {
12082  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::graphs() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
12083  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
12084  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mGraphs.size(); ++i)
12085  {
12086  if (mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this || mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
12087  result.append(mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i));
12088  }
12089  return result;
12090 }
12091 
12102 QList<QCPAbstractItem *> QCPAxisRect::items() const
12103 {
12104  // Note: don't just append all QCPAxis::items() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
12105  // and miss those items that have this axis rect as clipAxisRect.
12106  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
12107  for (int itemId=0; itemId<mParentPlot->mItems.size(); ++itemId)
12108  {
12109  if (mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->clipAxisRect() == this)
12110  {
12111  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
12112  continue;
12113  }
12114  QList<QCPItemPosition*> positions = mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->positions();
12115  for (int posId=0; posId<positions.size(); ++posId)
12116  {
12117  if (positions.at(posId)->axisRect() == this ||
12118  positions.at(posId)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||
12119  positions.at(posId)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
12120  {
12121  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
12122  break;
12123  }
12124  }
12125  }
12126  return result;
12127 }
12128 
12137 void QCPAxisRect::update(UpdatePhase phase)
12138 {
12139  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
12140 
12141  switch (phase)
12142  {
12143  case upPreparation:
12144  {
12145  QList<QCPAxis*> allAxes = axes();
12146  for (int i=0; i<allAxes.size(); ++i)
12147  allAxes.at(i)->setupTickVectors();
12148  break;
12149  }
12150  case upLayout:
12151  {
12152  mInsetLayout->setOuterRect(rect());
12153  break;
12154  }
12155  default: break;
12156  }
12157 
12158  // pass update call on to inset layout (doesn't happen automatically, because QCPAxisRect doesn't derive from QCPLayout):
12159  mInsetLayout->update(phase);
12160 }
12161 
12162 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12163 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPAxisRect::elements(bool recursive) const
12164 {
12165  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
12166  if (mInsetLayout)
12167  {
12168  result << mInsetLayout;
12169  if (recursive)
12170  result << mInsetLayout->elements(recursive);
12171  }
12172  return result;
12173 }
12174 
12175 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12176 void QCPAxisRect::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
12177 {
12178  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
12179 }
12180 
12181 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12182 void QCPAxisRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
12183 {
12184  drawBackground(painter);
12185 }
12186 
12202 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm)
12203 {
12204  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
12205  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
12206 }
12207 
12221 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QBrush &brush)
12222 {
12223  mBackgroundBrush = brush;
12224 }
12225 
12233 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
12234 {
12235  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
12236  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
12237  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
12238  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
12239 }

12252 {
12253  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
12254 }

12261 void QCPAxisRect::setBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
12262 {
12263  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
12264 }

12271 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeDragAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
12272 {
12273  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeDragHorzAxis.data() : mRangeDragVertAxis.data());
12274 }
12275

12282 {
12283  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data() : mRangeZoomVertAxis.data());
12284 }
12285 
12291 double QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomFactor(Qt::Orientation orientation)
12292 {
12293  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomFactorHorz : mRangeZoomFactorVert);
12294 }
12295

12313 {
12314  mRangeDrag = orientations;
12315 }

12332 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoom(Qt::Orientations orientations)
12333 {
12334  mRangeZoom = orientations;
12335 }
12336 
12343 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)
12344 {
12345  mRangeDragHorzAxis = horizontal;
12346  mRangeDragVertAxis = vertical;
12347 }
12348 
12356 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)
12357 {

12359  mRangeZoomVertAxis = vertical;
12360 }

12372 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double horizontalFactor, double verticalFactor)
12373 {
12374  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = horizontalFactor;
12375  mRangeZoomFactorVert = verticalFactor;
12376 }
12377 
12382 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double factor)
12383 {
12384  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = factor;
12385  mRangeZoomFactorVert = factor;
12386 }
12387 
12406 void QCPAxisRect::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
12407 {
12408  // draw background fill:
12409  if (mBackgroundBrush != Qt::NoBrush)
12410  painter->fillRect(mRect, mBackgroundBrush);
12411 
12412  // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
12413  if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
12414  {
12415  if (mBackgroundScaled)
12416  {
12417  // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
12418  QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
12419  scaledSize.scale(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
12420  if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
12421  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
12422  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft(), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
12423  } else
12424  {
12425  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft(), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()));
12426  }
12427  }
12428 }
12429 
12440 void QCPAxisRect::updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
12441 {
12442  const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(type);
12443  if (axesList.isEmpty())
12444  return;
12445 
12446  bool isFirstVisible = !axesList.first()->visible(); // if the first axis is visible, the second axis (which is where the loop starts) isn't the first visible axis, so initialize with false
12447  for (int i=1; i<axesList.size(); ++i)
12448  {
12449  int offset = axesList.at(i-1)->offset() + axesList.at(i-1)->calculateMargin();
12450  if (axesList.at(i)->visible()) // only add inner tick length to offset if this axis is visible and it's not the first visible one (might happen if true first axis is invisible)
12451  {
12452  if (!isFirstVisible)
12453  offset += axesList.at(i)->tickLengthIn();
12454  isFirstVisible = false;
12455  }
12456  axesList.at(i)->setOffset(offset);
12457  }
12458 }
12459 
12460 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12461 int QCPAxisRect::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side)
12462 {
12463  if (!mAutoMargins.testFlag(side))
12464  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Called with side that isn't specified as auto margin";
12465 
12466  updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
12467 
12468  // note: only need to look at the last (outer most) axis to determine the total margin, due to updateAxisOffset call
12469  const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
12470  if (axesList.size() > 0)
12471  return axesList.last()->offset() + axesList.last()->calculateMargin();
12472  else
12473  return 0;
12474 }
12475 
12487 void QCPAxisRect::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
12488 {
12489  mDragStart = event->pos(); // need this even when not LeftButton is pressed, to determine in releaseEvent whether it was a full click (no position change between press and release)
12490  if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
12491  {
12492  mDragging = true;
12493  // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
12494  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
12495  {
12496  mAADragBackup = mParentPlot->antialiasedElements();
12497  mNotAADragBackup = mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements();
12498  }
12499  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
12500  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
12501  {
12502  if (mRangeDragHorzAxis)
12503  mDragStartHorzRange = mRangeDragHorzAxis.data()->range();
12504  if (mRangeDragVertAxis)
12505  mDragStartVertRange = mRangeDragVertAxis.data()->range();
12506  }
12507  }
12508 }
12509 
12517 void QCPAxisRect::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
12518 {
12519  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
12520  if (mDragging && mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
12521  {
12522  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
12523  {
12524  if (QCPAxis *rangeDragHorzAxis = mRangeDragHorzAxis.data())
12525  {
12526  if (rangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
12527  {
12528  double diff = rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) - rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
12529  rangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower+diff, mDragStartHorzRange.upper+diff);
12530  } else if (rangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
12531  {
12532  double diff = rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) / rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
12533  rangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower*diff, mDragStartHorzRange.upper*diff);
12534  }
12535  }
12536  }
12537  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
12538  {
12539  if (QCPAxis *rangeDragVertAxis = mRangeDragVertAxis.data())
12540  {
12541  if (rangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
12542  {
12543  double diff = rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) - rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
12544  rangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower+diff, mDragStartVertRange.upper+diff);
12545  } else if (rangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
12546  {
12547  double diff = rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) / rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
12548  rangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower*diff, mDragStartVertRange.upper*diff);
12549  }
12550  }
12551  }
12552  if (mRangeDrag != 0) // if either vertical or horizontal drag was enabled, do a replot
12553  {
12554  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
12555  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
12556  mParentPlot->replot();
12557  }
12558  }
12559 }
12560 
12561 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12562 void QCPAxisRect::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
12563 {
12564  Q_UNUSED(event)
12565  mDragging = false;
12566  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
12567  {
12568  mParentPlot->setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
12569  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
12570  }
12571 }
12572 
12587 void QCPAxisRect::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
12588 {
12589  // Mouse range zooming interaction:
12590  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeZoom))
12591  {
12592  if (mRangeZoom != 0)
12593  {
12594  double factor;
12595  double wheelSteps = event->delta()/120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
12596  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
12597  {
12598  factor = pow(mRangeZoomFactorHorz, wheelSteps);
12599  if (mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data())
12600  mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()->scaleRange(factor, mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x()));
12601  }
12602  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
12603  {
12604  factor = pow(mRangeZoomFactorVert, wheelSteps);
12605  if (mRangeZoomVertAxis.data())
12606  mRangeZoomVertAxis.data()->scaleRange(factor, mRangeZoomVertAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y()));
12607  }
12608  mParentPlot->replot();
12609  }
12610  }
12611 }
12612 
12613 
12617 
12642 /* start of documentation of signals */
12643 
12650 /* end of documentation of signals */
12651 
12656 QCPAbstractLegendItem::QCPAbstractLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent) :
12657  QCPLayoutElement(parent->parentPlot()),
12658  mParentLegend(parent),
12659  mFont(parent->font()),
12660  mTextColor(parent->textColor()),
12661  mSelectedFont(parent->selectedFont()),
12662  mSelectedTextColor(parent->selectedTextColor()),
12663  mSelectable(true),
12664  mSelected(false)
12665 {
12666  setLayer("legend");
12667  setMargins(QMargins(8, 2, 8, 2));
12668 }
12669

12676 {
12677  mFont = font;
12678 }
12679 
12685 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setTextColor(const QColor &color)
12686 {
12687  mTextColor = color;
12688 }
12689 
12696 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
12697 {
12698  mSelectedFont = font;
12699 }
12700 
12707 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
12708 {
12709  mSelectedTextColor = color;
12710 }
12711 
12717 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
12718 {
12719  if (mSelectable != selectable)
12720  {
12721  mSelectable = selectable;
12722  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
12723  }
12724 }
12725 
12734 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelected(bool selected)
12735 {
12736  if (mSelected != selected)
12737  {
12738  mSelected = selected;
12739  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
12740  }
12741 }
12742 
12743 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12744 double QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
12745 {
12746  Q_UNUSED(details)
12747  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
12748  if (onlySelectable && (!mSelectable || !mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems)))
12749  return -1;
12750 
12751  if (mRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
12752  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
12753  else
12754  return -1;
12755 }
12756 
12757 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12758 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
12759 {
12760  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegendItems);
12761 }
12762 
12763 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12764 QRect QCPAbstractLegendItem::clipRect() const
12765 {
12766  return mOuterRect;
12767 }
12768 
12769 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12770 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
12771 {
12772  Q_UNUSED(event)
12773  Q_UNUSED(details)
12774  if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
12775  {
12776  bool selBefore = mSelected;
12777  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
12778  if (selectionStateChanged)
12779  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
12780  }
12781 }
12782 
12783 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12784 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
12785 {
12786  if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
12787  {
12788  bool selBefore = mSelected;
12789  setSelected(false);
12790  if (selectionStateChanged)
12791  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
12792  }
12793 }
12794 
12798 
12832 QCPPlottableLegendItem::QCPPlottableLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent, QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) :
12833  QCPAbstractLegendItem(parent),
12834  mPlottable(plottable)
12835 {
12836 }
12837 
12843 QPen QCPPlottableLegendItem::getIconBorderPen() const
12844 {
12845  return mSelected ? mParentLegend->selectedIconBorderPen() : mParentLegend->iconBorderPen();
12846 }
12847 
12853 QColor QCPPlottableLegendItem::getTextColor() const
12854 {
12855  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
12856 }
12857 
12863 QFont QCPPlottableLegendItem::getFont() const
12864 {
12865  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
12866 }
12867 
12874 void QCPPlottableLegendItem::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
12875 {
12876  if (!mPlottable) return;
12877  painter->setFont(getFont());
12878  painter->setPen(QPen(getTextColor()));
12879  QSizeF iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
12880  QRectF textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
12881  QRectF iconRect(mRect.topLeft(), iconSize);
12882  int textHeight = qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()); // if text has smaller height than icon, center text vertically in icon height, else align tops
12883  painter->drawText(mRect.x()+iconSize.width()+mParentLegend->iconTextPadding(), mRect.y(), textRect.width(), textHeight, Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
12884  // draw icon:
12885  painter->save();
12886  painter->setClipRect(iconRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
12887  mPlottable->drawLegendIcon(painter, iconRect);
12888  painter->restore();
12889  // draw icon border:
12890  if (getIconBorderPen().style() != Qt::NoPen)
12891  {
12892  painter->setPen(getIconBorderPen());
12893  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
12894  painter->drawRect(iconRect);
12895  }
12896 }
12897 
12903 QSize QCPPlottableLegendItem::minimumSizeHint() const
12904 {
12905  if (!mPlottable) return QSize();
12906  QSize result(0, 0);
12907  QRect textRect;
12908  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(getFont());
12909  QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
12910  textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
12911  result.setWidth(iconSize.width() + mParentLegend->iconTextPadding() + textRect.width() + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right());
12912  result.setHeight(qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()) + mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom());
12913  return result;
12914 }
12915 
12916 
12920 
12945 /* start of documentation of signals */
12946 
12954 /* end of documentation of signals */
12955 
12962 QCPLegend::QCPLegend()
12963 {
12964  setRowSpacing(0);
12965  setColumnSpacing(10);
12966  setMargins(QMargins(2, 3, 2, 2));
12967  setAntialiased(false);
12968  setIconSize(32, 18);
12969 
12970  setIconTextPadding(7);
12971 
12972  setSelectableParts(spLegendBox | spItems);
12973  setSelectedParts(spNone);
12974 
12975  setBorderPen(QPen(Qt::black));
12976  setSelectedBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
12977  setIconBorderPen(Qt::NoPen);
12978  setSelectedIconBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
12979  setBrush(Qt::white);
12980  setSelectedBrush(Qt::white);
12981  setTextColor(Qt::black);
12982  setSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue);
12983 }
12984 
12985 QCPLegend::~QCPLegend()
12986 {
12987  clearItems();
12988  if (mParentPlot)
12989  mParentPlot->legendRemoved(this);
12990 }
12991 
12992 /* no doc for getter, see setSelectedParts */
12993 QCPLegend::SelectableParts QCPLegend::selectedParts() const
12994 {
12995  // check whether any legend elements selected, if yes, add spItems to return value
12996  bool hasSelectedItems = false;
12997  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
12998  {
12999  if (item(i) && item(i)->selected())
13000  {
13001  hasSelectedItems = true;
13002  break;
13003  }
13004  }
13005  if (hasSelectedItems)
13006  return mSelectedParts | spItems;
13007  else
13008  return mSelectedParts & ~spItems;
13009 }
13010 
13014 void QCPLegend::setBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
13015 {
13016  mBorderPen = pen;
13017 }
13018 
13022 void QCPLegend::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
13023 {
13024  mBrush = brush;
13025 }
13026 
13036 void QCPLegend::setFont(const QFont &font)
13037 {
13038  mFont = font;
13039  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13040  {
13041  if (item(i))
13042  item(i)->setFont(mFont);
13043  }
13044 }
13045 
13055 void QCPLegend::setTextColor(const QColor &color)
13056 {
13057  mTextColor = color;
13058  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13059  {
13060  if (item(i))
13061  item(i)->setTextColor(color);
13062  }
13063 }
13064

13070 {
13071  mIconSize = size;
13072 }

13078  mIconSize.setWidth(width);
13079  mIconSize.setHeight(height);
13080 }
