13088 {
13089  mIconTextPadding = padding;
13090 }
13091 
13098 void QCPLegend::setIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
13099 {
13100  mIconBorderPen = pen;
13101 }
13102 
13113 void QCPLegend::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
13114 {
13115  if (mSelectableParts != selectable)
13116  {
13117  mSelectableParts = selectable;
13118  emit selectableChanged(mSelectableParts);
13119  }
13120 }
13121 
13143 void QCPLegend::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
13144 {
13145  SelectableParts newSelected = selected;
13146  mSelectedParts = this->selectedParts(); // update mSelectedParts in case item selection changed
13147 
13148  if (mSelectedParts != newSelected)
13149  {
13150  if (!mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // attempt to set spItems flag (can't do that)
13151  {
13152  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "spItems flag can not be set, it can only be unset with this function";
13153  newSelected &= ~spItems;
13154  }
13155  if (mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && !newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // spItems flag was unset, so clear item selection
13156  {
13157  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13158  {
13159  if (item(i))
13160  item(i)->setSelected(false);
13161  }
13162  }
13163  mSelectedParts = newSelected;
13164  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
13165  }
13166 }
13167 
13174 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
13175 {
13176  mSelectedBorderPen = pen;
13177 }
13178 
13184 void QCPLegend::setSelectedIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
13185 {
13186  mSelectedIconBorderPen = pen;
13187 }
13188 
13195 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
13196 {
13197  mSelectedBrush = brush;
13198 }
13199 
13207 void QCPLegend::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
13208 {
13209  mSelectedFont = font;
13210  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13211  {
13212  if (item(i))
13213  item(i)->setSelectedFont(font);
13214  }
13215 }
13216 
13224 void QCPLegend::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
13225 {
13226  mSelectedTextColor = color;
13227  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13228  {
13229  if (item(i))
13230  item(i)->setSelectedTextColor(color);
13231  }
13232 }
13233 
13239 QCPAbstractLegendItem *QCPLegend::item(int index) const
13240 {
13241  return qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(elementAt(index));
13242 }
13243 
13250 QCPPlottableLegendItem *QCPLegend::itemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
13251 {
13252  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13253  {
13254  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *pli = qobject_cast<QCPPlottableLegendItem*>(item(i)))
13255  {
13256  if (pli->plottable() == plottable)
13257  return pli;
13258  }
13259  }
13260  return 0;
13261 }
13262 
13267 int QCPLegend::itemCount() const
13268 {
13269  return elementCount();
13270 }
13271 
13275 bool QCPLegend::hasItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) const
13276 {
13277  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13278  {
13279  if (item == this->item(i))
13280  return true;
13281  }
13282  return false;
13283 }
13284 
13291 bool QCPLegend::hasItemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
13292 {
13293  return itemWithPlottable(plottable);
13294 }
13295 
13303 bool QCPLegend::addItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
13304 {
13305  if (!hasItem(item))
13306  {
13307  return addElement(rowCount(), 0, item);
13308  } else
13309  return false;
13310 }
13311 
13319 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(int index)
13320 {
13321  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(index))
13322  {
13323  bool success = remove(ali);
13324  simplify();
13325  return success;
13326  } else
13327  return false;
13328 }
13329 
13338 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
13339 {
13340  bool success = remove(item);
13341  simplify();
13342  return success;
13343 }
13344 
13348 void QCPLegend::clearItems()
13349 {
13350  for (int i=itemCount()-1; i>=0; --i)
13351  removeItem(i);
13352 }
13353 
13360 QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem *> QCPLegend::selectedItems() const
13361 {
13362  QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem*> result;
13363  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13364  {
13365  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(i))
13366  {
13367  if (ali->selected())
13368  result.append(ali);
13369  }
13370  }
13371  return result;
13372 }
13373 
13387 void QCPLegend::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
13388 {
13389  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegend);
13390 }
13391 
13397 QPen QCPLegend::getBorderPen() const
13398 {
13399  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBorderPen : mBorderPen;
13400 }
13401 
13407 QBrush QCPLegend::getBrush() const
13408 {
13409  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
13410 }
13411 
13417 void QCPLegend::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
13418 {
13419  // draw background rect:
13420  painter->setBrush(getBrush());
13421  painter->setPen(getBorderPen());
13422  painter->drawRect(mOuterRect);
13423 }
13424 
13425 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13426 double QCPLegend::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
13427 {
13428  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
13429  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
13430  return -1;
13431 
13432  if (mOuterRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
13433  {
13434  if (details) details->setValue(spLegendBox);
13435  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
13436  }
13437  return -1;
13438 }
13439 
13440 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13441 void QCPLegend::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
13442 {
13443  Q_UNUSED(event)
13444  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
13445  if (details.value<SelectablePart>() == spLegendBox && mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
13446  {
13447  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
13448  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^spLegendBox : mSelectedParts|spLegendBox); // no need to unset spItems in !additive case, because they will be deselected by QCustomPlot (they're normal QCPLayerables with own deselectEvent)
13449  if (selectionStateChanged)
13450  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
13451  }
13452 }
13453 
13454 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13455 void QCPLegend::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
13456 {
13457  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
13458  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
13459  {
13460  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
13461  setSelectedParts(selectedParts() & ~spLegendBox);
13462  if (selectionStateChanged)
13463  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
13464  }
13465 }
13466 
13467 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13468 QCP::Interaction QCPLegend::selectionCategory() const
13469 {
13470  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
13471 }
13472 
13473 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13474 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectionCategory() const
13475 {
13476  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
13477 }
13478 
13479 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13480 void QCPLegend::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
13481 {
13482  Q_UNUSED(parentPlot)
13483 }
13484 
13485

13525 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
13526  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
13527  mFont(QFont("sans serif", 13*1.5, QFont::Bold)),
13528  mTextColor(Qt::black),
13529  mSelectedFont(QFont("sans serif", 13*1.6, QFont::Bold)),
13530  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
13531  mSelectable(false),
13532  mSelected(false)
13533 {
13534  if (parentPlot)
13535  {
13536  setLayer(parentPlot->currentLayer());
13537  mFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.5, QFont::Bold);
13538  mSelectedFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.6, QFont::Bold);
13539  }
13540  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
13541 }
13542 
13547 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &text) :
13548  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
13549  mText(text),
13550  mFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.5, QFont::Bold)),
13551  mTextColor(Qt::black),
13552  mSelectedFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.6, QFont::Bold)),
13553  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
13554  mSelectable(false),
13555  mSelected(false)
13556 {
13557  setLayer("axes");
13558  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
13559 }

13620  {

13622  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
13623  }
13624 }

13634 {
13635  if (mSelected != selected)
13636  {
13637  mSelected = selected;
13638  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
13639  }
13640 }

13646 }

13648 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13649 void QCPPlotTitle::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
13650 {
13651  painter->setFont(mainFont());
13652  painter->setPen(QPen(mainTextColor()));
13653  painter->drawText(mRect, Qt::AlignCenter, mText, &mTextBoundingRect);
13654 }
13655 
13656 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13657 QSize QCPPlotTitle::minimumSizeHint() const
13658 {
13659  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
13660  QSize result = metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
13661  result.rwidth() += mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
13662  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
13663  return result;
13664 }
13665 
13666 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13667 QSize QCPPlotTitle::maximumSizeHint() const
13668 {
13669  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
13670  QSize result = metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
13671  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
13672  result.setWidth(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
13673  return result;
13674 }
13675 
13676 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13677 void QCPPlotTitle::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
13678 {
13679  Q_UNUSED(event)
13680  Q_UNUSED(details)
13681  if (mSelectable)
13682  {
13683  bool selBefore = mSelected;
13684  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
13685  if (selectionStateChanged)
13686  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13687  }
13688 }
13689 
13690 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13691 void QCPPlotTitle::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
13692 {
13693  if (mSelectable)
13694  {
13695  bool selBefore = mSelected;
13696  setSelected(false);
13697  if (selectionStateChanged)
13698  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13699  }
13700 }
13701 
13702 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13703 double QCPPlotTitle::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
13704 {
13705  Q_UNUSED(details)
13706  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
13707  return -1;
13708 
13709  if (mTextBoundingRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
13710  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
13711  else
13712  return -1;
13713 }
13714 
13720 QFont QCPPlotTitle::mainFont() const
13721 {
13722  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
13723 }
13724 
13730 QColor QCPPlotTitle::mainTextColor() const
13731 {
13732  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
13733 }

13828 /* end documentation of signals */
13829 
13833 QCPColorScale::QCPColorScale(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
13834  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
13835  mType(QCPAxis::atTop), // set to atTop such that setType(QCPAxis::atRight) below doesn't skip work because it thinks it's already atRight
13836  mDataScaleType(QCPAxis::stLinear),
13837  mBarWidth(20),
13838  mAxisRect(new QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate(this))
13839 {
13840  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(0, 6, 0, 6)); // for default right color scale types, keep some room at bottom and top (important if no margin group is used)
13841  setType(QCPAxis::atRight);
13842  setDataRange(QCPRange(0, 6));
13843 }
13844 
13845 QCPColorScale::~QCPColorScale()
13846 {
13847  delete mAxisRect;
13848 }
13849 
13850 /* undocumented getter */
13851 QString QCPColorScale::label() const
13852 {
13853  if (!mColorAxis)
13854  {
13855  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal color axis undefined";
13856  return QString();
13857  }
13858 
13859  return mColorAxis.data()->label();
13860 }
13861 
13862 /* undocumented getter */
13863 bool QCPColorScale::rangeDrag() const
13864 {
13865  if (!mAxisRect)
13866  {
13867  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
13868  return false;
13869  }
13870 
13871  return mAxisRect.data()->rangeDrag().testFlag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
13872  mAxisRect.data()->rangeDragAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
13873  mAxisRect.data()->rangeDragAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType))->orientation() == QCPAxis::orientation(mType);
13874 }
13875 
13876 /* undocumented getter */
13877 bool QCPColorScale::rangeZoom() const
13878 {
13879  if (!mAxisRect)
13880  {
13881  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
13882  return false;
13883  }
13884 
13885  return mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoom().testFlag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
13886  mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoomAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
13887  mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoomAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType))->orientation() == QCPAxis::orientation(mType);
13888 }
13889 
13897 void QCPColorScale::setType(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
13898 {
13899  if (!mAxisRect)
13900  {
13901  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
13902  return;
13903  }
13904  if (mType != type)
13905  {
13906  mType = type;
13907  QCPRange rangeTransfer(0, 6);
13908  double logBaseTransfer = 10;
13909  QString labelTransfer;
13910  // revert some settings on old axis:
13911  if (mColorAxis)
13912  {
13913  rangeTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->range();
13914  labelTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->label();
13915  logBaseTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->scaleLogBase();
13916  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel("");
13917  disconnect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
13918  disconnect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
13919  }
13920  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType atype, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop)
13921  {
13922  mAxisRect.data()->axis(atype)->setTicks(atype == mType);
13923  mAxisRect.data()->axis(atype)->setTickLabels(atype== mType);
13924  }
13925  // set new mColorAxis pointer:
13926  mColorAxis = mAxisRect.data()->axis(mType);
13927  // transfer settings to new axis:
13928  mColorAxis.data()->setRange(rangeTransfer); // transfer range of old axis to new one (necessary if axis changes from vertical to horizontal or vice versa)
13929  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(labelTransfer);
13930  mColorAxis.data()->setScaleLogBase(logBaseTransfer); // scaleType is synchronized among axes in realtime via signals (connected in QCPColorScale ctor), so we only need to take care of log base here
13931  connect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
13932  connect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
13933  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDragAxes(QCPAxis::orientation(mType) == Qt::Horizontal ? mColorAxis.data() : 0,
13934  QCPAxis::orientation(mType) == Qt::Vertical ? mColorAxis.data() : 0);
13935  }
13936 }
13937 
13947 void QCPColorScale::setDataRange(const QCPRange &dataRange)
13948 {
13949  if (mDataRange.lower != dataRange.lower || mDataRange.upper != dataRange.upper)
13950  {
13951  mDataRange = dataRange;
13952  if (mColorAxis)
13953  mColorAxis.data()->setRange(mDataRange);
13954  emit dataRangeChanged(mDataRange);
13955  }
13956 }
13957 
13968 void QCPColorScale::setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType scaleType)
13969 {
13970  if (mDataScaleType != scaleType)
13971  {
13972  mDataScaleType = scaleType;
13973  if (mColorAxis)
13974  mColorAxis.data()->setScaleType(mDataScaleType);
13975  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
13976  setDataRange(mDataRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
13977  emit dataScaleTypeChanged(mDataScaleType);
13978  }
13979 }
13980 
13988 void QCPColorScale::setGradient(const QCPColorGradient &gradient)
13989 {
13990  if (mGradient != gradient)
13991  {
13992  mGradient = gradient;
13993  if (mAxisRect)
13994  mAxisRect.data()->mGradientImageInvalidated = true;
13995  emit gradientChanged(mGradient);
13996  }
13997 }
13998 
14003 void QCPColorScale::setLabel(const QString &str)
14004 {
14005  if (!mColorAxis)
14006  {
14007  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal color axis undefined";
14008  return;
14009  }
14010 
14011  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(str);
14012 }
14013 
14018 void QCPColorScale::setBarWidth(int width)
14019 {
14020  mBarWidth = width;
14021 }
14022 
14029 void QCPColorScale::setRangeDrag(bool enabled)
14030 {
14031  if (!mAxisRect)
14032  {
14033  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14034  return;
14035  }
14036 
14037  if (enabled)
14038  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType));
14039  else
14040  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag(0);
14041 }
14042 
14049 void QCPColorScale::setRangeZoom(bool enabled)
14050 {
14051  if (!mAxisRect)
14052  {
14053  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14054  return;
14055  }
14056 
14057  if (enabled)
14058  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeZoom(QCPAxis::orientation(mType));
14059  else
14060  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeZoom(0);
14061 }
14062 
14066 QList<QCPColorMap*> QCPColorScale::colorMaps() const
14067 {
14068  QList<QCPColorMap*> result;
14069  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->plottableCount(); ++i)
14070  {
14071  if (QCPColorMap *cm = qobject_cast<QCPColorMap*>(mParentPlot->plottable(i)))
14072  if (cm->colorScale() == this)
14073  result.append(cm);
14074  }
14075  return result;
14076 }
14077 
14084 void QCPColorScale::rescaleDataRange(bool onlyVisibleMaps)
14085 {
14086  QList<QCPColorMap*> maps = colorMaps();
14087  QCPRange newRange;
14088  bool haveRange = false;
14089  int sign = 0; // TODO: should change this to QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain later (currently is protected, maybe move to QCP namespace)
14090  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
14091  sign = (mDataRange.upper < 0 ? -1 : 1);
14092  for (int i=0; i<maps.size(); ++i)
14093  {
14094  if (!maps.at(i)->realVisibility() && onlyVisibleMaps)
14095  continue;
14096  QCPRange mapRange;
14097  if (maps.at(i)->colorScale() == this)
14098  {
14099  bool currentFoundRange = true;
14100  mapRange = maps.at(i)->data()->dataBounds();
14101  if (sign == 1)
14102  {
14103  if (mapRange.lower <= 0 && mapRange.upper > 0)
14104  mapRange.lower = mapRange.upper*1e-3;
14105  else if (mapRange.lower <= 0 && mapRange.upper <= 0)
14106  currentFoundRange = false;
14107  } else if (sign == -1)
14108  {
14109  if (mapRange.upper >= 0 && mapRange.lower < 0)
14110  mapRange.upper = mapRange.lower*1e-3;
14111  else if (mapRange.upper >= 0 && mapRange.lower >= 0)
14112  currentFoundRange = false;
14113  }
14114  if (currentFoundRange)
14115  {
14116  if (!haveRange)
14117  newRange = mapRange;
14118  else
14119  newRange.expand(mapRange);
14120  haveRange = true;
14121  }
14122  }
14123  }
14124  if (haveRange)
14125  {
14126  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this dimension), shift current range to at least center the data
14127  {
14128  double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
14129  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
14130  {
14131  newRange.lower = center-mDataRange.size()/2.0;
14132  newRange.upper = center+mDataRange.size()/2.0;
14133  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
14134  {
14135  newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(mDataRange.upper/mDataRange.lower);
14136  newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(mDataRange.upper/mDataRange.lower);
14137  }
14138  }
14139  setDataRange(newRange);
14140  }
14141 }
14142 
14143 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14144 void QCPColorScale::update(UpdatePhase phase)
14145 {
14146  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
14147  if (!mAxisRect)
14148  {
14149  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14150  return;
14151  }
14152 
14153  mAxisRect.data()->update(phase);
14154 
14155  switch (phase)
14156  {
14157  case upMargins:
14158  {
14159  if (mType == QCPAxis::atBottom || mType == QCPAxis::atTop)
14160  {
14161  setMaximumSize(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX, mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().top()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().bottom()+margins().top()+margins().bottom());
14162  setMinimumSize(0, mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().top()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().bottom()+margins().top()+margins().bottom());
14163  } else
14164  {
14165  setMaximumSize(mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().left()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().right()+margins().left()+margins().right(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
14166  setMinimumSize(mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().left()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().right()+margins().left()+margins().right(), 0);
14167  }
14168  break;
14169  }
14170  case upLayout:
14171  {
14172  mAxisRect.data()->setOuterRect(rect());
14173  break;
14174  }
14175  default: break;
14176  }
14177 }
14178 
14179 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14180 void QCPColorScale::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
14181 {
14182  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
14183 }
14184 
14185 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14186 void QCPColorScale::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
14187 {
14188  if (!mAxisRect)
14189  {
14190  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14191  return;
14192  }
14193  mAxisRect.data()->mousePressEvent(event);
14194 }
14195 
14196 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14197 void QCPColorScale::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
14198 {
14199  if (!mAxisRect)
14200  {
14201  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14202  return;
14203  }
14204  mAxisRect.data()->mouseMoveEvent(event);
14205 }
14206 
14207 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14208 void QCPColorScale::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
14209 {
14210  if (!mAxisRect)
14211  {
14212  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14213  return;
14214  }
14215  mAxisRect.data()->mouseReleaseEvent(event);
14216 }
14217 
14218 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14219 void QCPColorScale::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
14220 {
14221  if (!mAxisRect)
14222  {
14223  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14224  return;
14225  }
14226  mAxisRect.data()->wheelEvent(event);
14227 }
14228 
14232 
14247 QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate(QCPColorScale *parentColorScale) :
14248  QCPAxisRect(parentColorScale->parentPlot(), true),
14249  mParentColorScale(parentColorScale),
14250  mGradientImageInvalidated(true)
14251 {
14252  setParentLayerable(parentColorScale);
14253  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(0, 0, 0, 0));
14254  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14255  {
14256  axis(type)->setVisible(true);
14257  axis(type)->grid()->setVisible(false);
14258  axis(type)->setPadding(0);
14259  connect(axis(type), SIGNAL(selectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)), this, SLOT(axisSelectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)));
14260  connect(axis(type), SIGNAL(selectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)), this, SLOT(axisSelectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)));
14261  }
14262 
14263  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14264  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14265  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14266  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14267  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14268  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14269  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14270  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14271 
14272  // make layer transfers of color scale transfer to axis rect and axes
14273  // the axes must be set after axis rect, such that they appear above color gradient drawn by axis rect:
14274  connect(parentColorScale, SIGNAL(layerChanged(QCPLayer*)), this, SLOT(setLayer(QCPLayer*)));
14275  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14276  connect(parentColorScale, SIGNAL(layerChanged(QCPLayer*)), axis(type), SLOT(setLayer(QCPLayer*)));
14277 }
14278 
14283 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
14284 {
14285  if (mGradientImageInvalidated)
14286  updateGradientImage();
14287 
14288  bool mirrorHorz = false;
14289  bool mirrorVert = false;
14290  if (mParentColorScale->mColorAxis)
14291  {
14292  mirrorHorz = mParentColorScale->mColorAxis.data()->rangeReversed() && (mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atBottom || mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atTop);
14293  mirrorVert = mParentColorScale->mColorAxis.data()->rangeReversed() && (mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atLeft || mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atRight);
14294  }
14295 
14296  painter->drawImage(rect(), mGradientImage.mirrored(mirrorHorz, mirrorVert));
14297  QCPAxisRect::draw(painter);
14298 }
14299 
14305 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::updateGradientImage()
14306 {
14307  if (rect().isEmpty())
14308  return;
14309 
14310  int n = mParentColorScale->mGradient.levelCount();
14311  int w, h;
14312  QVector<double> data(n);
14313  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14314  data[i] = i;
14315  if (mParentColorScale->mType == QCPAxis::atBottom || mParentColorScale->mType == QCPAxis::atTop)
14316  {
14317  w = n;
14318  h = rect().height();
14319  mGradientImage = QImage(w, h, QImage::Format_RGB32);
14320  QVector<QRgb*> pixels;
14321  for (int y=0; y<h; ++y)
14322  pixels.append(reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mGradientImage.scanLine(y)));
14323  mParentColorScale->mGradient.colorize(data.constData(), QCPRange(0, n-1), pixels.first(), n);
14324  for (int y=1; y<h; ++y)
14325  memcpy(pixels.at(y), pixels.first(), n*sizeof(QRgb));
14326  } else
14327  {
14328  w = rect().width();
14329  h = n;
14330  mGradientImage = QImage(w, h, QImage::Format_RGB32);
14331  for (int y=0; y<h; ++y)
14332  {
14333  QRgb *pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mGradientImage.scanLine(y));
14334  const QRgb lineColor = mParentColorScale->mGradient.color(data[h-1-y], QCPRange(0, n-1));
14335  for (int x=0; x<w; ++x)
14336  pixels[x] = lineColor;
14337  }
14338  }
14339  mGradientImageInvalidated = false;
14340 }
14341 
14347 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::axisSelectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts selectedParts)
14348 {
14349  // axis bases of four axes shall always (de-)selected synchronously:
14350  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14351  {
14352  if (QCPAxis *senderAxis = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(sender()))
14353  if (senderAxis->axisType() == type)
14354  continue;
14355 
14356  if (axis(type)->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14357  {
14358  if (selectedParts.testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14359  axis(type)->setSelectedParts(axis(type)->selectedParts() | QCPAxis::spAxis);
14360  else
14361  axis(type)->setSelectedParts(axis(type)->selectedParts() & ~QCPAxis::spAxis);
14362  }
14363  }
14364 }
14365 
14371 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::axisSelectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts selectableParts)
14372 {
14373  // synchronize axis base selectability:
14374  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14375  {
14376  if (QCPAxis *senderAxis = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(sender()))
14377  if (senderAxis->axisType() == type)
14378  continue;
14379 
14380  if (axis(type)->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14381  {
14382  if (selectableParts.testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14383  axis(type)->setSelectableParts(axis(type)->selectableParts() | QCPAxis::spAxis);
14384  else
14385  axis(type)->setSelectableParts(axis(type)->selectableParts() & ~QCPAxis::spAxis);
14386  }
14387  }
14388 }
14389 
14390 
14394 
14414 QCPData::QCPData() :
14415  key(0),
14416  value(0),
14417  keyErrorPlus(0),
14418  keyErrorMinus(0),
14419  valueErrorPlus(0),
14420  valueErrorMinus(0)
14421 {
14422 }
14423 
14427 QCPData::QCPData(double key, double value) :
14428  key(key),
14429  value(value),
14430  keyErrorPlus(0),
14431  keyErrorMinus(0),
14432  valueErrorPlus(0),
14433  valueErrorMinus(0)
14434 {
14435 }

14441 
14476 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
14477 
14485 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
14486 
14498 QCPGraph::QCPGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
14499  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis)
14500 {
14501  mData = new QCPDataMap;
14502 
14503  setPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 0));
14504  setErrorPen(QPen(Qt::black));
14505  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
14506  setSelectedPen(QPen(QColor(80, 80, 255), 2.5));
14507  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
14508 
14509  setLineStyle(lsLine);
14510  setErrorType(etNone);
14511  setErrorBarSize(6);
14512  setErrorBarSkipSymbol(true);
14513  setChannelFillGraph(0);
14514  setAdaptiveSampling(true);
14515 }
14516 
14517 QCPGraph::~QCPGraph()
14518 {
14519  delete mData;
14520 }
14521 
14532 void QCPGraph::setData(QCPDataMap *data, bool copy)
14533 {
14534  if (copy)
14535  {
14536  *mData = *data;
14537  } else
14538  {
14539  delete mData;
14540  mData = data;
14541  }
14542 }
14543 
14550 void QCPGraph::setData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value)
14551 {
14552  mData->clear();
14553  int n = key.size();
14554  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14555  QCPData newData;
14556  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14557  {
14558  newData.key = key[i];
14559  newData.value = value[i];
14560  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
14561  }
14562 }
14563 
14573 void QCPGraph::setDataValueError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &valueError)
14574 {
14575  mData->clear();
14576  int n = key.size();
14577  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14578  n = qMin(n, valueError.size());
14579  QCPData newData;
14580  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14581  {
14582  newData.key = key[i];
14583  newData.value = value[i];
14584  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueError[i];
14585  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueError[i];
14586  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14587  }
14588 }
14589 
14599 void QCPGraph::setDataValueError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &valueErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &valueErrorPlus)
14600 {
14601  mData->clear();
14602  int n = key.size();
14603  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14604  n = qMin(n, valueErrorMinus.size());
14605  n = qMin(n, valueErrorPlus.size());
14606  QCPData newData;
14607  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14608  {
14609  newData.key = key[i];
14610  newData.value = value[i];
14611  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueErrorMinus[i];
14612  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueErrorPlus[i];
14613  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14614  }
14615 }
14616 
14626 void QCPGraph::setDataKeyError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyError)
14627 {
14628  mData->clear();
14629  int n = key.size();
14630  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14631  n = qMin(n, keyError.size());
14632  QCPData newData;
14633  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14634  {
14635  newData.key = key[i];
14636  newData.value = value[i];
14637  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyError[i];
14638  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyError[i];
14639  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14640  }
14641 }
14642 
14652 void QCPGraph::setDataKeyError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &keyErrorPlus)
14653 {
14654  mData->clear();
14655  int n = key.size();
14656  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14657  n = qMin(n, keyErrorMinus.size());
14658  n = qMin(n, keyErrorPlus.size());
14659  QCPData newData;
14660  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14661  {
14662  newData.key = key[i];
14663  newData.value = value[i];
14664  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyErrorMinus[i];
14665  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyErrorPlus[i];
14666  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14667  }
14668 }
14669 
14679 void QCPGraph::setDataBothError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyError, const QVector<double> &valueError)
14680 {
14681  mData->clear();
14682  int n = key.size();
14683  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14684  n = qMin(n, valueError.size());
14685  n = qMin(n, keyError.size());
14686  QCPData newData;
14687  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14688  {
14689  newData.key = key[i];
14690  newData.value = value[i];
14691  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyError[i];
14692  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyError[i];
14693  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueError[i];
14694  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueError[i];
14695  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14696  }
14697 }
14698 
14708 void QCPGraph::setDataBothError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &keyErrorPlus, const QVector<double> &valueErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &valueErrorPlus)
14709 {
14710  mData->clear();
14711  int n = key.size();
14712  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14713  n = qMin(n, valueErrorMinus.size());
14714  n = qMin(n, valueErrorPlus.size());
14715  n = qMin(n, keyErrorMinus.size());
14716  n = qMin(n, keyErrorPlus.size());
14717  QCPData newData;
14718  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14719  {
14720  newData.key = key[i];
14721  newData.value = value[i];
14722  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyErrorMinus[i];
14723  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyErrorPlus[i];
14724  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueErrorMinus[i];
14725  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueErrorPlus[i];
14726  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14727  }
14728 }
14729 
14730 
14737 void QCPGraph::setLineStyle(LineStyle ls)
14738 {
14739  mLineStyle = ls;
14740 }
14741 
14748 void QCPGraph::setScatterStyle(const QCPScatterStyle &style)
14749 {
14750  mScatterStyle = style;
14751 }
14752 
14761 void QCPGraph::setErrorType(ErrorType errorType)
14762 {
14763  mErrorType = errorType;
14764 }
14765 
14770 void QCPGraph::setErrorPen(const QPen &pen)
14771 {
14772  mErrorPen = pen;
14773 }
14774 
14778 void QCPGraph::setErrorBarSize(double size)
14779 {
14780  mErrorBarSize = size;
14781 }
14782 
14794 void QCPGraph::setErrorBarSkipSymbol(bool enabled)
14795 {
14796  mErrorBarSkipSymbol = enabled;
14797 }
14798 
14808 void QCPGraph::setChannelFillGraph(QCPGraph *targetGraph)
14809 {
14810  // prevent setting channel target to this graph itself:
14811  if (targetGraph == this)
14812  {
14813  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "targetGraph is this graph itself";
14814  mChannelFillGraph = 0;
14815  return;
14816  }
14817  // prevent setting channel target to a graph not in the plot:
14818  if (targetGraph && targetGraph->mParentPlot != mParentPlot)
14819  {
14820  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "targetGraph not in same plot";
14821  mChannelFillGraph = 0;
14822  return;
14823  }
14824 
14825  mChannelFillGraph = targetGraph;
14826 }
14827 
14859 void QCPGraph::setAdaptiveSampling(bool enabled)
14860 {
14861  mAdaptiveSampling = enabled;
14862 }
14863 
14872 void QCPGraph::addData(const QCPDataMap &dataMap)
14873 {
14874  mData->unite(dataMap);
14875 }
14876 
14885 void QCPGraph::addData(const QCPData &data)
14886 {
14887  mData->insertMulti(data.key, data);
14888 }
14889 
14898 void QCPGraph::addData(double key, double value)
14899 {
14900  QCPData newData;
14901  newData.key = key;
14902  newData.value = value;
14903  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
14904 }
14905 
14914 void QCPGraph::addData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &values)
14915 {
14916  int n = qMin(keys.size(), values.size());
14917  QCPData newData;
14918  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14919  {
14920  newData.key = keys[i];
14921  newData.value = values[i];
14922  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
14923  }
14924 }
14925 
14930 void QCPGraph::removeDataBefore(double key)
14931 {
14932  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
14933  while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < key)
14934  it = mData->erase(it);
14935 }
14936 
14941 void QCPGraph::removeDataAfter(double key)
14942 {
14943  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
14944  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(key);
14945  while (it != mData->end())
14946  it = mData->erase(it);
14947 }
14948 
14956 void QCPGraph::removeData(double fromKey, double toKey)
14957 {
14958  if (fromKey >= toKey || mData->isEmpty()) return;
14959  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromKey);
14960  QCPDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(toKey);
14961  while (it != itEnd)
14962  it = mData->erase(it);
14963 }
14964 
14973 void QCPGraph::removeData(double key)
14974 {
14975  mData->remove(key);
14976 }
14977 
14982 void QCPGraph::clearData()
14983 {
14984  mData->clear();
14985 }
14986 
14987 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14988 double QCPGraph::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
14989 {
14990  Q_UNUSED(details)
14991  if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectable) || mData->isEmpty())
14992  return -1;
14993  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
14994 
14995  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
14996  return pointDistance(pos);
14997  else
14998  return -1;
14999 }
15000 
15008 void QCPGraph::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const
15009 {
15010  rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge, includeErrorBars);
15011  rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge, includeErrorBars);
15012 }
15013 
15021 void QCPGraph::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const
15022 {
15023  // this code is a copy of QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis with the only change
15024  // that getKeyRange is passed the includeErrorBars value.
15025  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
15026 
15027  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15028  if (!keyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
15029 
15030  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
15031  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
15032  signDomain = (keyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
15033 
15034  bool foundRange;
15035  QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(foundRange, signDomain, includeErrorBars);
15036 
15037  if (foundRange)
15038  {
15039  if (onlyEnlarge)
15040  {
15041  if (keyAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
15042  newRange.lower = keyAxis->range().lower;
15043  if (keyAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
15044  newRange.upper = keyAxis->range().upper;
15045  }
15046  keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
15047  }
15048 }
15049 
15057 void QCPGraph::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const
15058 {
15059  // this code is a copy of QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis with the only change
15060  // is that getValueRange is passed the includeErrorBars value.
15061  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
15062 
15063  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15064  if (!valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid value axis"; return; }
15065 
15066  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
15067  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
15068  signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
15069 
15070  bool foundRange;
15071  QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(foundRange, signDomain, includeErrorBars);
15072 
15073  if (foundRange)
15074  {
15075  if (onlyEnlarge)
15076  {
15077  if (valueAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
15078  newRange.lower = valueAxis->range().lower;
15079  if (valueAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
15080  newRange.upper = valueAxis->range().upper;
15081  }
15082  valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
15083  }
15084 }
15085 
15086 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15087 void QCPGraph::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15088 {
15089  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15090  if (mKeyAxis.data()->range().size() <= 0 || mData->isEmpty()) return;
15091  if (mLineStyle == lsNone && mScatterStyle.isNone()) return;
15092 
15093  // allocate line and (if necessary) point vectors:
15094  QVector<QPointF> *lineData = new QVector<QPointF>;
15095  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData = 0;
15096  if (!mScatterStyle.isNone())
15097  scatterData = new QVector<QCPData>;
15098 
15099  // fill vectors with data appropriate to plot style:
15100  getPlotData(lineData, scatterData);
15101 
15102  // check data validity if flag set:
15103 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
15104  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it;
15105  for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it)
15106  {
15107  if (QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().key, it.value().value) ||
15108  QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().keyErrorPlus, it.value().keyErrorMinus) ||
15109  QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().valueErrorPlus, it.value().valueErrorPlus))
15110  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << it.key() << "invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
15111  }
15112 #endif
15113 
15114  // draw fill of graph:
15115  drawFill(painter, lineData);
15116 
15117  // draw line:
15118  if (mLineStyle == lsImpulse)
15119  drawImpulsePlot(painter, lineData);
15120  else if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
15121  drawLinePlot(painter, lineData); // also step plots can be drawn as a line plot
15122 
15123  // draw scatters:
15124  if (scatterData)
15125  drawScatterPlot(painter, scatterData);
15126 
15127  // free allocated line and point vectors:
15128  delete lineData;
15129  if (scatterData)
15130  delete scatterData;
15131 }
15132 
15133 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15134 void QCPGraph::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
15135 {
15136  // draw fill:
15137  if (mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
15138  {
15139  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
15140  painter->fillRect(QRectF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.width(), rect.height()/3.0), mBrush);
15141  }
15142  // draw line vertically centered:
15143  if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
15144  {
15145  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
15146  painter->setPen(mPen);
15147  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.right()+5, rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0)); // +5 on x2 else last segment is missing from dashed/dotted pens
15148  }
15149  // draw scatter symbol:
15150  if (!mScatterStyle.isNone())
15151  {
15152  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
15153  // scale scatter pixmap if it's too large to fit in legend icon rect:
15154  if (mScatterStyle.shape() == QCPScatterStyle::ssPixmap && (mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().width() > rect.width() || mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().height() > rect.height()))
15155  {
15156  QCPScatterStyle scaledStyle(mScatterStyle);
15157  scaledStyle.setPixmap(scaledStyle.pixmap().scaled(rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation));
15158  scaledStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
15159  scaledStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
15160  } else
15161  {
15162  mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
15163  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
15164  }
15165  }
15166 }
15167 
15186 void QCPGraph::getPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *lineData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15187 {
15188  switch(mLineStyle)
15189  {
15190  case lsNone: getScatterPlotData(scatterData); break;
15191  case lsLine: getLinePlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15192  case lsStepLeft: getStepLeftPlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15193  case lsStepRight: getStepRightPlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15194  case lsStepCenter: getStepCenterPlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15195  case lsImpulse: getImpulsePlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15196  }
15197 }
15198 
15210 void QCPGraph::getScatterPlotData(QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15211 {
15212  getPreparedData(0, scatterData);
15213 }
15214 
15226 void QCPGraph::getLinePlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15227 {
15228  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15229  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15230  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15231  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as linePixelData"; return; }
15232 
15233  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15234  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15235  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15236  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size());
15237 
15238  // transform lineData points to pixels:
15239  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15240  {
15241  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15242  {
15243  (*linePixelData)[i].setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15244  (*linePixelData)[i].setY(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key));
15245  }
15246  } else // key axis is horizontal
15247  {
15248  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15249  {
15250  (*linePixelData)[i].setX(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key));
15251  (*linePixelData)[i].setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15252  }
15253  }
15254 }
15255 
15267 void QCPGraph::getStepLeftPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15268 {
15269  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15270  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15271  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15272  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData"; return; }
15273 
15274  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15275  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15276  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()*2+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15277  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2);
15278 
15279  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
15280  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15281  {
15282  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15283  double key;
15284  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15285  {
15286  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15287  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(lastValue);
15288  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(key);
15289  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15290  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(lastValue);
15291  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(key);
15292  }
15293  } else // key axis is horizontal
15294  {
15295  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15296  double key;
15297  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15298  {
15299  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15300  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(key);
15301  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(lastValue);
15302  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15303  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(key);
15304  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(lastValue);
15305  }
15306  }
15307 }
15308 
15320 void QCPGraph::getStepRightPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15321 {
15322  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15323  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15324  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15325  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData"; return; }
15326 
15327  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15328  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15329  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()*2+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15330  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2);
15331 
15332  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
15333  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15334  {
15335  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15336  double value;
15337  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15338  {
15339  value = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15340  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(value);
15341  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(lastKey);
15342  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15343  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(value);
15344  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(lastKey);
15345  }
15346  } else // key axis is horizontal
15347  {
15348  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15349  double value;
15350  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15351  {
15352  value = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15353  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(lastKey);
15354  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(value);
15355  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15356  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(lastKey);
15357  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(value);
15358  }
15359  }
15360 }
15361 
15373 void QCPGraph::getStepCenterPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15374 {
15375  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15376  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15377  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15378  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData"; return; }
15379 
15380  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15381  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15382  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()*2+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15383  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2);
15384  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
15385  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15386  {
15387  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15388  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15389  double key;
15390  (*linePixelData)[0].setX(lastValue);
15391  (*linePixelData)[0].setY(lastKey);
15392  for (int i=1; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15393  {
15394  key = (keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key)+lastKey)*0.5;
15395  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setX(lastValue);
15396  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setY(key);
15397  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15398  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15399  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(lastValue);
15400  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(key);
15401  }
15402  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setX(lastValue);
15403  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setY(lastKey);
15404  } else // key axis is horizontal
15405  {
15406  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15407  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15408  double key;
15409  (*linePixelData)[0].setX(lastKey);
15410  (*linePixelData)[0].setY(lastValue);
15411  for (int i=1; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15412  {
15413  key = (keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key)+lastKey)*0.5;
15414  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setX(key);
15415  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setY(lastValue);
15416  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15417  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15418  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(key);
15419  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(lastValue);
15420  }
15421  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setX(lastKey);
15422  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setY(lastValue);
15423  }
15424 
15425 }
15426 
15438 void QCPGraph::getImpulsePlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15439 {
15440  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15441  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15442  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15443  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as linePixelData"; return; }
15444 
15445  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15446  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15447  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2); // no need to reserve 2 extra points because impulse plot has no fill
15448 
15449  // transform lineData points to pixels:
15450  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15451  {
15452  double zeroPointX = valueAxis->coordToPixel(0);
15453  double key;
15454  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15455  {
15456  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15457  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(zeroPointX);
15458  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(key);
15459  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15460  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(key);
15461  }
15462  } else // key axis is horizontal
15463  {
15464  double zeroPointY = valueAxis->coordToPixel(0);
15465  double key;
15466  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15467  {
15468  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15469  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(key);
15470  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(zeroPointY);
15471  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(key);
15472  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15473  }
15474  }
15475 }
15476 
15490 void QCPGraph::drawFill(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
15491 {
15492  if (mLineStyle == lsImpulse) return; // fill doesn't make sense for impulse plot
15493  if (mainBrush().style() == Qt::NoBrush || mainBrush().color().alpha() == 0) return;
15494 
15495  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
15496  if (!mChannelFillGraph)
15497  {
15498  // draw base fill under graph, fill goes all the way to the zero-value-line:
15499  addFillBasePoints(lineData);
15500  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
15501  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15502  painter->drawPolygon(QPolygonF(*lineData));
15503  removeFillBasePoints(lineData);
15504  } else
15505  {
15506  // draw channel fill between this graph and mChannelFillGraph:
15507  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
15508  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15509  painter->drawPolygon(getChannelFillPolygon(lineData));
15510  }
15511 }
15512 
15522 void QCPGraph::drawScatterPlot(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15523 {
15524  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15525  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15526  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15527 
15528  // draw error bars:
15529  if (mErrorType != etNone)
15530  {
15531  applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(painter);
15532  painter->setPen(mErrorPen);
15533  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15534  {
15535  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15536  drawError(painter, valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key), scatterData->at(i));
15537  } else
15538  {
15539  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15540  drawError(painter, keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value), scatterData->at(i));
15541  }
15542  }
15543 
15544  // draw scatter point symbols:
15545  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
15546  mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
15547  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15548  {
15549  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15550  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key));
15551  } else
15552  {
15553  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15554  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value));
15555  }
15556 }
15557 
15567 void QCPGraph::drawLinePlot(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
15568 {
15569  // draw line of graph:
15570  if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)
15571  {
15572  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
15573  painter->setPen(mainPen());
15574  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15575 
15576  /* Draws polyline in batches, currently not used:
15577  int p = 0;
15578  while (p < lineData->size())
15579  {
15580  int batch = qMin(25, lineData->size()-p);
15581  if (p != 0)
15582  {
15583  ++batch;
15584  --p; // to draw the connection lines between two batches
15585  }
15586  painter->drawPolyline(lineData->constData()+p, batch);
15587  p += batch;
15588  }
15589  */
15590 
15591  // if drawing solid line and not in PDF, use much faster line drawing instead of polyline:
15592  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phFastPolylines) &&
15593  painter->pen().style() == Qt::SolidLine &&
15594  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmVectorized)&&
15595  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching))
15596  {
15597  for (int i=1; i<lineData->size(); ++i)
15598  painter->drawLine(lineData->at(i-1), lineData->at(i));
15599  } else
15600  {
15601  painter->drawPolyline(QPolygonF(*lineData));
15602  }
15603  }
15604 }
15605 
15613 void QCPGraph::drawImpulsePlot(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
15614 {
15615  // draw impulses:
15616  if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)
15617  {
15618  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
15619  QPen pen = mainPen();
15620  pen.setCapStyle(Qt::FlatCap); // so impulse line doesn't reach beyond zero-line
15621  painter->setPen(pen);
15622  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15623  painter->drawLines(*lineData);
15624  }
15625 }
15626 
15639 void QCPGraph::getPreparedData(QVector<QCPData> *lineData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15640 {
15641  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15642  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15643  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15644  // get visible data range:
15645  QCPDataMap::const_iterator lower, upper; // note that upper is the actual upper point, and not 1 step after the upper point
15646  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upper);
15647  if (lower == mData->constEnd() || upper == mData->constEnd())
15648  return;
15649 
15650  // count points in visible range, taking into account that we only need to count to the limit maxCount if using adaptive sampling:
15651  int maxCount = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
15652  if (mAdaptiveSampling)
15653  {
15654  int keyPixelSpan = qAbs(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key())-keyAxis->coordToPixel(upper.key()));
15655  maxCount = 2*keyPixelSpan+2;
15656  }
15657  int dataCount = countDataInBounds(lower, upper, maxCount);
15658 
15659  if (mAdaptiveSampling && dataCount >= maxCount) // use adaptive sampling only if there are at least two points per pixel on average
15660  {
15661  if (lineData)
15662  {
15663  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
15664  QCPDataMap::const_iterator upperEnd = upper+1;
15665  double minValue = it.value().value;
15666  double maxValue = it.value().value;
15667  QCPDataMap::const_iterator currentIntervalFirstPoint = it;
15668  int reversedFactor = keyAxis->rangeReversed() ? -1 : 1; // is used to calculate keyEpsilon pixel into the correct direction
15669  int reversedRound = keyAxis->rangeReversed() ? 1 : 0; // is used to switch between floor (normal) and ceil (reversed) rounding of currentIntervalStartKey
15670  double currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key())+reversedRound));
15671  double lastIntervalEndKey = currentIntervalStartKey;
15672  double keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor)); // interval of one pixel on screen when mapped to plot key coordinates
15673  bool keyEpsilonVariable = keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic; // indicates whether keyEpsilon needs to be updated after every interval (for log axes)
15674  int intervalDataCount = 1;
15675  ++it; // advance iterator to second data point because adaptive sampling works in 1 point retrospect
15676  while (it != upperEnd)
15677  {
15678  if (it.key() < currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon) // data point is still within same pixel, so skip it and expand value span of this cluster if necessary
15679  {
15680  if (it.value().value < minValue)
15681  minValue = it.value().value;
15682  else if (it.value().value > maxValue)
15683  maxValue = it.value().value;
15684  ++intervalDataCount;
15685  } else // new pixel interval started
15686  {
15687  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them to a cluster
15688  {
15689  if (lastIntervalEndKey < currentIntervalStartKey-keyEpsilon) // last point is further away, so first point of this cluster must be at a real data point
15690  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.2, currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
15691  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.25, minValue));
15692  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.75, maxValue));
15693  if (it.key() > currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*2) // new pixel started further away from previous cluster, so make sure the last point of the cluster is at a real data point
15694  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.8, (it-1).value().value));
15695  } else
15696  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalFirstPoint.key(), currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
15697  lastIntervalEndKey = (it-1).value().key;
15698  minValue = it.value().value;
15699  maxValue = it.value().value;
15700  currentIntervalFirstPoint = it;
15701  currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.key())+reversedRound));
15702  if (keyEpsilonVariable)
15703  keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor));
15704  intervalDataCount = 1;
15705  }
15706  ++it;
15707  }
15708  // handle last interval:
15709  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them to a cluster
15710  {
15711  if (lastIntervalEndKey < currentIntervalStartKey-keyEpsilon) // last point wasn't a cluster, so first point of this cluster must be at a real data point
15712  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.2, currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
15713  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.25, minValue));
15714  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.75, maxValue));
15715  } else
15716  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalFirstPoint.key(), currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
15717  }
15718 
15719  if (scatterData)
15720  {
15721  double valueMaxRange = valueAxis->range().upper;
15722  double valueMinRange = valueAxis->range().lower;
15723  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
15724  QCPDataMap::const_iterator upperEnd = upper+1;
15725  double minValue = it.value().value;
15726  double maxValue = it.value().value;
15727  QCPDataMap::const_iterator minValueIt = it;
15728  QCPDataMap::const_iterator maxValueIt = it;
15729  QCPDataMap::const_iterator currentIntervalStart = it;
15730  int reversedFactor = keyAxis->rangeReversed() ? -1 : 1; // is used to calculate keyEpsilon pixel into the correct direction
15731  int reversedRound = keyAxis->rangeReversed() ? 1 : 0; // is used to switch between floor (normal) and ceil (reversed) rounding of currentIntervalStartKey
15732  double currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key())+reversedRound));
15733  double keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor)); // interval of one pixel on screen when mapped to plot key coordinates
15734  bool keyEpsilonVariable = keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic; // indicates whether keyEpsilon needs to be updated after every interval (for log axes)
15735  int intervalDataCount = 1;
15736  ++it; // advance iterator to second data point because adaptive sampling works in 1 point retrospect
15737  while (it != upperEnd)
15738  {
15739  if (it.key() < currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon) // data point is still within same pixel, so skip it and expand value span of this pixel if necessary
15740  {
15741  if (it.value().value < minValue && it.value().value > valueMinRange && it.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15742  {
15743  minValue = it.value().value;
15744  minValueIt = it;
15745  } else if (it.value().value > maxValue && it.value().value > valueMinRange && it.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15746  {
15747  maxValue = it.value().value;
15748  maxValueIt = it;
15749  }
15750  ++intervalDataCount;
15751  } else // new pixel started
15752  {
15753  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them
15754  {
15755  // determine value pixel span and add as many points in interval to maintain certain vertical data density (this is specific to scatter plot):
15756  double valuePixelSpan = qAbs(valueAxis->coordToPixel(minValue)-valueAxis->coordToPixel(maxValue));
15757  int dataModulo = qMax(1, qRound(intervalDataCount/(valuePixelSpan/4.0))); // approximately every 4 value pixels one data point on average
15758  QCPDataMap::const_iterator intervalIt = currentIntervalStart;
15759  int c = 0;
15760  while (intervalIt != it)
15761  {
15762  if ((c % dataModulo == 0 || intervalIt == minValueIt || intervalIt == maxValueIt) && intervalIt.value().value > valueMinRange && intervalIt.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15763  scatterData->append(intervalIt.value());
15764  ++c;
15765  ++intervalIt;
15766  }
15767  } else if (currentIntervalStart.value().value > valueMinRange && currentIntervalStart.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15768  scatterData->append(currentIntervalStart.value());
15769  minValue = it.value().value;
15770  maxValue = it.value().value;
15771  currentIntervalStart = it;
15772  currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.key())+reversedRound));
15773  if (keyEpsilonVariable)
15774  keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor));
15775  intervalDataCount = 1;
15776  }
15777  ++it;
15778  }
15779  // handle last interval:
15780  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them
15781  {
15782  // determine value pixel span and add as many points in interval to maintain certain vertical data density (this is specific to scatter plot):
15783  double valuePixelSpan = qAbs(valueAxis->coordToPixel(minValue)-valueAxis->coordToPixel(maxValue));
15784  int dataModulo = qMax(1, qRound(intervalDataCount/(valuePixelSpan/4.0))); // approximately every 4 value pixels one data point on average
15785  QCPDataMap::const_iterator intervalIt = currentIntervalStart;
15786  int c = 0;
15787  while (intervalIt != it)
15788  {
15789  if ((c % dataModulo == 0 || intervalIt == minValueIt || intervalIt == maxValueIt) && intervalIt.value().value > valueMinRange && intervalIt.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15790  scatterData->append(intervalIt.value());
15791  ++c;
15792  ++intervalIt;
15793  }
15794  } else if (currentIntervalStart.value().value > valueMinRange && currentIntervalStart.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15795  scatterData->append(currentIntervalStart.value());
15796  }
15797  } else // don't use adaptive sampling algorithm, transfer points one-to-one from the map into the output parameters
15798  {
15799  QVector<QCPData> *dataVector = 0;
15800  if (lineData)
15801  dataVector = lineData;
15802  else if (scatterData)
15803  dataVector = scatterData;
15804  if (dataVector)
15805  {
15806  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
15807  QCPDataMap::const_iterator upperEnd = upper+1;
15808  dataVector->reserve(dataCount+2); // +2 for possible fill end points
15809  while (it != upperEnd)
15810  {
15811  dataVector->append(it.value());
15812  ++it;
15813  }
15814  }
15815  if (lineData && scatterData)
15816  *scatterData = *dataVector;
15817  }
15818 }
15819 
15827 void QCPGraph::drawError(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y, const QCPData &data) const
15828 {
15829  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15830  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15831  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15832 
15833  double a, b; // positions of error bar bounds in pixels
15834  double barWidthHalf = mErrorBarSize*0.5;
15835  double skipSymbolMargin = mScatterStyle.size(); // pixels left blank per side, when mErrorBarSkipSymbol is true
15836 
15837  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15838  {
15839  // draw key error vertically and value error horizontally
15840  if (mErrorType == etKey || mErrorType == etBoth)
15841  {
15842  a = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key-data.keyErrorMinus);
15843  b = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key+data.keyErrorPlus);
15844  if (keyAxis->rangeReversed())
15845  qSwap(a,b);
15846  // draw spine:
15847  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
15848  {
15849  if (a-y > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
15850  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, y+skipSymbolMargin));
15851  if (y-b > skipSymbolMargin)
15852  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y-skipSymbolMargin, x, b));
15853  } else
15854  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, b));
15855  // draw handles:
15856  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, a, x+barWidthHalf, a));
15857  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, b, x+barWidthHalf, b));
15858  }
15859  if (mErrorType == etValue || mErrorType == etBoth)
15860  {
15861  a = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value-data.valueErrorMinus);
15862  b = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value+data.valueErrorPlus);
15863  if (valueAxis->rangeReversed())
15864  qSwap(a,b);
15865  // draw spine:
15866  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
15867  {
15868  if (x-a > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
15869  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, x-skipSymbolMargin, y));
15870  if (b-x > skipSymbolMargin)
15871  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+skipSymbolMargin, y, b, y));
15872  } else
15873  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, b, y));
15874  // draw handles:
15875  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y-barWidthHalf, a, y+barWidthHalf));
15876  painter->drawLine(QLineF(b, y-barWidthHalf, b, y+barWidthHalf));
15877  }
15878  } else // mKeyAxis->orientation() is Qt::Horizontal
15879  {
15880  // draw value error vertically and key error horizontally
15881  if (mErrorType == etKey || mErrorType == etBoth)
15882  {
15883  a = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key-data.keyErrorMinus);
15884  b = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key+data.keyErrorPlus);
15885  if (keyAxis->rangeReversed())
15886  qSwap(a,b);
15887  // draw spine:
15888  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
15889  {
15890  if (x-a > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
15891  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, x-skipSymbolMargin, y));
15892  if (b-x > skipSymbolMargin)
15893  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+skipSymbolMargin, y, b, y));
15894  } else
15895  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, b, y));
15896  // draw handles:
15897  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y-barWidthHalf, a, y+barWidthHalf));
15898  painter->drawLine(QLineF(b, y-barWidthHalf, b, y+barWidthHalf));
15899  }
15900  if (mErrorType == etValue || mErrorType == etBoth)
15901  {
15902  a = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value-data.valueErrorMinus);
15903  b = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value+data.valueErrorPlus);
15904  if (valueAxis->rangeReversed())
15905  qSwap(a,b);
15906  // draw spine:
15907  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
15908  {
15909  if (a-y > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
15910  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, y+skipSymbolMargin));
15911  if (y-b > skipSymbolMargin)
15912  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y-skipSymbolMargin, x, b));
15913  } else
15914  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, b));
15915  // draw handles:
15916  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, a, x+barWidthHalf, a));
15917  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, b, x+barWidthHalf, b));
15918  }
15919  }
15920 }
15921 
15936 void QCPGraph::getVisibleDataBounds(QCPDataMap::const_iterator &lower, QCPDataMap::const_iterator &upper) const
15937 {
15938  if (!mKeyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
15939  if (mData->isEmpty())
15940  {
15941  lower = mData->constEnd();
15942  upper = mData->constEnd();
15943  return;
15944  }
15945 
15946  // get visible data range as QMap iterators
15947  QCPDataMap::const_iterator lbound = mData->lowerBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower);
15948  QCPDataMap::const_iterator ubound = mData->upperBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper);
15949  bool lowoutlier = lbound != mData->constBegin(); // indicates whether there exist points below axis range
15950  bool highoutlier = ubound != mData->constEnd(); // indicates whether there exist points above axis range
15951 
15952  lower = (lowoutlier ? lbound-1 : lbound); // data point range that will be actually drawn
15953  upper = (highoutlier ? ubound : ubound-1); // data point range that will be actually drawn
15954 }
15955 
15966 int QCPGraph::countDataInBounds(const QCPDataMap::const_iterator &lower, const QCPDataMap::const_iterator &upper, int maxCount) const
15967 {
15968  if (upper == mData->constEnd() && lower == mData->constEnd())
15969  return 0;
15970  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
15971  int count = 1;
15972  while (it != upper && count < maxCount)
15973  {
15974  ++it;
15975  ++count;
15976  }
15977  return count;
15978 }
15979 
15995 void QCPGraph::addFillBasePoints(QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
15996 {
15997  if (!mKeyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
15998 
15999  // append points that close the polygon fill at the key axis:
16000  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
16001  {
16002  *lineData << upperFillBasePoint(lineData->last().y());
16003  *lineData << lowerFillBasePoint(lineData->first().y());
16004  } else
16005  {
16006  *lineData << upperFillBasePoint(lineData->last().x());
16007  *lineData << lowerFillBasePoint(lineData->first().x());
16008  }
16009 }
16010 
16017 void QCPGraph::removeFillBasePoints(QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
16018 {
16019  lineData->remove(lineData->size()-2, 2);
16020 }
16021 
16036 QPointF QCPGraph::lowerFillBasePoint(double lowerKey) const
16037 {
16038  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16039  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16040  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
16041 
16042  QPointF point;
16043  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
16044  {
16045  if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atLeft)
16046  {
16047  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16048  point.setY(lowerKey);
16049  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atRight)
16050  {
16051  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16052  point.setY(lowerKey);
16053  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop)
16054  {
16055  point.setX(lowerKey);
16056  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16057  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16058  {
16059  point.setX(lowerKey);
16060  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16061  }
16062  } else // valueAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic
16063  {
16064  // In logarithmic scaling we can't just draw to value zero so we just fill all the way
16065  // to the axis which is in the direction towards zero
16066  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
16067  {
16068  if ((valueAxis->range().upper < 0 && !valueAxis->rangeReversed()) ||
16069  (valueAxis->range().upper > 0 && valueAxis->rangeReversed())) // if range is negative, zero is on opposite side of key axis
16070  point.setX(keyAxis->axisRect()->right());
16071  else
16072  point.setX(keyAxis->axisRect()->left());
16073  point.setY(lowerKey);
16074  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop || keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16075  {
16076  point.setX(lowerKey);
16077  if ((valueAxis->range().upper < 0 && !valueAxis->rangeReversed()) ||
16078  (valueAxis->range().upper > 0 && valueAxis->rangeReversed())) // if range is negative, zero is on opposite side of key axis
16079  point.setY(keyAxis->axisRect()->top());
16080  else
16081  point.setY(keyAxis->axisRect()->bottom());
16082  }
16083  }
16084  return point;
16085 }
16086 
16101 QPointF QCPGraph::upperFillBasePoint(double upperKey) const
16102 {
16103  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16104  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16105  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
16106 
16107  QPointF point;
16108  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
16109  {
16110  if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atLeft)
16111  {
16112  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16113  point.setY(upperKey);
16114  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atRight)
16115  {
16116  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16117  point.setY(upperKey);
16118  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop)
16119  {
16120  point.setX(upperKey);
16121  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16122  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16123  {
16124  point.setX(upperKey);
16125  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16126  }
16127  } else // valueAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic
16128  {
16129  // In logarithmic scaling we can't just draw to value 0 so we just fill all the way
16130  // to the axis which is in the direction towards 0
16131  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
16132  {
16133  if ((valueAxis->range().upper < 0 && !valueAxis->rangeReversed()) ||
16134  (valueAxis->range().upper > 0 && valueAxis->rangeReversed())) // if range is negative, zero is on opposite side of key axis
16135  point.setX(keyAxis->axisRect()->right());
16136  else
16137  point.setX(keyAxis->axisRect()->left());
16138  point.setY(upperKey);
16139  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop || keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16140  {
16141  point.setX(upperKey);
16142  if ((valueAxis->range().upper < 0 && !valueAxis->rangeReversed()) ||
16143  (valueAxis->range().upper > 0 && valueAxis->rangeReversed())) // if range is negative, zero is on opposite side of key axis
16144  point.setY(keyAxis->axisRect()->top());
16145  else
16146  point.setY(keyAxis->axisRect()->bottom());
16147  }
16148  }
16149  return point;
16150 }
16151 
16161 const QPolygonF QCPGraph::getChannelFillPolygon(const QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
16162 {
16163  if (!mChannelFillGraph)
16164  return QPolygonF();
16165 
16166  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16167  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16168  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPolygonF(); }
16169  if (!mChannelFillGraph.data()->mKeyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "channel fill target key axis invalid"; return QPolygonF(); }
16170 
16171  if (mChannelFillGraph.data()->mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() != keyAxis->orientation())
