18177 void QCPStatisticalBox::setMedianPen(const QPen &pen)
18178 {
18179  mMedianPen = pen;
18180 }
18181 
18187 void QCPStatisticalBox::setOutlierStyle(const QCPScatterStyle &style)
18188 {
18189  mOutlierStyle = style;
18190 }
18191 
18192 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18193 void QCPStatisticalBox::clearData()
18194 {
18195  setOutliers(QVector<double>());
18196  setKey(0);
18197  setMinimum(0);
18198  setLowerQuartile(0);
18199  setMedian(0);
18200  setUpperQuartile(0);
18201  setMaximum(0);
18202 }
18203 
18204 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18205 double QCPStatisticalBox::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
18206 {
18207  Q_UNUSED(details)
18208  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
18209  return -1;
18210  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
18211 
18212  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
18213  {
18214  double posKey, posValue;
18215  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
18216  // quartile box:
18217  QCPRange keyRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
18218  QCPRange valueRange(mLowerQuartile, mUpperQuartile);
18219  if (keyRange.contains(posKey) && valueRange.contains(posValue))
18220  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
18221 
18222  // min/max whiskers:
18223  if (QCPRange(mMinimum, mMaximum).contains(posValue))
18224  return qAbs(mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey)-mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(posKey));
18225  }
18226  return -1;
18227 }
18228 
18229 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18230 void QCPStatisticalBox::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
18231 {
18232  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
18233 
18234  // check data validity if flag set:
18235 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
18236  if (QCP::isInvalidData(mKey, mMedian) ||
18237  QCP::isInvalidData(mLowerQuartile, mUpperQuartile) ||
18238  QCP::isInvalidData(mMinimum, mMaximum))
18239  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << mKey << "of drawn range has invalid data." << "Plottable name:" << name();
18240  for (int i=0; i<mOutliers.size(); ++i)
18241  if (QCP::isInvalidData(mOutliers.at(i)))
18242  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point outlier at" << mKey << "of drawn range invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
18243 #endif
18244 
18245  QRectF quartileBox;
18246  drawQuartileBox(painter, &quartileBox);
18247 
18248  painter->save();
18249  painter->setClipRect(quartileBox, Qt::IntersectClip);
18250  drawMedian(painter);
18251  painter->restore();
18252 
18253  drawWhiskers(painter);
18254  drawOutliers(painter);
18255 }
18256 
18257 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18258 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
18259 {
18260  // draw filled rect:
18261  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
18262  painter->setPen(mPen);
18263  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
18264  QRectF r = QRectF(0, 0, rect.width()*0.67, rect.height()*0.67);
18265  r.moveCenter(rect.center());
18266  painter->drawRect(r);
18267 }
18268 
18275 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawQuartileBox(QCPPainter *painter, QRectF *quartileBox) const
18276 {
18277  QRectF box;
18278  box.setTopLeft(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mUpperQuartile));
18279  box.setBottomRight(coordsToPixels(mKey+mWidth*0.5, mLowerQuartile));
18280  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
18281  painter->setPen(mainPen());
18282  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
18283  painter->drawRect(box);
18284  if (quartileBox)
18285  *quartileBox = box;
18286 }
18287 
18292 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawMedian(QCPPainter *painter) const
18293 {
18294  QLineF medianLine;
18295  medianLine.setP1(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mMedian));
18296  medianLine.setP2(coordsToPixels(mKey+mWidth*0.5, mMedian));
18297  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
18298  painter->setPen(mMedianPen);
18299  painter->drawLine(medianLine);
18300 }
18301 
18306 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawWhiskers(QCPPainter *painter) const
18307 {
18308  QLineF backboneMin, backboneMax, barMin, barMax;
18309  backboneMax.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey, mUpperQuartile), coordsToPixels(mKey, mMaximum));
18310  backboneMin.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey, mLowerQuartile), coordsToPixels(mKey, mMinimum));
18311  barMax.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMaximum), coordsToPixels(mKey+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMaximum));
18312  barMin.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMinimum), coordsToPixels(mKey+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMinimum));
18313  applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(painter);
18314  painter->setPen(mWhiskerPen);
18315  painter->drawLine(backboneMin);
18316  painter->drawLine(backboneMax);
18317  painter->setPen(mWhiskerBarPen);
18318  painter->drawLine(barMin);
18319  painter->drawLine(barMax);
18320 }
18321 
18326 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawOutliers(QCPPainter *painter) const
18327 {
18328  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
18329  mOutlierStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
18330  for (int i=0; i<mOutliers.size(); ++i)
18331  mOutlierStyle.drawShape(painter, coordsToPixels(mKey, mOutliers.at(i)));
18332 }
18333 
18334 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18335 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
18336 {
18337  foundRange = true;
18338  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth)
18339  {
18340  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
18341  } else if (inSignDomain == sdNegative)
18342  {
18343  if (mKey+mWidth*0.5 < 0)
18344  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
18345  else if (mKey < 0)
18346  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey);
18347  else
18348  {
18349  foundRange = false;
18350  return QCPRange();
18351  }
18352  } else if (inSignDomain == sdPositive)
18353  {
18354  if (mKey-mWidth*0.5 > 0)
18355  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
18356  else if (mKey > 0)
18357  return QCPRange(mKey, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
18358  else
18359  {
18360  foundRange = false;
18361  return QCPRange();
18362  }
18363  }
18364  foundRange = false;
18365  return QCPRange();
18366 }
18367 
18368 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18369 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
18370 {
18371  QVector<double> values; // values that must be considered (i.e. all outliers and the five box-parameters)
18372  values.reserve(mOutliers.size() + 5);
18373  values << mMaximum << mUpperQuartile << mMedian << mLowerQuartile << mMinimum;
18374  values << mOutliers;
18375  // go through values and find the ones in legal range:
18376  bool haveUpper = false;
18377  bool haveLower = false;
18378  double upper = 0;
18379  double lower = 0;
18380  for (int i=0; i<values.size(); ++i)
18381  {
18382  if ((inSignDomain == sdNegative && values.at(i) < 0) ||
18383  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && values.at(i) > 0) ||
18384  (inSignDomain == sdBoth))
18385  {
18386  if (values.at(i) > upper || !haveUpper)
18387  {
18388  upper = values.at(i);
18389  haveUpper = true;
18390  }
18391  if (values.at(i) < lower || !haveLower)
18392  {
18393  lower = values.at(i);
18394  haveLower = true;
18395  }
18396  }
18397  }
18398  // return the bounds if we found some sensible values:
18399  if (haveLower && haveUpper)
18400  {
18401  foundRange = true;
18402  return QCPRange(lower, upper);
18403  } else // might happen if all values are in other sign domain
18404  {
18405  foundRange = false;
18406  return QCPRange();
18407  }
18408 }
18409 
18410 
18414 
18443 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
18444 
18451 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
18452 
18460 QCPColorMapData::QCPColorMapData(int keySize, int valueSize, const QCPRange &keyRange, const QCPRange &valueRange) :
18461  mKeySize(0),
18462  mValueSize(0),
18463  mKeyRange(keyRange),
18464  mValueRange(valueRange),
18465  mIsEmpty(true),
18466  mData(0),
18467  mDataModified(true)
18468 {
18469  setSize(keySize, valueSize);
18470  fill(0);
18471 }
18472 
18473 QCPColorMapData::~QCPColorMapData()
18474 {
18475  if (mData)
18476  delete[] mData;
18477 }
18478 
18482 QCPColorMapData::QCPColorMapData(const QCPColorMapData &other) :
18483  mKeySize(0),
18484  mValueSize(0),
18485  mIsEmpty(true),
18486  mData(0),
18487  mDataModified(true)
18488 {
18489  *this = other;
18490 }
18491 
18495 QCPColorMapData &QCPColorMapData::operator=(const QCPColorMapData &other)
18496 {
18497  if (&other != this)
18498  {
18499  const int keySize = other.keySize();
18500  const int valueSize = other.valueSize();
18501  setSize(keySize, valueSize);
18502  setRange(other.keyRange(), other.valueRange());
18503  if (!mIsEmpty)
18504  memcpy(mData, other.mData, sizeof(mData[0])*keySize*valueSize);
18505  mDataBounds = other.mDataBounds;
18506  mDataModified = true;
18507  }
18508  return *this;
18509 }
18510 
18511 /* undocumented getter */
18512 double QCPColorMapData::data(double key, double value)
18513 {
18514  int keyCell = (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5;
18515  int valueCell = (1.0-(value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower))*(mValueSize-1)+0.5;
18516  if (keyCell >= 0 && keyCell < mKeySize && valueCell >= 0 && valueCell < mValueSize)
18517  return mData[valueCell*mKeySize + keyCell];
18518  else
18519  return 0;
18520 }
18521 
18522 /* undocumented getter */
18523 double QCPColorMapData::cell(int keyIndex, int valueIndex)
18524 {
18525  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 && valueIndex < mValueSize)
18526  return mData[valueIndex*mKeySize + keyIndex];
18527  else
18528  return 0;
18529 }
18530 
18543 void QCPColorMapData::setSize(int keySize, int valueSize)
18544 {
18545  if (keySize != mKeySize || valueSize != mValueSize)
18546  {
18547  mKeySize = keySize;
18548  mValueSize = valueSize;
18549  if (mData)
18550  delete[] mData;
18551  mIsEmpty = mKeySize == 0 || mValueSize == 0;
18552  if (!mIsEmpty)
18553  {
18554 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
18555  try { // 2D arrays get memory intensive fast. So if the allocation fails, at least output debug message
18556 #endif
18557  mData = new double[mKeySize*mValueSize];
18558 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
18559  } catch (...) { mData = 0; }
18560 #endif
18561  if (mData)
18562  fill(0);
18563  else
18564  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "out of memory for data dimensions "<< mKeySize << "*" << mValueSize;
18565  } else
18566  mData = 0;
18567  mDataModified = true;
18568  }
18569 }
18570 
18581 void QCPColorMapData::setKeySize(int keySize)
18582 {
18583  setSize(keySize, mValueSize);
18584 }
18585 
18596 void QCPColorMapData::setValueSize(int valueSize)
18597 {
18598  setSize(mKeySize, valueSize);
18599 }
18600 
18611 void QCPColorMapData::setRange(const QCPRange &keyRange, const QCPRange &valueRange)
18612 {
18613  setKeyRange(keyRange);
18614  setValueRange(valueRange);
18615 }
18616 
18627 void QCPColorMapData::setKeyRange(const QCPRange &keyRange)
18628 {
18629  mKeyRange = keyRange;
18630 }
18631 
18642 void QCPColorMapData::setValueRange(const QCPRange &valueRange)
18643 {
18644  mValueRange = valueRange;
18645 }
18646 
18653 void QCPColorMapData::setData(double key, double value, double z)
18654 {
18655  int keyCell = (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5;
18656  int valueCell = (value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)*(mValueSize-1)+0.5;
18657  if (keyCell >= 0 && keyCell < mKeySize && valueCell >= 0 && valueCell < mValueSize)
18658  {
18659  mData[valueCell*mKeySize + keyCell] = z;
18660  if (z < mDataBounds.lower)
18661  mDataBounds.lower = z;
18662  if (z > mDataBounds.upper)
18663  mDataBounds.upper = z;
18664  mDataModified = true;
18665  }
18666 }
18667 
18679 void QCPColorMapData::setCell(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, double z)
18680 {
18681  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 && valueIndex < mValueSize)
18682  {
18683  mData[valueIndex*mKeySize + keyIndex] = z;
18684  if (z < mDataBounds.lower)
18685  mDataBounds.lower = z;
18686  if (z > mDataBounds.upper)
18687  mDataBounds.upper = z;
18688  mDataModified = true;
18689  }
18690 }
18691 
18705 void QCPColorMapData::recalculateDataBounds()
18706 {
18707  if (mKeySize > 0 && mValueSize > 0)
18708  {
18709  double minHeight = mData[0];
18710  double maxHeight = mData[0];
18711  const int dataCount = mValueSize*mKeySize;
18712  for (int i=0; i<dataCount; ++i)
18713  {
18714  if (mData[i] > maxHeight)
18715  maxHeight = mData[i];
18716  if (mData[i] < minHeight)
18717  minHeight = mData[i];
18718  }
18719  mDataBounds.lower = minHeight;
18720  mDataBounds.upper = maxHeight;
18721  }
18722 }
18723 
18729 void QCPColorMapData::clear()
18730 {
18731  setSize(0, 0);
18732 }
18733 
18737 void QCPColorMapData::fill(double z)
18738 {
18739  const int dataCount = mValueSize*mKeySize;
18740  for (int i=0; i<dataCount; ++i)
18741  mData[i] = z;
18742  mDataBounds = QCPRange(z, z);
18743 }
18744 
18757 void QCPColorMapData::coordToCell(double key, double value, int *keyIndex, int *valueIndex) const
18758 {
18759  if (keyIndex)
18760  *keyIndex = (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5;
18761  if (valueIndex)
18762  *valueIndex = (value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)*(mValueSize-1)+0.5;
18763 }
18764 
18775 void QCPColorMapData::cellToCoord(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, double *key, double *value) const
18776 {
18777  if (key)
18778  *key = keyIndex/(double)(mKeySize-1)*(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)+mKeyRange.lower;
18779  if (value)
18780  *value = valueIndex/(double)(mValueSize-1)*(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)+mValueRange.lower;
18781 }
18782 
18783 
18787 
18860 /* start documentation of inline functions */
18861 
18870 /* end documentation of inline functions */
18871 
18872 /* start documentation of signals */
18873 
18895 /* end documentation of signals */
18896 
18903 QCPColorMap::QCPColorMap(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
18904  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
18905  mDataScaleType(QCPAxis::stLinear),
18906  mMapData(new QCPColorMapData(10, 10, QCPRange(0, 5), QCPRange(0, 5))),
18907  mInterpolate(true),
18908  mTightBoundary(false),
18909  mMapImageInvalidated(true)
18910 {
18911 }
18912 
18913 QCPColorMap::~QCPColorMap()
18914 {
18915  delete mMapData;
18916 }
18917 
18925 void QCPColorMap::setData(QCPColorMapData *data, bool copy)
18926 {
18927  if (copy)
18928  {
18929  *mMapData = *data;
18930  } else
18931  {
18932  delete mMapData;
18933  mMapData = data;
18934  }
18935  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
18936 }
18937 
18946 void QCPColorMap::setDataRange(const QCPRange &dataRange)
18947 {
18948  if (!QCPRange::validRange(dataRange)) return;
18949  if (mDataRange.lower != dataRange.lower || mDataRange.upper != dataRange.upper)
18950  {
18951  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
18952  mDataRange = dataRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
18953  else
18954  mDataRange = dataRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
18955  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
18956  emit dataRangeChanged(mDataRange);
18957  }
18958 }
18959 
18965 void QCPColorMap::setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType scaleType)
18966 {
18967  if (mDataScaleType != scaleType)
18968  {
18969  mDataScaleType = scaleType;
18970  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
18971  emit dataScaleTypeChanged(mDataScaleType);
18972  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
18973  setDataRange(mDataRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
18974  }
18975 }
18976 
18988 void QCPColorMap::setGradient(const QCPColorGradient &gradient)
18989 {
18990  if (mGradient != gradient)
18991  {
18992  mGradient = gradient;
18993  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
18994  emit gradientChanged(mGradient);
18995  }
18996 }
18997 
19004 void QCPColorMap::setInterpolate(bool enabled)
19005 {
19006  mInterpolate = enabled;
19007 }
19008 
19020 void QCPColorMap::setTightBoundary(bool enabled)
19021 {
19022  mTightBoundary = enabled;
19023 }
19024 
19039 void QCPColorMap::setColorScale(QCPColorScale *colorScale)
19040 {
19041  if (mColorScale) // unconnect signals from old color scale
19042  {
19043  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
19044  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
19045  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
19046  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
19047  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), this, SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
19048  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
19049  }
19050  mColorScale = colorScale;
19051  if (mColorScale) // connect signals to new color scale
19052  {
19053  setGradient(mColorScale.data()->gradient());
19054  setDataRange(mColorScale.data()->dataRange());
19055  setDataScaleType(mColorScale.data()->dataScaleType());
19056  connect(this, SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
19057  connect(this, SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
19058  connect(this, SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
19059  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
19060  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), this, SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
19061  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
19062  }
19063 }
19064 
19085 void QCPColorMap::rescaleDataRange(bool recalculateDataBounds)
19086 {
19087  if (recalculateDataBounds)
19088  mMapData->recalculateDataBounds();
19089  setDataRange(mMapData->dataBounds());
19090 }
19091 
19106 void QCPColorMap::updateLegendIcon(Qt::TransformationMode transformMode, const QSize &thumbSize)
19107 {
19108  if (mMapImage.isNull() && !data()->isEmpty())
19109  updateMapImage(); // try to update map image if it's null (happens if no draw has happened yet)
19110 
19111  if (!mMapImage.isNull()) // might still be null, e.g. if data is empty, so check here again
19112  {
19113  bool mirrorX = (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? keyAxis() : valueAxis())->rangeReversed();
19114  bool mirrorY = (valueAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical ? valueAxis() : keyAxis())->rangeReversed();
19115  mLegendIcon = QPixmap::fromImage(mMapImage.mirrored(mirrorX, mirrorY)).scaled(thumbSize, Qt::KeepAspectRatio, transformMode);
19116  }
19117 }
19118 
19123 void QCPColorMap::clearData()
19124 {
19125  mMapData->clear();
19126 }
19127 
19128 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19129 double QCPColorMap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
19130 {
19131  Q_UNUSED(details)
19132  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
19133  return -1;
19134  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
19135 
19136  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
19137  {
19138  double posKey, posValue;
19139  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
19140  if (mMapData->keyRange().contains(posKey) && mMapData->valueRange().contains(posValue))
19141  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
19142  }
19143  return -1;
19144 }
19145 
19155 void QCPColorMap::updateMapImage()
19156 {
19157  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
19158  if (!keyAxis) return;
19159 
19160  // resize mMapImage to correct dimensions, according to key/value axes orientation:
19161  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal && (mMapImage.size().width() != mMapData->keySize() || mMapImage.size().height() != mMapData->valueSize()))
19162  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(mMapData->keySize(), mMapData->valueSize()), QImage::Format_RGB32);
19163  else if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical && (mMapImage.size().width() != mMapData->valueSize() || mMapImage.size().height() != mMapData->keySize()))
19164  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(mMapData->valueSize(), mMapData->keySize()), QImage::Format_RGB32);
19165 
19166  const int keySize = mMapData->keySize();
19167  const int valueSize = mMapData->valueSize();
19168  const double *rawData = mMapData->mData;
19169 
19170  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
19171  {
19172  const int lineCount = valueSize;
19173  const int rowCount = keySize;
19174  for (int line=0; line<lineCount; ++line)
19175  {
19176  QRgb* pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mMapImage.scanLine(lineCount-1-line)); // invert scanline index because QImage counts scanlines from top, but our vertical index counts from bottom (mathematical coordinate system)
19177  mGradient.colorize(rawData+line*rowCount, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount, 1, mDataScaleType==QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
19178  }
19179  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
19180  {
19181  const int lineCount = keySize;
19182  const int rowCount = valueSize;
19183  for (int line=0; line<lineCount; ++line)
19184  {
19185  QRgb* pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mMapImage.scanLine(lineCount-1-line)); // invert scanline index because QImage counts scanlines from top, but our vertical index counts from bottom (mathematical coordinate system)
19186  mGradient.colorize(rawData+line, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount, lineCount, mDataScaleType==QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
19187  }
19188  }
19189 
19190  mMapData->mDataModified = false;
19191  mMapImageInvalidated = false;
19192 }
19193 
19194 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19195 void QCPColorMap::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
19196 {
19197  if (mMapData->isEmpty()) return;
19198  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) return;
19199  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
19200 
19201  if (mMapData->mDataModified || mMapImageInvalidated)
19202  updateMapImage();
19203 
19204  double halfSampleKey = 0;
19205  double halfSampleValue = 0;
19206  if (mMapData->keySize() > 1)
19207  halfSampleKey = 0.5*mMapData->keyRange().size()/(double)(mMapData->keySize()-1);
19208  if (mMapData->valueSize() > 1)
19209  halfSampleValue = 0.5*mMapData->valueRange().size()/(double)(mMapData->valueSize()-1);
19210  QRectF imageRect(coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().lower-halfSampleKey, mMapData->valueRange().lower-halfSampleValue),
19211  coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().upper+halfSampleKey, mMapData->valueRange().upper+halfSampleValue));
19212  imageRect = imageRect.normalized();
19213  bool mirrorX = (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? keyAxis() : valueAxis())->rangeReversed();
19214  bool mirrorY = (valueAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical ? valueAxis() : keyAxis())->rangeReversed();
19215  bool smoothBackup = painter->renderHints().testFlag(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform);
19216  painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, mInterpolate);
19217  QRegion clipBackup;
19218  if (mTightBoundary)
19219  {
19220  clipBackup = painter->clipRegion();
19221  painter->setClipRect(QRectF(coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().lower, mMapData->valueRange().lower),
19222  coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().upper, mMapData->valueRange().upper)).normalized(), Qt::IntersectClip);
19223  }
19224  painter->drawImage(imageRect, mMapImage.mirrored(mirrorX, mirrorY));
19225  if (mTightBoundary)
19226  painter->setClipRegion(clipBackup);
19227  painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, smoothBackup);
19228 }
19229 
19230 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19231 void QCPColorMap::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
19232 {
19233  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
19234  // draw map thumbnail:
19235  if (!mLegendIcon.isNull())
19236  {
19237  QPixmap scaledIcon = mLegendIcon.scaled(rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
19238  QRectF iconRect = QRectF(0, 0, scaledIcon.width(), scaledIcon.height());
19239  iconRect.moveCenter(rect.center());
19240  painter->drawPixmap(iconRect.topLeft(), scaledIcon);
19241  }
19242  /*
19243  // draw frame:
19244  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
19245  painter->setPen(Qt::black);
19246  painter->drawRect(rect.adjusted(1, 1, 0, 0));
19247  */
19248 }
19249 
19250 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19251 QCPRange QCPColorMap::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
19252 {
19253  foundRange = true;
19254  QCPRange result = mMapData->keyRange();
19255  result.normalize();
19256  if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive)
19257  {
19258  if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper > 0)
19259  result.lower = result.upper*1e-3;
19260  else if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper <= 0)
19261  foundRange = false;
19262  } else if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative)
19263  {
19264  if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower < 0)
19265  result.upper = result.lower*1e-3;
19266  else if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower >= 0)
19267  foundRange = false;
19268  }
19269  return result;
19270 }
19271 
19272 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19273 QCPRange QCPColorMap::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
19274 {
19275  foundRange = true;
19276  QCPRange result = mMapData->valueRange();
19277  result.normalize();
19278  if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive)
19279  {
19280  if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper > 0)
19281  result.lower = result.upper*1e-3;
19282  else if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper <= 0)
19283  foundRange = false;
19284  } else if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative)
19285  {
19286  if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower < 0)
19287  result.upper = result.lower*1e-3;
19288  else if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower >= 0)
19289  foundRange = false;
19290  }
19291  return result;
19292 }
19293 
19294 
19298 
19312 QCPItemStraightLine::QCPItemStraightLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
19313  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
19314  point1(createPosition("point1")),
19315  point2(createPosition("point2"))
19316 {
19317  point1->setCoords(0, 0);
19318  point2->setCoords(1, 1);
19319 
19320  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
19321  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
19322 }
19323 
19324 QCPItemStraightLine::~QCPItemStraightLine()
19325 {
19326 }
19327 
19333 void QCPItemStraightLine::setPen(const QPen &pen)
19334 {
19335  mPen = pen;
19336 }
19337 
19343 void QCPItemStraightLine::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
19344 {
19345  mSelectedPen = pen;
19346 }
19347 
19348 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19349 double QCPItemStraightLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
19350 {
19351  Q_UNUSED(details)
19352  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
19353  return -1;
19354 
19355  return distToStraightLine(QVector2D(point1->pixelPoint()), QVector2D(point2->pixelPoint()-point1->pixelPoint()), QVector2D(pos));
19356 }
19357 
19358 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19359 void QCPItemStraightLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
19360 {
19361  QVector2D start(point1->pixelPoint());
19362  QVector2D end(point2->pixelPoint());
19363  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
19364  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
19365  QLineF line = getRectClippedStraightLine(start, end-start, clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
19366  // paint visible segment, if existent:
19367  if (!line.isNull())
19368  {
19369  painter->setPen(mainPen());
19370  painter->drawLine(line);
19371  }
19372 }
19373 
19381 double QCPItemStraightLine::distToStraightLine(const QVector2D &base, const QVector2D &vec, const QVector2D &point) const
19382 {
19383  return qAbs((base.y()-point.y())*vec.x()-(base.x()-point.x())*vec.y())/vec.length();
19384 }
19385 
19393 QLineF QCPItemStraightLine::getRectClippedStraightLine(const QVector2D &base, const QVector2D &vec, const QRect &rect) const
19394 {
19395  double bx, by;
19396  double gamma;
19397  QLineF result;
19398  if (vec.x() == 0 && vec.y() == 0)
19399  return result;
19400  if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is vertical
19401  {
19402  // check top of rect:
19403  bx = rect.left();
19404  by = rect.top();
19405  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
19406  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
19407  result.setLine(bx+gamma, rect.top(), bx+gamma, rect.bottom()); // no need to check bottom because we know line is vertical
19408  } else if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is horizontal
19409  {
19410  // check left of rect:
19411  bx = rect.left();
19412  by = rect.top();
19413  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
19414  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
19415  result.setLine(rect.left(), by+gamma, rect.right(), by+gamma); // no need to check right because we know line is horizontal
19416  } else // line is skewed
19417  {
19418  QList<QVector2D> pointVectors;
19419  // check top of rect:
19420  bx = rect.left();
19421  by = rect.top();
19422  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
19423  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
19424  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
19425  // check bottom of rect:
19426  bx = rect.left();
19427  by = rect.bottom();
19428  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
19429  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
19430  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
19431  // check left of rect:
19432  bx = rect.left();
19433  by = rect.top();
19434  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
19435  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
19436  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
19437  // check right of rect:
19438  bx = rect.right();
19439  by = rect.top();
19440  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
19441  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
19442  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
19443 
19444  // evaluate points:
19445  if (pointVectors.size() == 2)
19446  {
19447  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(), pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
19448  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2)
19449  {
19450  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there. single out the point pair with greatest distance:
19451  double distSqrMax = 0;
19452  QVector2D pv1, pv2;
19453  for (int i=0; i<pointVectors.size()-1; ++i)
19454  {
19455  for (int k=i+1; k<pointVectors.size(); ++k)
19456  {
19457  double distSqr = (pointVectors.at(i)-pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
19458  if (distSqr > distSqrMax)
19459  {
19460  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
19461  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
19462  distSqrMax = distSqr;
19463  }
19464  }
19465  }
19466  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
19467  }
19468  }
19469  return result;
19470 }
19471 
19477 QPen QCPItemStraightLine::mainPen() const
19478 {
19479  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
19480 }
19481 
19482 
19486 
19502 QCPItemLine::QCPItemLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
19503  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
19504  start(createPosition("start")),
19505  end(createPosition("end"))
19506 {
19507  start->setCoords(0, 0);
19508  end->setCoords(1, 1);
19509 
19510  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
19511  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
19512 }
19513 
19514 QCPItemLine::~QCPItemLine()
19515 {
19516 }
19517 
19523 void QCPItemLine::setPen(const QPen &pen)
19524 {
19525  mPen = pen;
19526 }
19527 
19533 void QCPItemLine::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
19534 {
19535  mSelectedPen = pen;
19536 }
19537 
19546 void QCPItemLine::setHead(const QCPLineEnding &head)
19547 {
19548  mHead = head;
19549 }
19550 
19559 void QCPItemLine::setTail(const QCPLineEnding &tail)
19560 {
19561  mTail = tail;
19562 }
19563 
19564 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19565 double QCPItemLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
19566 {
19567  Q_UNUSED(details)
19568  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
19569  return -1;
19570 
19571  return qSqrt(distSqrToLine(start->pixelPoint(), end->pixelPoint(), pos));
19572 }
19573 
19574 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19575 void QCPItemLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
19576 {
19577  QVector2D startVec(start->pixelPoint());
19578  QVector2D endVec(end->pixelPoint());
19579  if (startVec.toPoint() == endVec.toPoint())
19580  return;
19581  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
19582  double clipPad = qMax(mHead.boundingDistance(), mTail.boundingDistance());
19583  clipPad = qMax(clipPad, (double)mainPen().widthF());
19584  QLineF line = getRectClippedLine(startVec, endVec, clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
19585  // paint visible segment, if existent:
19586  if (!line.isNull())
19587  {
19588  painter->setPen(mainPen());
19589  painter->drawLine(line);
19590  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
19591  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
19592  mTail.draw(painter, startVec, startVec-endVec);
19593  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
19594  mHead.draw(painter, endVec, endVec-startVec);
19595  }
19596 }
19597 
19605 QLineF QCPItemLine::getRectClippedLine(const QVector2D &start, const QVector2D &end, const QRect &rect) const
19606 {
19607  bool containsStart = rect.contains(start.x(), start.y());
19608  bool containsEnd = rect.contains(end.x(), end.y());
19609  if (containsStart && containsEnd)
19610  return QLineF(start.toPointF(), end.toPointF());
19611 
19612  QVector2D base = start;
19613  QVector2D vec = end-start;
19614  double bx, by;
19615  double gamma, mu;
19616  QLineF result;
19617  QList<QVector2D> pointVectors;
19618 
19619  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is not horizontal
19620  {
19621  // check top of rect:
19622  bx = rect.left();
19623  by = rect.top();
19624  mu = (by-base.y())/vec.y();
19625  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
19626  {
19627  gamma = base.x()-bx + mu*vec.x();
19628  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
19629  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
19630  }
19631  // check bottom of rect:
19632  bx = rect.left();
19633  by = rect.bottom();
19634  mu = (by-base.y())/vec.y();
19635  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
19636  {
19637  gamma = base.x()-bx + mu*vec.x();
19638  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
19639  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
19640  }
19641  }
19642  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is not vertical
19643  {
19644  // check left of rect:
19645  bx = rect.left();
19646  by = rect.top();
19647  mu = (bx-base.x())/vec.x();
19648  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
19649  {
19650  gamma = base.y()-by + mu*vec.y();
19651  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
19652  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
19653  }
19654  // check right of rect:
19655  bx = rect.right();
19656  by = rect.top();
19657  mu = (bx-base.x())/vec.x();
19658  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
19659  {
19660  gamma = base.y()-by + mu*vec.y();
19661  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
19662  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
19663  }
19664  }
19665 
19666  if (containsStart)
19667  pointVectors.append(start);
19668  if (containsEnd)
19669  pointVectors.append(end);
19670 
19671  // evaluate points:
19672  if (pointVectors.size() == 2)
19673  {
19674  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(), pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
19675  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2)
19676  {
19677  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there. single out the point pair with greatest distance:
19678  double distSqrMax = 0;
19679  QVector2D pv1, pv2;
19680  for (int i=0; i<pointVectors.size()-1; ++i)
19681  {
19682  for (int k=i+1; k<pointVectors.size(); ++k)
19683  {
19684  double distSqr = (pointVectors.at(i)-pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
19685  if (distSqr > distSqrMax)
19686  {
19687  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
19688  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
19689  distSqrMax = distSqr;
19690  }
19691  }
19692  }
19693  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
19694  }
19695  return result;
19696 }
19697 
19703 QPen QCPItemLine::mainPen() const
19704 {
19705  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
19706 }
19707 
19708 
19712 
19735 QCPItemCurve::QCPItemCurve(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
19736  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
19737  start(createPosition("start")),
19738  startDir(createPosition("startDir")),
19739  endDir(createPosition("endDir")),
19740  end(createPosition("end"))
19741 {
19742  start->setCoords(0, 0);
19743  startDir->setCoords(0.5, 0);
19744  endDir->setCoords(0, 0.5);
19745  end->setCoords(1, 1);
19746 
19747  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
19748  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
19749 }
19750 
19751 QCPItemCurve::~QCPItemCurve()
19752 {
19753 }
19754 
19760 void QCPItemCurve::setPen(const QPen &pen)
19761 {
19762  mPen = pen;
19763 }
19764 
19770 void QCPItemCurve::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
19771 {
19772  mSelectedPen = pen;
19773 }
19774 
19783 void QCPItemCurve::setHead(const QCPLineEnding &head)
19784 {
19785  mHead = head;
19786 }

19796 void QCPItemCurve::setTail(const QCPLineEnding &tail)
19797 {
19798  mTail = tail;
19799 }
19800 
19801 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19802 double QCPItemCurve::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
19803 {
19804  Q_UNUSED(details)
19805  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
19806  return -1;
19807 
19808  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPoint());
19809  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPoint());
19810  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPoint());
19811  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPoint());
19812 
19813  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
19814  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
19815 
19816  QPolygonF polygon = cubicPath.toSubpathPolygons().first();
19817  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
19818  for (int i=1; i<polygon.size(); ++i)
19819  {
19820  double distSqr = distSqrToLine(polygon.at(i-1), polygon.at(i), pos);
19821  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
19822  minDistSqr = distSqr;
19823  }
19824  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
19825 }
19826 
19827 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19828 void QCPItemCurve::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
19829 {
19830  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPoint());
19831  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPoint());
19832  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPoint());
19833  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPoint());
19834  if (QVector2D(endVec-startVec).length() > 1e10f) // too large curves cause crash
19835  return;
19836 
19837  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
19838  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
19839 
19840  // paint visible segment, if existent:
19841  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
19842  QRect cubicRect = cubicPath.controlPointRect().toRect();
19843  if (cubicRect.isEmpty()) // may happen when start and end exactly on same x or y position
19844  cubicRect.adjust(0, 0, 1, 1);
19845  if (clip.intersects(cubicRect))
19846  {
19847  painter->setPen(mainPen());
19848  painter->drawPath(cubicPath);
19849  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
19850  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
19851  mTail.draw(painter, QVector2D(startVec), M_PI-cubicPath.angleAtPercent(0)/180.0*M_PI);
19852  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
19853  mHead.draw(painter, QVector2D(endVec), -cubicPath.angleAtPercent(1)/180.0*M_PI);
19854  }
19855 }
19856 
19862 QPen QCPItemCurve::mainPen() const
19863 {
19864  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
19865 }
19866 
19867 
19871 
19885 QCPItemRect::QCPItemRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
19886  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
19887  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
19888  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
19889  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
19890  topRight(createAnchor("topRight", aiTopRight)),
19891  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
19892  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
19893  bottomLeft(createAnchor("bottomLeft", aiBottomLeft)),
19894  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft))
19895 {
19896  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
19897  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
19898 
19899  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
19900  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
19901  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
19902  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
19903 }

19937  mBrush = brush;
19938 }

19949 }
19950 
19951 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19952 double QCPItemRect::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
19953 {
19954  Q_UNUSED(details)
19955  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
19956  return -1;
19957 
19958  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint()).normalized();
19959  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
19960  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
19961 }
19962 
19963 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19964 void QCPItemRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
19965 {
19966  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
19967  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
19968  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
19969  return;
19970  QRectF rect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
19971  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
19972  QRectF boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
19973  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect())) // only draw if bounding rect of rect item is visible in cliprect
19974  {
19975  painter->setPen(mainPen());
19976  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
19977  painter->drawRect(rect);
19978  }
19979 }
19980 
19981 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19982 QPointF QCPItemRect::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
19983 {
19984  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
19985  switch (anchorId)
19986  {
19987  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
19988  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
19989  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
19990  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
19991  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
19992  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
19993  }
19994 
19995  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
19996  return QPointF();
19997 }
19998 
20004 QPen QCPItemRect::mainPen() const
20005 {
20006  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
20007 }
20008 
20014 QBrush QCPItemRect::mainBrush() const
20015 {
20016  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
20017 }

20043 QCPItemText::QCPItemText(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
20044  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
20045  position(createPosition("position")),
20046  topLeft(createAnchor("topLeft", aiTopLeft)),
20047  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
20048  topRight(createAnchor("topRight", aiTopRight)),
20049  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
20050  bottomRight(createAnchor("bottomRight", aiBottomRight)),
20051  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
20052  bottomLeft(createAnchor("bottomLeft", aiBottomLeft)),
20053  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft))
20054 {
20055  position->setCoords(0, 0);
20056 
20057  setRotation(0);
20058  setTextAlignment(Qt::AlignTop|Qt::AlignHCenter);
20059  setPositionAlignment(Qt::AlignCenter);
20060  setText("text");
20061 
20062  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
20063  setSelectedPen(Qt::NoPen);
20064  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20065  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20066  setColor(Qt::black);
20067  setSelectedColor(Qt::blue);
20068 }

20198 
20203 void QCPItemText::setPadding(const QMargins &padding)
20204 {
20205  mPadding = padding;
20206 }
20207 
20208 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20209 double QCPItemText::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
20210 {
20211  Q_UNUSED(details)
20212  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
20213  return -1;
20214 
20215  // The rect may be rotated, so we transform the actual clicked pos to the rotated
20216  // coordinate system, so we can use the normal rectSelectTest function for non-rotated rects:
20217  QPointF positionPixels(position->pixelPoint());
20218  QTransform inputTransform;
20219  inputTransform.translate(positionPixels.x(), positionPixels.y());
20220  inputTransform.rotate(-mRotation);
20221  inputTransform.translate(-positionPixels.x(), -positionPixels.y());
20222  QPointF rotatedPos = inputTransform.map(pos);
20223  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mFont);
20224  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
20225  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
20226  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(positionPixels, textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment);
20227  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
20228 
20229  return rectSelectTest(textBoxRect, rotatedPos, true);
20230 }
20231 
20232 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20233 void QCPItemText::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
20234 {
20235  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
20236  QTransform transform = painter->transform();
20237  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
20238  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
20239  transform.rotate(mRotation);
20240  painter->setFont(mainFont());
20241  QRect textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
20242  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
20243  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
20244  textRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint()+QPoint(mPadding.left(), mPadding.top()));
20245  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
20246  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
20247  QRect boundingRect = textBoxRect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
20248  if (transform.mapRect(boundingRect).intersects(painter->transform().mapRect(clipRect())))
20249  {
20250  painter->setTransform(transform);
20251  if ((mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0) ||
20252  (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0))
20253  {
20254  painter->setPen(mainPen());
20255  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
20256  painter->drawRect(textBoxRect);
20257  }
20258  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20259  painter->setPen(QPen(mainColor()));
20260  painter->drawText(textRect, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
20261  }
20262 }
20263 
20264 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20265 QPointF QCPItemText::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
20266 {
20267  // get actual rect points (pretty much copied from draw function):
20268  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
20269  QTransform transform;
20270  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
20271  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
20272  transform.rotate(mRotation);
20273  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mainFont());
20274  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
20275  QRectF textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
20276  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
20277  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
20278  QPolygonF rectPoly = transform.map(QPolygonF(textBoxRect));
20279 
20280  switch (anchorId)
20281  {
20282  case aiTopLeft: return rectPoly.at(0);
20283  case aiTop: return (rectPoly.at(0)+rectPoly.at(1))*0.5;
20284  case aiTopRight: return rectPoly.at(1);
20285  case aiRight: return (rectPoly.at(1)+rectPoly.at(2))*0.5;
20286  case aiBottomRight: return rectPoly.at(2);
20287  case aiBottom: return (rectPoly.at(2)+rectPoly.at(3))*0.5;
20288  case aiBottomLeft: return rectPoly.at(3);
20289  case aiLeft: return (rectPoly.at(3)+rectPoly.at(0))*0.5;
20290  }
20291 
20292  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
20293  return QPointF();
20294 }
20295 
20306 QPointF QCPItemText::getTextDrawPoint(const QPointF &pos, const QRectF &rect, Qt::Alignment positionAlignment) const
20307 {
20308  if (positionAlignment == 0 || positionAlignment == (Qt::AlignLeft|Qt::AlignTop))
20309  return pos;
20310 
20311  QPointF result = pos; // start at top left
20312  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignHCenter))
20313  result.rx() -= rect.width()/2.0;
20314  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight))
20315  result.rx() -= rect.width();
20316  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignVCenter))
20317  result.ry() -= rect.height()/2.0;
20318  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom))
20319  result.ry() -= rect.height();
20320  return result;
20321 }
20322 
20328 QFont QCPItemText::mainFont() const
20329 {
20330  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
20331 }
20332 
20338 QColor QCPItemText::mainColor() const
20339 {
20340  return mSelected ? mSelectedColor : mColor;
20341 }
20342 
20348 QPen QCPItemText::mainPen() const
20349 {
20350  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
20351 }
20352 
20358 QBrush QCPItemText::mainBrush() const
20359 {
20360  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
20361 }
20362 
20363 
20367 
20381 QCPItemEllipse::QCPItemEllipse(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
20382  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
20383  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
20384  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
20385  topLeftRim(createAnchor("topLeftRim", aiTopLeftRim)),
20386  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
20387  topRightRim(createAnchor("topRightRim", aiTopRightRim)),
20388  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
20389  bottomRightRim(createAnchor("bottomRightRim", aiBottomRightRim)),
20390  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
20391  bottomLeftRim(createAnchor("bottomLeftRim", aiBottomLeftRim)),
20392  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft)),
20393  center(createAnchor("center", aiCenter))
20394 {
20395  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
20396  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
20397 
20398  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
20399  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
20400  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20401  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20402 }
20403 
20404 QCPItemEllipse::~QCPItemEllipse()
20405 {
20406 }
20407 
20413 void QCPItemEllipse::setPen(const QPen &pen)
20414 {
20415  mPen = pen;
20416 }
20417 
20423 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
20424 {
20425  mSelectedPen = pen;
20426 }
20427 
20434 void QCPItemEllipse::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
20435 {
20436  mBrush = brush;
20437 }
20438 
20445 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
20446 {
20447  mSelectedBrush = brush;
20448 }
20449 
20450 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20451 double QCPItemEllipse::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
20452 {
20453  Q_UNUSED(details)
20454  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
20455  return -1;
20456 
20457  double result = -1;
20458  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
20459  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
20460  QPointF center((p1+p2)/2.0);
20461  double a = qAbs(p1.x()-p2.x())/2.0;
20462  double b = qAbs(p1.y()-p2.y())/2.0;
20463  double x = pos.x()-center.x();
20464  double y = pos.y()-center.y();
20465 
20466  // distance to border:
20467  double c = 1.0/qSqrt(x*x/(a*a)+y*y/(b*b));
20468  result = qAbs(c-1)*qSqrt(x*x+y*y);
20469  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
20470  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
20471  {
20472  if (x*x/(a*a) + y*y/(b*b) <= 1)
20473  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
20474  }
20475  return result;
20476 }
20477 
20478 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20479 void QCPItemEllipse::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
20480 {
20481  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
20482  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
20483  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
20484  return;
20485  QRectF ellipseRect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
20486  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
20487  if (ellipseRect.intersects(clip)) // only draw if bounding rect of ellipse is visible in cliprect
20488  {
20489  painter->setPen(mainPen());
20490  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
20491 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
20492  try // drawEllipse sometimes throws exceptions if ellipse is too big
20493  {
20494 #endif
20495  painter->drawEllipse(ellipseRect);
20496 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
20497  } catch (...)
20498  {
20499  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item too large for memory, setting invisible";
20500  setVisible(false);
20501  }
20502 #endif
20503  }
20504 }
20505 
20506 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20507 QPointF QCPItemEllipse::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
20508 {
20509  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
20510  switch (anchorId)
20511  {
20512  case aiTopLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
20513  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
20514  case aiTopRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
20515  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
20516  case aiBottomRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
20517  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
20518  case aiBottomLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
20519  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
20520  case aiCenter: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
20521  }
20522 
20523  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
20524  return QPointF();
20525 }
20526 
20532 QPen QCPItemEllipse::mainPen() const
20533 {
20534  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
20535 }
20536 
20542 QBrush QCPItemEllipse::mainBrush() const
20543 {
20544  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
20545 }
20546 
20547 
20551 
20571 QCPItemPixmap::QCPItemPixmap(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
20572  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
20573  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
20574  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
20575  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
20576  topRight(createAnchor("topRight", aiTopRight)),
20577  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
20578  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
20579  bottomLeft(createAnchor("bottomLeft", aiBottomLeft)),
20580  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft))
20581 {
20582  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
20583  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
20584 
20585  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
20586  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue));
20587  setScaled(false, Qt::KeepAspectRatio);
20588 }
20589 
20590 QCPItemPixmap::~QCPItemPixmap()
20591 {
20592 }
20593 
20597 void QCPItemPixmap::setPixmap(const QPixmap &pixmap)
20598 {
20599  mPixmap = pixmap;
20600  if (mPixmap.isNull())
20601  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "pixmap is null";
20602 }
20603 
20608 void QCPItemPixmap::setScaled(bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode aspectRatioMode)
20609 {
20610  mScaled = scaled;
20611  mAspectRatioMode = aspectRatioMode;
20612  updateScaledPixmap();
20613 }
20614 
20620 void QCPItemPixmap::setPen(const QPen &pen)
20621 {
20622  mPen = pen;
20623 }
20624 
20630 void QCPItemPixmap::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
20631 {
20632  mSelectedPen = pen;
20633 }
20634 
20635 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20636 double QCPItemPixmap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
20637 {
20638  Q_UNUSED(details)
20639  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
20640  return -1;
20641 
20642  return rectSelectTest(getFinalRect(), pos, true);
20643 }
20644 
20645 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20646 void QCPItemPixmap::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
20647 {
20648  bool flipHorz = false;
20649  bool flipVert = false;
20650  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
20651  double clipPad = mainPen().style() == Qt::NoPen ? 0 : mainPen().widthF();
20652  QRect boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
20653  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect()))
20654  {
20655  updateScaledPixmap(rect, flipHorz, flipVert);
20656  painter->drawPixmap(rect.topLeft(), mScaled ? mScaledPixmap : mPixmap);
20657  QPen pen = mainPen();
20658  if (pen.style() != Qt::NoPen)
20659  {
20660  painter->setPen(pen);
20661  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20662  painter->drawRect(rect);
20663  }
20664  }
20665 }
20666 
20667 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20668 QPointF QCPItemPixmap::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
20669 {
20670  bool flipHorz;
20671  bool flipVert;
20672  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
20673  // we actually want denormal rects (negative width/height) here, so restore
20674  // the flipped state:
20675  if (flipHorz)
20676  rect.adjust(rect.width(), 0, -rect.width(), 0);
20677  if (flipVert)
20678  rect.adjust(0, rect.height(), 0, -rect.height());
20679 
20680  switch (anchorId)
20681  {
20682  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
20683  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
20684  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
20685  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
20686  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
20687  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;;
20688  }
20689 
20690  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
20691  return QPointF();
20692 }
20693 
20707 void QCPItemPixmap::updateScaledPixmap(QRect finalRect, bool flipHorz, bool flipVert)
20708 {
20709  if (mPixmap.isNull())
20710  return;
20711 
20712  if (mScaled)
20713  {
20714  if (finalRect.isNull())
20715  finalRect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
20716  if (finalRect.size() != mScaledPixmap.size())
20717  {
20718  mScaledPixmap = mPixmap.scaled(finalRect.size(), mAspectRatioMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
20719  if (flipHorz || flipVert)
20720  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap::fromImage(mScaledPixmap.toImage().mirrored(flipHorz, flipVert));
20721  }
20722  } else if (!mScaledPixmap.isNull())
20723  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap();
20724 }
20725 
20740 QRect QCPItemPixmap::getFinalRect(bool *flippedHorz, bool *flippedVert) const
20741 {
20742  QRect result;
20743  bool flipHorz = false;
20744  bool flipVert = false;
20745  QPoint p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint().toPoint();
20746  QPoint p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint().toPoint();
20747  if (p1 == p2)
20748  return QRect(p1, QSize(0, 0));
20749  if (mScaled)
20750  {
20751  QSize newSize = QSize(p2.x()-p1.x(), p2.y()-p1.y());
20752  QPoint topLeft = p1;
20753  if (newSize.width() < 0)
20754  {
20755  flipHorz = true;
20756  newSize.rwidth() *= -1;
20757  topLeft.setX(p2.x());
20758  }
20759  if (newSize.height() < 0)
20760  {
20761  flipVert = true;
20762  newSize.rheight() *= -1;
20763  topLeft.setY(p2.y());
20764  }
20765  QSize scaledSize = mPixmap.size();
20766  scaledSize.scale(newSize, mAspectRatioMode);
20767  result = QRect(topLeft, scaledSize);
20768  } else
20769  {
20770  result = QRect(p1, mPixmap.size());
20771  }
20772  if (flippedHorz)
20773  *flippedHorz = flipHorz;
20774  if (flippedVert)
20775  *flippedVert = flipVert;
20776  return result;
20777 }
20778 
20784 QPen QCPItemPixmap::mainPen() const
20785 {
20786  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
20787 }
20788 
20789 
20793 
20829 QCPItemTracer::QCPItemTracer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
20830  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
20831  position(createPosition("position")),
20832  mGraph(0)
20833 {
20834  position->setCoords(0, 0);
20835 
20836  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20837  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20838  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
20839  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
20840  setStyle(tsCrosshair);
20841  setSize(6);
20842  setInterpolating(false);
20843  setGraphKey(0);
20844 }
20845 
20846 QCPItemTracer::~QCPItemTracer()
20847 {
20848 }
20849 
20855 void QCPItemTracer::setPen(const QPen &pen)
20856 {
20857  mPen = pen;
20858 }
20859 
20865 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
20866 {
20867  mSelectedPen = pen;
20868 }
20869 
20875 void QCPItemTracer::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
20876 {
20877  mBrush = brush;
20878 }
20879

20886 {
20887  mSelectedBrush = brush;
20888 }

20894 void QCPItemTracer::setSize(double size)
20895 {
20896  mSize = size;
20897 }
20898 
20905 void QCPItemTracer::setStyle(QCPItemTracer::TracerStyle style)
20906 {
20907  mStyle = style;
20908 }
20909 
20920 void QCPItemTracer::setGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
20921 {
20922  if (graph)
20923  {
20924  if (graph->parentPlot() == mParentPlot)
20925  {
20926  position->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
20927  position->setAxes(graph->keyAxis(), graph->valueAxis());
20928  mGraph = graph;
20929  updatePosition();
20930  } else
20931  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph isn't in same QCustomPlot instance as this item";
20932  } else
20933  {
20934  mGraph = 0;
20935  }
20936 }
20937 
20947 void QCPItemTracer::setGraphKey(double key)
20948 {
20949  mGraphKey = key;
20950 }
20951 
20963 void QCPItemTracer::setInterpolating(bool enabled)
20964 {
20965  mInterpolating = enabled;
20966 }
20967 
20968 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20969 double QCPItemTracer::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
20970 {
20971  Q_UNUSED(details)
20972  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
20973  return -1;
20974 
20975  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
20976  double w = mSize/2.0;
20977  QRect clip = clipRect();
20978  switch (mStyle)
20979  {
20980  case tsNone: return -1;
20981  case tsPlus:
20982  {
20983  if (clipRect().intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
20984  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0), pos),
20985  distSqrToLine(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w), pos)));
20986  break;
20987  }
20988  case tsCrosshair:
20989  {
20990  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(QPointF(clip.left(), center.y()), QPointF(clip.right(), center.y()), pos),
20991  distSqrToLine(QPointF(center.x(), clip.top()), QPointF(center.x(), clip.bottom()), pos)));
20992  }
20993  case tsCircle:
20994  {
20995  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
20996  {
20997  // distance to border:
20998  double centerDist = QVector2D(center-pos).length();
20999  double circleLine = w;
21000  double result = qAbs(centerDist-circleLine);
21001  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
21002  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
21003  {
21004  if (centerDist <= circleLine)
21005  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
21006  }
21007  return result;
21008  }
21009  break;
21010  }
21011  case tsSquare:
21012  {
21013  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
21014  {
21015  QRectF rect = QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w));
21016  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
21017  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
21018  }
21019  break;
21020  }
21021  }
21022  return -1;
21023 }
21024 
21025 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21026 void QCPItemTracer::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
21027 {
21028  updatePosition();
21029  if (mStyle == tsNone)
21030  return;
21031 
21032  painter->setPen(mainPen());
21033  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
21034  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
21035  double w = mSize/2.0;
21036  QRect clip = clipRect();
21037  switch (mStyle)
21038  {
21039  case tsNone: return;
21040  case tsPlus:
21041  {
21042  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
21043  {
21044  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0)));
21045  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w)));
21046  }
21047  break;
21048  }
21049  case tsCrosshair:
21050  {
21051  if (center.y() > clip.top() && center.y() < clip.bottom())
21052  painter->drawLine(QLineF(clip.left(), center.y(), clip.right(), center.y()));
21053  if (center.x() > clip.left() && center.x() < clip.right())
21054  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center.x(), clip.top(), center.x(), clip.bottom()));
21055  break;
21056  }
21057  case tsCircle:
21058  {
21059  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
21060  painter->drawEllipse(center, w, w);
21061  break;
21062  }
21063  case tsSquare:
21064  {
21065  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
21066  painter->drawRect(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)));
21067  break;
21068  }
21069  }
21070 }
21071 
21084 void QCPItemTracer::updatePosition()
21085 {
21086  if (mGraph)
21087  {
21088  if (mParentPlot->hasPlottable(mGraph))
21089  {
21090  if (mGraph->data()->size() > 1)
21091  {
21092  QCPDataMap::const_iterator first = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
21093  QCPDataMap::const_iterator last = mGraph->data()->constEnd()-1;
21094  if (mGraphKey < first.key())
21095  position->setCoords(first.key(), first.value().value);
21096  else if (mGraphKey > last.key())
21097  position->setCoords(last.key(), last.value().value);
21098  else
21099  {
21100  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->lowerBound(mGraphKey);
21101  if (it != first) // mGraphKey is somewhere between iterators
21102  {
21103  QCPDataMap::const_iterator prevIt = it-1;
21104  if (mInterpolating)
21105  {
21106  // interpolate between iterators around mGraphKey:
21107  double slope = 0;
21108  if (!qFuzzyCompare((double)it.key(), (double)prevIt.key()))
21109  slope = (it.value().value-prevIt.value().value)/(it.key()-prevIt.key());
21110  position->setCoords(mGraphKey, (mGraphKey-prevIt.key())*slope+prevIt.value().value);
21111  } else
21112  {
21113  // find iterator with key closest to mGraphKey:
21114  if (mGraphKey < (prevIt.key()+it.key())*0.5)
21115  it = prevIt;
21116  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
21117  }
21118  } else // mGraphKey is exactly on first iterator
21119  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
21120  }
21121  } else if (mGraph->data()->size() == 1)
21122  {
21123  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
21124  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
21125  } else
21126  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph has no data";
21127  } else
21128  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph not contained in QCustomPlot instance (anymore)";
21129  }
21130 }
21131 
21137 QPen QCPItemTracer::mainPen() const
21138 {
21139  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
21140 }
21141 
21147 QBrush QCPItemTracer::mainBrush() const
21148 {
21149  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
21150 }
21151 
21152 
21156 
21182 QCPItemBracket::QCPItemBracket(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
21183  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
21184  left(createPosition("left")),
21185  right(createPosition("right")),
21186  center(createAnchor("center", aiCenter))
21187 {
21188  left->setCoords(0, 0);
21189  right->setCoords(1, 1);
21190 
21191  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
21192  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
21193  setLength(8);
21194  setStyle(bsCalligraphic);
21195 }
21196 
21197 QCPItemBracket::~QCPItemBracket()
21198 {
21199 }
21200 
21210 void QCPItemBracket::setPen(const QPen &pen)
21211 {
21212  mPen = pen;
21213 }
21214 
21220 void QCPItemBracket::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
21221 {
21222  mSelectedPen = pen;
21223 }
21224 
21233 void QCPItemBracket::setLength(double length)
21234 {
21235  mLength = length;
21236 }
21237 
21243 void QCPItemBracket::setStyle(QCPItemBracket::BracketStyle style)
21244 {
21245  mStyle = style;
21246 }
21247 
21248 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21249 double QCPItemBracket::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
21250 {
21251  Q_UNUSED(details)
21252  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
21253  return -1;
21254 
21255  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
21256  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
21257  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
21258  return -1;
21259 
21260  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5f;
21261  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
21262  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
21263  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5f-lengthVec;
21264 
21265  return qSqrt(distSqrToLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), pos));
21266 }
21267 
21268 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21269 void QCPItemBracket::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
21270 {
21271  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
21272  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
21273  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
21274  return;
21275 
21276  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5f;
21277  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
21278  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
21279  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5f-lengthVec;
21280 
21281  QPolygon boundingPoly;
21282  boundingPoly << leftVec.toPoint() << rightVec.toPoint()
21283  << (rightVec-lengthVec).toPoint() << (leftVec-lengthVec).toPoint();
21284  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
21285  if (clip.intersects(boundingPoly.boundingRect()))
21286  {
21287  painter->setPen(mainPen());
21288  switch (mStyle)
21289  {
21290  case bsSquare:
21291  {
21292  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF());
21293  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
21294  painter->drawLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
21295  break;
21296  }
21297  case bsRound:
21298  {
21299  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
21300  QPainterPath path;
21301  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
21302  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
21303  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
21304  painter->drawPath(path);
21305  break;
21306  }
21307  case bsCurly:
21308  {
21309  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
21310  QPainterPath path;
21311  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
21312  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4f*widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
21313  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4f*widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
21314  painter->drawPath(path);
21315  break;
21316  }
21317  case bsCalligraphic:
21318  {
21319  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
21320  painter->setBrush(QBrush(mainPen().color()));
21321  QPainterPath path;
21322  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
21323 
21324  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4f*widthVec+0.8f*lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
21325  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4f*widthVec+0.8f*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
21326 
21327  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.5f).toPointF(), (centerVec-0.2f*widthVec+1.2f*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+lengthVec*0.2f).toPointF());
21328  path.cubicTo((centerVec+0.2f*widthVec+1.2f*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.5f).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
21329 
21330  painter->drawPath(path);
21331  break;
21332  }
21333  }
21334  }
21335 }
21336 
21337 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21338 QPointF QCPItemBracket::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
21339 {
21340  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
21341  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
21342  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
21343  return leftVec.toPointF();
21344 
21345  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5f;
21346  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
21347  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
21348  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5f-lengthVec;
21349 
21350  switch (anchorId)
21351  {
21352  case aiCenter:
21353  return centerVec.toPointF();
21354  }
21355  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
21356  return QPointF();
21357 }
21358 
21364 QPen QCPItemBracket::mainPen() const
21365 {
21366  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
21367 }
